meta.name: Ri Nabey Vuj richin ri Nefi

1.intro: Re vuj reʼ nutzijoj ri quicʼaslen ri Leʼi, ri Saría ri rixjayil, y ri cajiʼ rucʼajol. Nitiquir cʼa el riqʼuin ri nimalaxel, cʼa riqʼuin ri ruqʼuisibel chakʼlaxel, rijeʼ quibiniʼan Laman, Lemuel, Sam, y Nefi. Ri Leʼi nuyaʼ lokʼolej rutzijol chique ri vinakiʼ chirij ri itzel yequibanalaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, rijeʼ nicajoʼ niquicammisaj. Roma cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf nubij chire chi tel el chupan ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem. Nibiyin quiqʼuin ri ruchinamit oxiʼ kʼij chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Ri Nefi quiqʼuin ri runimal yetzolin pa ri tinamit Jerusalem richin neʼquicʼamaʼ pe ri retal quibanobal ri e aj Judá. Jariʼ tok niquitij pokonal. Cʼa cʼariʼ, yecʼuleʼ quiqʼuin ri rumiʼal ri Ismael. Yequicʼuaj el ri quichinamit cʼa pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Niquitij pokonal y cʼayeval chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Nutzijoj ri acuchi yebiyin vi. Yeʼapon chuchiʼ ri nimalej yaʼ. Niquiyaʼ rubiʼ ri cʼojlibel riʼ Janíla Nivachin. Ri runimal ri Nefi niquipabaʼ quiʼ chuvech. Rijaʼ nusech quinaʼoj y nuben jun nimalej jucuʼ. Niquicʼovisaj cʼa ri nimalej yaʼ y yeʼapon chupan ri ruvachʼulef sujun can. Ronojel reʼ xa ri tzʼibatajinek can roma ri Nefi. Pa jun chic chʼabel, yin Nefi xintzʼibaj can reʼ.
1.1: Yin Nefi xinalex pe quiqʼuin utzilej ri nteʼ nataʼ. Queriʼ cʼa ri nataʼ xirutijoj che ri retamabal rijaʼ. Pa nucʼaslen yin, e nutzʼeton e qʼuiy cʼayeval. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri Ajaf janíla in ruturusan jutakel. Kitzij cʼa chi yin vetaman qʼuiy chirij ri utzil y ri evan etamabel richin ri Dios. Roma cʼariʼ nintzʼibaj can ri nicʼulvachitej pa ri nucʼaslen yin.
1.2: Nintzʼibaj cʼa pa ri ruchʼabel ri nataʼ. Ri chʼabel riʼ rucʼuan ri etamanic quichin ri e aj Judaʼ y chukaʼ ri quichʼabel ri e aj Egipto.
1.3: Yin vetaman cʼa chi can kitzij vi ri nintzʼibaj. Nintzʼibaj cʼa riqʼuin ri nukʼaʼ yin. Nintzʼibaj cʼa junan riqʼuin ri vetaman yin.
1.4: Ri nataʼ yin xaxe pa Jerusalem rukʼaxan rucʼaslen rijaʼ. Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi jun achin rubiniʼan Sedecías, ja rijaʼ ri tataʼal richin ri tinamit Judaʼ. Pa ri nabey junaʼ tok rijaʼ xoc tataʼal richin ri tinamit riʼ, jariʼ tok xeʼapon janíla e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol chiriʼ. Rijeʼ xquibij can chique ri vinakiʼ chi titzolin pe quicʼuʼx o can xtivulatej vi ri nimalej tinamit Jerusalem.
1.5: Cʼa cʼariʼ ri nataʼ Leʼi xel el y xchʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf. Chiriʼ cʼa, rijaʼ xchʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ronojel ri ránima pa quiviʼ ri ruvinak.
1.6: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok xchʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf, xkaka pe jun boraj kʼakʼ y xpaʼeʼ chuvech rijaʼ pa ruviʼ jun abej. Jariʼ tok rijaʼ xutzʼet y xracʼaxaj e qʼuiy. Cʼa cʼariʼ, janíla xyiquiyoʼ y xbaybot roma ri xutzʼet y ri xracʼaxaj.
1.7: Cʼa cʼariʼ, xtzolin chic chirachoch pa Jerusalem. Chiriʼ cʼa xtzak pa ruchʼat roma ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Uxlabel y ri achique xutzʼet.
1.8: Tok rijaʼ queriʼ rubanon, xucʼuex cʼa el chupan jun tzʼetonic. Xutzʼet cʼa chi ri caj xjakatej y xunojij chi xutzʼet ri Dios tzʼuyul pa ri lokʼolej rucʼojlibal. Ri Dios quisutin rij janíla takonaxelá. Rijeʼ xebixan cʼa y xquiyaʼ rukʼij rijaʼ.
1.9: Ja cʼariʼ tok xutzʼet chi cʼo jun xel pe pa ri caj. Rijaʼ janíla nitzuʼun chuvech ri kʼij pa nicʼaj kʼij.
1.10: Chukaʼ xerutzʼet cablajuj chic ri xcokaj pe rijaʼ. Rijeʼ janíla yetzuʼun chiquivech ri tak chʼumilaʼ ri e cʼo chicaj.
1.11: Xekaka pe y xebiyin chuvech re ruvachʼulef. Ri nabiyel pe xokaʼ y xpaʼeʼ chuvech ri nataʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ xuyaʼ jun vuj chire y xubij chi tusiqʼuij ruvech.
1.12: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok xusiqʼuij ruvech ri vuj riʼ, rijaʼ xnoj riqʼuin ri Ruxlabal ri Ajaf.
1.13: Xusiqʼuij cʼa ruvech, y quereʼ xubij: Joʼoc avech rat Jerusalem. Yin e nutzʼeton can ri itzel tak abanobal. Ri nataʼ xutzʼet chukaʼ chi ri Jerusalem y ri e cʼo chiriʼ xquevulatej can. E qʼuiy xquecamisex roma ri tzaqʼuibel y e qʼuiy xquechapatej el y xquecʼuex cʼa el pa Babilonia. Ri nataʼ xutzʼet cʼa qʼuiy chirij ri Jerusalem.
1.14: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri nataʼ xerutzʼet chuvech ri vuj riʼ e qʼuiy nimalej y meyel tak banobel. Jariʼ tok rijaʼ quereʼ xubij chire ri Ajaf: Yalan nimaʼk y meyel ri asamaj, O Rat Ajaf Ronojel Tiquirel. Ri lokʼolej acʼojlibal cʼo nej chicaj. Ri avuchukʼaʼ, y ri avutzil, y ri ajoyovabal e cʼo pa quiviʼ conojel ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo chuvech re ruvachʼulef. Rat can at joyovanel vi. Roma cʼariʼ, man xtayaʼ ta kʼij chi xquesach ri xcatquitzekelbej.
1.15: Queriʼ cʼa xeʼrubilaʼ ri nataʼ tok xuyaʼ rukʼij ri ru Dios. Can xquicot vi ri ránima. Chukaʼ xnoj rucʼuʼx roma ri xutzʼet. Ja cʼariʼ ri xucʼut can ri Ajaf chuvech.
1.16: Vacami cʼa, yin Nefi man nintzʼibaj ta ronojel ri xutzʼibaj can ri nataʼ. Rijaʼ e rutzʼiban can qʼuiy chique ri xerutzʼet pa tzʼetonic y pa achicʼ. E rutzʼiban can chukaʼ qʼuiy chique ri lokʼolej rutzijol ri xuyaʼ rijaʼ y ri achique xubij chique ri ralcʼual. Ronojel cʼareʼ, man xtintzʼibaj ta cʼa yin.
1.17: Xa xtintzʼibaj cʼa ri xinbanalaʼ pa ri nucʼaslen yin. Vacami cʼa, nintzʼibaj xa jubaʼ chire ri xutzʼibaj ri nataʼ. Riʼnintzʼibaj cʼa chuvech ri xaxilej tak chʼichʼ ri xinben riqʼuin ri nukʼaʼ yin. Cʼa cʼariʼ, tok xtintzʼibaj cʼa chic jubaʼ chire ri xutzʼibaj ri nataʼ, jariʼ tok xtintzʼibaj can ri nucʼaslen yin.
1.18: Roma cʼariʼ, ninvajoʼ chi nivetamaj chi ri Ajaf xerucʼut e qʼuiy meyel tak cʼulvachitajic chuvech ri nataʼ Leʼi chirij ri ruvulalen ri Jerusalem. Jariʼ tok rijaʼ xbe cʼa chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ y xuchop ruyaʼic lokʼolej rutzijol. Xerukʼalajirisaj cʼa chiquivech ri xerutzʼet can y ri xeracʼaxaj.
1.19: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri e aj Judá xetziʼen chirij rijaʼ roma ri achique xujiquibaʼ chiquivech. Rijaʼ xtzijon cʼa chiquij ri quetzelal y ri itzel quibanobal. Xjiquiban chukaʼ chiquij ri xerutzʼet, y ri xeracʼaxaj, y chukaʼ ri xerusiqʼuij chupan ri jun vuj. Xubij cʼa chi ronojel riʼ xa jebel niquikʼalajirisaj chi can xtipe vi jun Mesías y chi xtiyatej ri quicolotajic ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo chuvachʼulef.
1.20: Cʼa cʼariʼ, tok ri e aj Judá xcacʼaxaj riʼ, can xeʼoyover vi riqʼuin. Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, xquibanalaʼ can chique ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol ojer. Xequixovalaʼ el, y xequicʼakalaʼ che abej, y xequicamisalaʼ. Queriʼ cʼa chukaʼ rijeʼ xquitij quikʼij richin niquicamisaj ri nataʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, yin Nefi xtincʼut chivech rix chi ri Ajaf nujoyovaj quivech conojel ri e ruchaʼon, roma cukul cʼa can quicʼuʼx. Rijaʼ yerutoʼ cʼa richin chi niquicol quiʼ pa quikʼaʼ ri vinakiʼ.

2.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf xchʼo riqʼuin ri nataʼ pa jun achicʼ, y quereʼ xubij: Nim ruva akʼij rat Leʼi roma ri abanon can. Rat xeʼakʼalajirisaj chi utzil chiquivech re vinakiʼ reʼ ronojel ri xinbij chave. Roma cʼariʼ nicajoʼ yatquicamisaj.
2.2: Cʼa cʼariʼ tok ri Ajaf pa jun achicʼ xubij chire ri nataʼ chi tucʼuaj cʼa el ri ruchinamit y tibe cʼa chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
2.3: Cʼa cʼariʼ, rijaʼ xunimaj rutzij ri Dios y xuben achiʼel xubij ri Ajaf chire.
2.4: Jariʼ tok rijaʼ xbe cʼa pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Xaxe xerucʼuaj el ri ruchinamit, y ri tak quimoʼc, y ri cʼatzinel chique. Chiriʼ cʼa, xeruyaʼ can ri rachoch y ri rulef richinan. Chukaʼ xeruyaʼ can rukʼana puak, y rusaka puak, y rubeyomal. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xbe cʼa pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
2.5: Xapon cʼa ka pa ri rucʼulbaʼt ri cʼo chunakaj ruchiʼ ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ. Xbiyaj cʼa pa rucʼulbaʼt ri tolan ruvachʼulef chunakaj ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ. Xbiyaj cʼa chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef riqʼuin ri ruchinamit. E cʼo chupan ri ruchinamit rijaʼ ri nteʼ Saría, y ri nunimal ri quibiniʼan Laman, Lemuel, y Sam.
2.6: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri nataʼ biyajinek chic oxiʼ kʼij pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, xuben rumoʼc pa jun liʼan ruvachʼulef chunakaj jun raken yaʼ.
2.7: Cʼa cʼariʼ, xunucʼ jun xuculibel riqʼuin abej y xuben jun sujubel chire ri Ajaf. Chukaʼ xumatioxij chire ri Ajaf, ri ka Dios.
2.8: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Leʼi xuyaʼ rubiʼ Laman chire ri raken yaʼ. Ri raken yaʼ riʼ niqʼuis chupan ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ. Ri liʼan ruvachʼulef cʼo pa ri cʼulbaʼt chunakej acuchi xtibeqʼuis vi ri raken yaʼ.
2.9: Ri nataʼ xutzʼet cʼa chi ri raken yaʼ niqʼuis chupan ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ. Ja cʼariʼ tok xchʼo riqʼuin ri Laman ri rucʼajol, y quereʼ xubij chire: Ja ta cʼa yatoc achiʼel re raken yaʼ reʼ, y yatocyaj ta benek ruvech chupan ri ralaxibal ri chojmilal.
2.10: Chukaʼ chire ri Lemuel xubij quereʼ: Ja ta cʼa yatoc achiʼel re liʼan ruvachʼulef reʼ, richin chi at cof ta, y man ta yasilon, richin queriʼ can yeʼatakej vi ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf.
2.11: Queriʼ xubij cʼa chique rijeʼ, roma cʼa ri Laman y ri Lemuel janíla rucovil ri cánima. Janíla xexebeloj chirij ri quitataʼ roma rijaʼ xerutzʼetelaʼ tak tzʼetonic. Rijaʼ xerelesaj cʼa el pa Jerusalem. Roma cʼariʼ, rijeʼ xequiyaʼ can ri quikʼana puak, ri quisaka puak, y ri quibeyomal, y ri culef quichinan. Xquibij cʼa chi xquecom na pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, y conojel reʼ xa roma xquinojij chi chʼujirinek chic ri runaʼoj ri quitataʼ.
2.12: Quereʼ cʼa ri Laman y ri Lemuel xexebeloj chirij ri quitataʼ, y je rijeʼ ri nimalaxelaʼ. Que cʼareʼ xexebeloj roma xa man quetaman ta cʼa ri rubanobal ri Dios ri tzʼucuyon quichin.
2.13: Chukaʼ man xquinimaj ta chi ri nimalej tinamit Jerusalem xtivulatej cʼa achiʼel xquibilaʼ ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol. Rijeʼ e junan cʼa jubaʼ quiqʼuin ri e aj Judá ri e cʼo pa Jerusalem, ri xcajoʼ xquicamisaj ri nataʼ.
2.14: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri nataʼ, nojinek riqʼuin ri Uxlabel, xchʼo quiqʼuin rijeʼ riqʼuin ronojel ri ruchukʼaʼ, chiriʼ pa ri liʼan ruvachʼulef rubiniʼan Lemuel. Rijeʼ xecʼaracʼot cʼa chuvech. Rijaʼ xusech cʼa quinaʼoj, y rijeʼ xquixibij quiʼ richin chi man xetzijon ta chic chirij. Roma cʼariʼ, xquiben ri achique xubij cʼa chique.
2.15: Ri nataʼ, chupan jun moʼc xcʼojeʼ vi.
2.16: Yin Nefi can cʼa in cʼajol na. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, nim nupalen y can xinrayij vi xinvetamaj ri evan etamabel richin ri Dios. Roma cʼariʼ, yin can xichʼo vi akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf. Cʼa cʼariʼ rijaʼ xpe viqʼuin y xuchʼuchʼujirisaj ri vánima richin chi xinnimaj ronojel ri xubij can ri nataʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, man xinpabaʼ ta viʼ chuvech ri nataʼ achiʼel xquibanalaʼ ri nunimal.
2.17: Xichʼo cʼa riqʼuin ri Sam, y xinbij chire ri xukʼalajirisaj ri Ajaf chinuvech yin roma ri Lokʼolej Ruxlabal. Cʼa cʼariʼ, rijaʼ xunimaj ri xinbij chire.
2.18: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri Laman y ri Lemuel man xequinimaj ta ri nuchʼabel. Yin xibison cʼa roma rucovil ri cánima rijeʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, can xichʼo vi akʼanij chire ri Ajaf coma rijeʼ.
2.19: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf xchʼo pe chuve, y quereʼ xubij: Nim ruva akʼij rat Nefi roma nim ri acukubabel cʼuʼx. Rat cʼa in acanon riqʼuin ruchʼuchʼujil ri avánima.
2.20: Vi xqueʼitakej cʼa ri nupixaʼ, xquixqʼuiyer cʼa, y xquixcʼuex chupan jun ruvachʼulef sujun can. Ri ruvachʼulef riʼ nuchojmirisan cʼa can ivichin rix. Ja ruvachʼulef riʼ janíla jebel chiquivech conojel chic ruvachʼulef.
2.21: Vi ri animal niquipabaʼ cʼa quiʼ chavech rat, jariʼ tok rijeʼ can xqueʼelesex vi el chuvech ri Ajaf.
2.22: Vi yeʼatakej nupixaʼ, rat xcatoc jun ucʼuey bey y jun tijonel pa quiviʼ ri animal.
2.23: Kitzij cʼa, pa ri kʼij tok xtiquipabaʼ quiʼ chinuvech, yin can xquenvetzelaj vi riqʼuin jun pokon etzelanic. Vi ri avijaʼtzul rat man xtiquipabaʼ ta quiʼ chinuvech yin, ri animal manek cʼa xticʼojeʼ cuchukʼaʼ pa quiviʼ.
2.24: Vi ri avijaʼtzul xtiquipabaʼ cʼa quiʼ chinuvech, ri animal xquequinakalaʼ rijeʼ. Quereʼ cʼa xtiban chique richin queriʼ xquinquinataj.

3.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok in chʼovinek chic riqʼuin ri Ajaf, xitzolin pa rumoʼc ri nataʼ.
3.2: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijaʼ xchʼo viqʼuin, y quereʼ xubij chuve: Yin xinben jun achicʼ. Chiriʼ cʼa ri Ajaf xubij chuve chi rat y ri animal cʼo chi yixtzolin pa Jerusalem.
3.3: Chiriʼ cʼa riqʼuin ri Laban, cʼo ri retal quibanobal ri e aj Judá, y chukaʼ ri retal quibiʼ ri avatiʼt amamaʼ e kʼaxinek el. Ronojel cʼareʼ tzʼibatel can chuvech ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ.
3.4: Roma cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf rubin pe chuve chi rat quiqʼuin ri animal cʼo chi yixbe chirachoch ri Laban. Chiriʼ cʼa xtibevilaʼ ri retal banobel, y xtibecʼamaʼ pe vaveʼ pa tolan ruvachʼulef.
3.5: Vacami cʼa, ri animal yexebeloj y niquibij chi cʼayef rubanic ri xinbij chique. Vaveʼ cʼa xa man ja ta yin ri yibin chique. Xa can ja vi reʼ jun rupixaʼ ri Ajaf.
3.6: Roma cʼariʼ, cabiyin cʼa nucʼajol y ri Ajaf xcaruturusaj roma cʼa rat man yaxebeloj ta.
3.7: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin xinbij chire ri nataʼ: Xquibe cʼa y xtinben ronojel ri rubin can ri Ajaf chuve. Roma vetaman cʼa chi manjun pixaʼ nuyaʼ ta ri Ajaf chique ri vinakiʼ, vi man ta nuchojmirisaj cʼa ri bey chiquivech, richin chi xtiquiben ri achique rubin can chique.
3.8: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri nataʼ xeracʼaxaj re chʼabel reʼjaníla xquicot. Chiriʼ cʼa rijaʼ retaman chi ri Ajaf in ruturusan can.
3.9: Cʼa cʼariʼ, yin Nefi, quiqʼuin ri nunimal, xekacʼuaj el kamoʼc. Que cʼariʼ, xkachop binen pa tolan ruvachʼulef richin yojapon pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem.
3.10: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok oj apovinek chic pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem xojtzijon ka chikavech.
3.11: Xkakʼijulaʼ achique chike ri nibe chirachoch ri Laban. Ja ri Laman cʼuluman richin nibe. Cʼa cʼariʼ, rijaʼ xbe chirachoch ri Laban y xchʼo riqʼuin tok tzʼuyul chiriʼ pa rachoch.
3.12: Xucʼutuj cʼa chire ri Laban chi tuyaʼ chire ri retal banobel ri tzʼibatel can chuvech ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ. Ja cʼariʼ ri acuchi tzʼiban vi ri retal quibiʼ ri ijaʼtzul kʼaxinek can richin ri nataʼ.
3.13: Jariʼ tok ri Laban xoyover riqʼuin, y can xrelesaj el riqʼuin rijaʼ. Man xrajoʼ ta cʼa xuyaʼ ri retal banobel chire. Roma cʼariʼ tok quereʼ xubij chire ri Laman: Ja rat at jun elekʼom y yin xcatincamisaj.
3.14: Chiriʼ cʼa ri Laman xanimej el chuvech y xorubij chike ronojel ri xuben ri Laban. Cʼa cʼariʼ, janíla xojbison. Ri nunimal jubaʼ man xetzolin riqʼuin ri nataʼ pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
3.15: Jariʼ tok xinbij chique: Can jic vi chi qʼues ri Ajaf, y chukaʼ can jic vi chi oj qʼues roj. Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, can jic vi chi man xkojtzolin ta riqʼuin ri katataʼ pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef vi man kacʼuan ta el ri achique rubin can ri Ajaf chike.
3.16: Roma cʼariʼ, quekatakej cʼa chi utzil ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf. Joʼ cʼa pa ri ulef ri xrichinaj ri katataʼ. Chiriʼ cʼa e ruyaʼon can rijaʼ ri kʼana puek, y ri saka puek, y conojel ruvech beyomel. Rijaʼ queriʼ cʼa rubanon can richin xerutakej ri rupixaʼ ri Dios.
3.17: Roma cʼa rijaʼ can retaman vi chi xtivulatej ri Jerusalem roma ri itzel xequibanalaʼ ri vinakiʼ.
3.18: Rijeʼ xequixutuj cʼa ri quichʼabel ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol. Roma cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf can xubij vi chire ri nataʼ chi tel el pa ri tinamit. Vi man ta queriʼ xuben, xa xcom ta cʼa rijaʼ chukaʼ. Romariʼ tok cʼo chi xanimej el chupan ri ruvachʼulef.
3.19: Can utz vi cʼa chuvech ri Dios chi neʼkacʼamaʼ pe ri retal banobel riʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ cʼo banel richin yekatijoj ri kalcʼual chire ri quichʼabel ri kateʼ katataʼ.
3.20: Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, cʼo banel richin quekatijoj ri kalcʼual chique ri chʼabel xequibij can conojel ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol. Ri chʼabel riʼ, e rujachon ri Dios chique rijeʼ roma ri Ruxlabal y ri ruchukʼaʼ rijaʼ, pa rutiquiribel pe ri ruvachʼulef, cʼa pa re kʼij reʼ.
3.21: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi queriʼ xitzijon quiqʼuin ri nunimal. Que cʼariʼ, xenyukʼ cʼa richin chi xequitakej chi utzil ri rupixaʼ ri Dios.
3.22: Cʼa cʼariʼ, xojbe ka pa ri kulef kichinan. Chiriʼ cʼa xekamol can ri kakʼana puak, y ri kasaka puak, y chukaʼ ri kabeyomal.
3.23: Tok xekamol conojel reʼ, xojbe cʼa chic akʼanij chirachoch ri Laban.
3.24: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbe riqʼuin ri Laban. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xkacʼutuj chire chi tuyaʼ chike ri retal banobel ri e tzʼiban can chuvech ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ. Pa ruqʼuexel, roj xkasuj chire ronojel ri kakʼana puak, y ri kasaka puak, y ri kabeyomal.
3.25: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri Laban xutzʼet chi can janíla kabeyomal, rijaʼ xa xumunij cʼa. Jariʼ tok xojrelesaj el, y xerutek el ri rusamajelaʼ chikij chikacamisaxic. Queriʼ cʼa rijaʼ xtiquir xrelekʼaj can ri kabeyomal.
3.26: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi roj xojanimej chiquivech ri rusamajelaʼ ri Laban. Cʼo cʼa chi xekayaʼ can ri kabeyomal y xecʼojeʼ cʼa can pa ri rukʼaʼ ri Laban.
3.27: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojanimej el pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef y xkevaj kiʼ chupan jun jul richin jun abej. Ri rusamajelaʼ ri Laban man xojquickʼiʼ ta cʼa.
3.28: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xoyover ri Laman viqʼuin yin, y chukaʼ riqʼuin ri nataʼ. Chukaʼ xoyover ri Lemuel roma cʼa rijaʼ xuyaʼ rukʼij ri ruchʼabel ri Laman. Chiriʼ cʼa ri Laman y ri Lemuel can cof vi xechʼo kiqʼuin roj ri oj quichakʼ. Ja cʼariʼ xojquichʼey riqʼuin jun xicʼay.
3.29: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok yetajin chikachʼeyic riqʼuin jun xicʼay, jariʼ tok xpe jun rutakonaxel ri Ajaf y xpaʼeʼ chiquivech. Rijaʼ xchʼo quiqʼuin y xubij quereʼ: ¿Achique roma tok nichʼey ri ichakʼ riqʼuin jun xicʼay? ¿La man ivetaman ta cami chi ri Ajaf ruchaʼon rijaʼ richin nucʼuaj ibey rix? Queriʼcʼa xbanatej chive roma ri itzel ri xibanalaʼ. Vacami cʼa, cʼo chi yixbe chic jun bey Jerusalem. Chiriʼ cʼa ri Ajaf xtiberujachaʼ ri Laban pan ikʼaʼ.
3.30: Tok ri takonaxel chʼovinek chic kiqʼuin, rijaʼ xel cʼa el.
3.31: Tok benek chic el ri takonaxel, ri Laman y ri Lemuel xexebeloj chic y quereʼ xquibij: ¿Achique cʼa banel tok ri Ajaf xtitiquir xtujech ri Laban pa kakʼaʼ roj? Ri Laban riʼ can jun nimalej achin. Cʼo pa quiviʼ cavinek lajuj achiʼaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, rijaʼ nitiquir yerucamisaj cavinek lajuj achiʼaʼ. ¿Y cʼa ta man oc chukaʼ roj?

4.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xichʼo quiqʼuin ri nunimal y quereʼ xinbij chique: Joʼ cʼa chic jun bey pa Jerusalem. Tikacukubaʼ cʼa kacʼuʼx richin yekatakej ri rupixaʼ ri Dios. Roma cʼa, can nimalej vi ri ruchukʼaʼ rijaʼ chuvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef. ¿Achique cʼa roma tok man ta nimalej ri ruchukʼaʼ chuvech ri Laban quiqʼuin ri cavinek lajuj rusamajelaʼ? ¿O stapeʼ vi ta e cʼo e qʼuiy lajujitek vokʼo rusamajelaʼ riqʼuin?
4.2: Roma cʼariʼ, joʼ akʼanij. Kojcʼojeʼ cʼa cof achiʼel ri Moisés. Rijaʼ xchʼo cʼa chire ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ y can xuchʼer vi riʼ, quereʼ y quelaʼ. Jariʼ tok ri kateʼ katataʼ xekʼax pe y xeʼel pe pa quikʼa ri e aj Egipto. Ja cʼariʼ, ri oyovanelaʼ richin ri Faraón ri xetzekelben pe quichin xejikʼ cʼa chupan ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ.
4.3: Vacami cʼa, rix ivetaman chi reʼ xa kitzij. Chukaʼ ivetaman chi jun takonaxel chʼovinek iviqʼuin. ¿Achique cʼa roma niben caʼiʼ icʼuʼx? Joʼ akʼanij. Ri Ajaf nitiquir yojrucol, achiʼel cʼa xuben quiqʼuin ri kateʼ katataʼ ojer. Nitiquir chukaʼ nuyoj ri Laban achiʼel xuben chique ri e aj Egipto.
4.4: Tok quereʼ xinbij chique, cʼa xpe na coyoval. Chukaʼ xexebeloj cʼa chic jun bey. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xinquitzekelbej xa cʼa tok xojapon chirij ri tzʼak richin ri Jerusalem.
4.5: Vacami cʼa tocokʼaʼ chic. Cʼa cʼariʼ, yin xinben chi ri nunimal xquevaj quiʼ chirij ri tzʼak. Tok rijeʼ quevan chic quiʼ, yin Nefi xinoc ekal chupan ri tinamit y xibe apon chirachoch ri Laban.
4.6: Jacʼa ri Uxlabel ri ucʼuayon nubey, roma yin manjani vetaman achique xtinben.
4.7: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xibe cʼa. Tok xijel apon chirachoch ri Laban, xintzʼet jun achin tzakinek pan ulef pa bey. Rijaʼ kʼabarel cʼa chic riqʼuin kʼabarisanel yaʼ.
4.8: Tok xinapon riqʼuin, xinnabej chi ja rijaʼ ri Laban.
4.9: Xintzʼet cʼa ri rutzaqʼuibal y xinvelesaj el pa rucʼojlibal. Ri ruchapbel can kʼana chʼichʼ vi, y yalan utzilej ri rubaniquil. Chukaʼ xintzʼet ri ruxak y riʼ can jebel covilej chʼichʼ.
4.10: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Uxlabel xubij chuve chi tincamisaj. Jariʼ tok yin xinbij pa vánima: Manjun bey nucamisan ta jun achin. Cʼariʼ xqʼuis ri vuchukʼaʼ, y man xinvajoʼ ta xincamisaj.
4.11: Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri Uxlabel xubij chic chuve: Vacami cʼa ri Ajaf rujachon pan akʼaʼ. Kitzij cʼa chi yin vetaman chukaʼ chi rijaʼ xutij rukʼij richin yirucamisaj. Chukaʼ man xerutakej ta ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf. Chukaʼ rijaʼ xumej can ri kabeyomal.
4.12: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Uxlabel xubij chic chuve: Tacamisaj cʼa roma ri Ajaf can rujachon vi pan akʼaʼ.
4.13: Can kitzij vi chi ri Ajaf yerucamisaj ri e itzel, richin chi yecʼachoj ri chojmilej tak rurayibal rijaʼ. Yalan utz chi xticamisex cʼa xe jun achin, chuvech xqueyojyaj can y xquesachiyaj jun tinamit roma manjun niquinimalaʼ.
4.14: Yin Nefi xinvacʼaxaj cʼa re chʼabel reʼ. Jariʼ tok xinnataj achique ri xubij chuve ri Ajaf pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Chiriʼ cʼa xubij quereʼ: Vi ri avijaʼtzul yequitakej cʼa ri nupixaʼ xqueqʼuiyer cʼa chupan ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.
4.15: Chukaʼ xinnojij chi rijeʼ man yetiquir ta yequitakej ri rupixaʼ ri Dios vi manek ri pixaʼ quiqʼuin. Ja pixaʼ riʼ ri xyaʼox chire ri Moisés.
4.16: Vetaman cʼa chukaʼ chi ri pixaʼ riʼ tzʼiban cʼa can chuvech ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ.
4.17: Chukaʼ cʼa vetaman chi xaxe romariʼ tok ri Ajaf rujachon can ri Laban pa nukʼaʼ yin. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, cʼo cʼa banel richin xquencʼuaj el ri retal banobel, achiʼel cʼa ri pixaʼ ri ruyaʼon pe chuve.
4.18: Roma cʼariʼ, xinnimaj rutzij ri Uxlabel. Xinchop rusumal ruviʼ ri Laban y xintzaqʼuij el ri rujolon riqʼuin ri rutzaqʼuibal rijaʼ.
4.19: Tok nutzaqʼuin chic el ri rujolon riqʼuin ri rutzaqʼuibal rijaʼ, jariʼ tok xinqʼuen pe ronojel ri rutziak, y xincusaj yin. Xincusaj chukaʼ ronojel ri rutoʼbal.
4.20: Queriʼ nubanon chic tok xibe apon pa ri ruyaconbal puek richin ri Laban. Tok xibe cʼa apon, xintzʼet ri rusamajel ri Laban ri chajiyon ri jakbel richin ri ruyaconbal puek. Xinben cʼa ri ruchʼabel ri Laban, y xinbij chire chi quirachibilaj apon, cʼa chupan ri ruyaconbal puek.
4.21: Rijaʼ xutzʼet cʼa ri tziek y chukaʼ ri tzaqʼuibel nuximon xeʼ nupan. Roma cʼariʼ, xunojij chi ja yin in Laban, ri rajaf.
4.22: Xchʼo cʼa pe viqʼuin chiquij ri nimakul quichin ri e aj Judá. Rijaʼ retaman cʼa chi ri Laban, ri rajaf, xbe quiqʼuin rijeʼ chakʼaʼ.
4.23: Y yin xichʼo riqʼuin achiʼel cʼa nichʼo ri Laban.
4.24: Chukaʼ cʼa, xinbij chire chi cʼo chi xtinqʼuen el ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ ri cʼo ri tzʼibanic chuvech. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xtincʼuaj el chique ri vachʼalal ri in coyoben chirij ri tzʼak.
4.25: Chukaʼ xinbij chire chi titzekeʼ pe chuvij.
4.26: Rijaʼ xtzekeʼ cʼa pe chuvij. Rijaʼ xunojij cʼa chi xichʼo chiquij ri vachʼalal e cʼo chupan ri kʼataj. Chukaʼ xunojij chi ja yin in Laban, ri achique xincamisaj yan.
4.27: Rijaʼ janíla xchʼo viqʼuin chiquij ri nimakul quichin ri e aj Judá tok xojbe cʼa apon quiqʼuin ri nunimal ri e cʼo chirij ri tzʼak.
4.28: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri nunimal xinquitzʼet, xquinojij chi ja ri Laban ri petenek. Chukaʼ xquinojij rijeʼ chi ri Laban xirucamisaj yin y xrajoʼ xerucamisaj ta rijeʼ chukaʼ. Romariʼ tok ri Laman can xuxibij riʼ, y chukaʼ queriʼ ri Lemuel y ri Sam. Jariʼ tok xeʼanimej chinuvech.
4.29: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xenvoyoj y rijeʼ xincacʼaxaj. Roma cʼariʼ, xquitanabaʼ caninen chinuvech.
4.30: Cʼa cʼariʼ, tok ri rusamajel ri Laban xerutzʼet ri nunimal, xa xcʼaracʼot cʼa rijaʼ. Jubaʼ man xanimej chinuvech richin nitzolin pa ri tinamit Jerusalem.
4.31: Yin Nefi can nim vi ri nupalen, y chukaʼ xincʼul nim vuchukʼaʼ riqʼuin ri Ajaf. Romariʼ tok xinchop ri rusamajel ri Laban y xinpabaʼ richin queriʼ man xanimej ta chic.
4.32: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xinjiquibaʼ chire pa ri rubiʼ ri Ajaf, y riqʼuin ri nucʼaslen yin, chi man ta cʼa xtikacamisaj, vi rijaʼ xtunimaj cʼa ri nuchʼabel.
4.33: Xinbij cʼa chire chi man tuxibij riʼ. Xinsuj cʼa chire chi vi nibe kiqʼuin roj pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, chiriʼ cʼa rijaʼ xa xtoskʼopix cʼa, junan kiqʼuin roj.
4.34: Quereʼ cʼa chukaʼ xinbij chire: Ri Ajaf rubin can chike chi nikaben quereʼ. ¿La man utz ta cʼa chi xquekatakej chi utzil ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf? Roma cʼariʼ, vi xcabe pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef riqʼuin ri nataʼ, xticʼojeʼ cʼa ri acʼojlibal kiqʼuin roj.
4.35: Ri rubiʼ ri samajel riʼ ja Zoram. Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijaʼ xchʼuchʼuʼ ránima tok xracʼaxaj ri chʼabel ri xinbij chire. Rijaʼ xujiquibaʼ chi xtibe cʼa riqʼuin ri nataʼ chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Xujiquibaʼ cʼa chukaʼ chi xticʼojeʼ can kiqʼuin roj benek ruvech.
4.36: Roj xkajoʼ cʼa chi rijaʼ cʼo kiqʼuin. Vi man ta queriʼ xuben, cʼo chi xquinabej ta ri e aj Judá chi xa xojanimej can pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Cʼa ta riʼ, xquetzekeʼ cʼa el chikij richin chi xkojquicamisaj.
4.37: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri Zoram xujiquibaʼ chi nibe kiqʼuin, manek chic xkaxibij ta kiʼ.
4.38: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xekacʼuaj el ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ y ri rusamajel ri Laban. Xojbe cʼa apon chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef y xojapon xa cʼa acuchi cʼo vi ri rumoʼc ri katataʼ.

5.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbe riqʼuin ri katataʼ chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Jariʼ tok rijaʼ xnoj riqʼuin quicoten. Ri nteʼ chukaʼ can xquicot vi. Rijaʼ janíla okʼovinek cʼa chic koma roj.
5.2: Rijaʼ xunojij cʼa chi roj xojcom chiriʼ pa tolan ruvachʼulef. Chukaʼ xchʼolin chirij ri nataʼ. Xubij chire chi rijaʼ xa jun achin yerutzʼetelaʼ tak tzʼetonic. Quereʼ xubij: Vacami cʼa rat xa xojavelesaj pe chupan ri kulef kichinan. Xecom ri val y roj chukaʼ xkojcom vaveʼ pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
5.3: Ja cʼareʼ ri ruchʼabel ri nteʼ tok xchʼolin chirij ri nataʼ.
5.4: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri nataʼ xchʼo riqʼuin rijaʼ y quereʼ xubij: Yin vetaman chi nintzʼetelaʼ lokʼolej tzʼetonic. Vi man ta xintzʼet ri nubanalaʼ ri Dios, man ta xinvetamaj ri rutzil rijaʼ. Xaxe xicʼojeʼ ta can chiriʼ pa Jerusalem y chiriʼ ta xquicom vi quiqʼuin ri vachʼalal.
5.5: Nucʼulun cʼa vacami jun ruvachʼulef sujun can. Roma cʼariʼ, janíla yiquicot. Vetaman cʼa chi ri Ajaf xquerucol ri kalcʼual pa rukʼaʼ ri Laban, y xqueruqʼuem pe chic kiqʼuin.
5.6: Queriʼ cʼa, ri nataʼ xucukubaʼ rucʼuʼx ri nteʼ Saría koma roj. Ja cʼariʼ tok xojbiyin akʼanij chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef, cʼa pa ri ruvachʼulef ri Jerusalem, richin chi xebekacʼamaʼ pe ri retal quibanobal ri e aj Judá.
5.7: Tok xojtzolin cʼa chic pa ri rumoʼc ri nataʼ, can janíla vi xequicot rijeʼ y ri nteʼ man xbison ta chic.
5.8: Rijaʼ xchʼo cʼa y quereʼ xubij: Vacami can vetaman vi chi ri Ajaf rubin can chire ri vachijil richin xanimej pe cʼa chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Chukaʼ vetaman chi ri Ajaf xeruchajij ri val y xerucol pa rukʼaʼ ri Laban. Vetaman cʼa chukaʼ chi ri Ajaf xuyaʼ cuchukʼaʼ richin chi xquiben ri achique xubij cʼa rijaʼ chique. Queriʼ cʼa ri xubij ri nteʼ.
5.9: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi janíla xequicot y xequiben camelabel sujubel y poron sujubel chire ri Ajaf. Chukaʼ xquimatioxij chire ri Dios richin ri Israel.
5.10: Tok quimatioxin cʼa chic chire ri Dios richin ri Israel, jariʼ tok ri nataʼ Leʼi xeruqʼuen pe ri retal banobel ri tzʼibatel can chuvech ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼich. Cʼa cʼariʼ, rijaʼ xerunicʼoj pa rutiquiribel pe.
5.11: Rijaʼ xutzʼet cʼa chi e rucʼuan ri voʼoʼ vuj richin ri Moisés. Jariʼ ri nutzijoj tok xtzʼucutej pe ri ruvachʼulef, y chukaʼ tok xetzʼucutej pe ri Adán y ri Eva. Jecʼa rijeʼ ri nabey kateʼ katataʼ.
5.12: Chukaʼ rucʼuan ri retal quicʼaslen ri e aj Judá pa tok rutiquiribel pe, xa cʼa tok ri Sedecías xoc ri tataʼal richin ri tinamit Judá.
5.13: E rucʼuan chukaʼ e qʼuiy lokʼolej rutzijol ri xequiyalaʼ pe ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol pa rutiquiribel pe, cʼa tok ri Sedecías xoc ri rutataʼal ri tinamit. E rucʼuan chukaʼ e qʼuiy lokʼolej rutzijol ri xeruyaʼ ri Jeremías.
5.14: Xcʼulvachitej chukaʼ chi ri nataʼ Leʼi xril chuvech ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ ri retal quibiʼ ri quijaʼtzul ri rutataʼ rijaʼ. Chiriʼ cʼa, xretamaj chi rijaʼ jun rijaʼtzul ri José. Ri José riʼ, ja rijaʼ ri rucʼajol ri Jacob. Ja rijaʼ ri xcʼayix el pan Egipto. Ja rijaʼ ri xtoʼox roma ri Ajaf richin chi rijaʼ xeberilij ri rutataʼ Jacob, y chukaʼ ri e cʼo pa rachoch. Romaʼ cʼariʼ, man xecom ta roma ri vayijal.
5.15: Rijeʼ chukaʼ xeʼoskʼopix el y xeʼelesex el pa ri ruvachʼulef Egipto roma ri Dios. Ja rijaʼ ri chajiyon quichin.
5.16: Quereʼ cʼa ri nataʼ Leʼi xunabej ri retal quibiʼ quijaʼtzul ri rutataʼ. Chukaʼ ri Laban jun rijaʼtzul can ri José. Roma cʼariʼ tok rijaʼ y ri rutataʼ xequichajij ri retal banobel.
5.17: Vacami cʼa, tok ri nataʼ xerutzʼet conojel reʼ, rijaʼ xnoj riqʼuin ri Uxlabel. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xuyaʼ lokʼolej rutzijol chirij ri rijaʼtzul rijaʼ.
5.18: Xubij chi re xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ reʼ xquecʼuex el chique conojel tinamit, ijaʼtzul, chʼabel, y vinakul ri can rijaʼtzul vi rijaʼ.
5.19: Romaʼ cʼariʼ, manjun bey xquesach ta re xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chʼichʼreʼ. Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, manjun bey xquepusir ta. Ri nataʼ Leʼi xeruyaʼ cʼa e qʼuiy lokʼolej rutzijol chirij ri rijaʼtzul.
5.20: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi cʼa pa ri kʼij riʼ, yin y chukaʼ ri nataʼ xekatakej conojel ri pixaʼ ri xeruyaʼ can ri Ajaf chike.
5.21: Can xekaqʼuen vi pe ri retal banobel achiʼel ri Ajaf xubij can chike. Chukaʼ xekanicʼoj y xkanabej chi can e cʼatzinel vi, y can nim vi ri quejkalen chikavech roj. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, cʼo banel richin yekatijoj ri kalcʼual chique ri rupixaʼ ri Dios.
5.22: Roma can jareʼri utzilej runojibal ri Ajaf chi xquekacʼuaj el tok xojbiyin chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef, cʼa pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.

6.1: Vacami cʼa, yin Nefi man nintzʼibaj ta ri retal quibiʼ ri quijaʼtzul ri nataʼ vaveʼ. Chukaʼ cʼa manjun bey apon xtintzʼibaj ta riʼ chuvech re xaxilej tak chʼichʼ reʼ ri nintzʼibaj vacami. Tzʼiban cʼa can chupan ri retal banobel ri xutzʼibaj can ri nataʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, yin man nintzʼibaj ta chic vaveʼ.
6.2: Xaxe nicʼatzin chuve chi ninbij chi roj oj rijaʼtzul ri José.
6.3: Man nicʼatzin ta cʼa chuve chi nintzʼibaj ronojel ri rubanobal ri nataʼ. Roma manek banel richin yetzʼibex chuvech re xaxilej tak chʼichʼ reʼ. Jariʼ, xa roma yin ninvajoʼ chi nicʼojeʼ ri cʼojlibel vaveʼ acuchi yentzʼibaj vi ri rubanobal ri Dios.
6.4: Can xaxe vi reʼ ri janíla ninvajoʼ. Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi yenyukʼ pe ri achiʼaʼ richin yejel apon riqʼuin ri Dios quichin ri Abraham, ri Isaac y ri Jacob, richin chi yecolotej.
6.5: Roma cʼariʼ, man nintzʼibaj ta ri nikaʼ chiquivech ri niquiben ri itzel. Xa nintzʼibaj ri achique nikaʼ chuvech ri Dios y chiquivech ri man niquiben ta ri itzel.
6.6: Roma cʼariʼ, jareʼ jun pixaʼ ninyaʼ chique ri vijaʼtzul: Chi man tiquitzʼibaj cʼa chuvech re xaxilej tak chʼichʼ reʼ ri achique manek rejkalen chique ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ.

7.1: Vacami cʼa, ninvajoʼ chi nivetamaj chi ri nataʼ Leʼi xutanabaʼ ruyaʼic lokʼolej rutzijol chirij ri rijaʼtzul rijaʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf xpe chic jun bey riqʼuin y xtzijon riqʼuin. Xubij chire chi man utz ta chi rijaʼ xquerucʼuaj el ri ruchinamit quiyon oc pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Xa nicʼatzin chi ri rucʼajol yecʼuleʼ quiqʼuin kʼopojiʼ. Queriʼ cʼa, rijeʼ xquetiquir xtiquiqʼuiytisaj jun vinakul chire ri Ajaf chiriʼ pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.
7.2: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf xubij chire ri nataʼ chi yin, quiqʼuin ri nunimal, cʼo chi yojtzolin chic pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem. Chiriʼ cʼa, xquekaqʼuem pe pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef ri Ismael y ri ruchinamit rijaʼ.
7.3: Cʼariʼ xcʼulvachitej chi yin Nefi, quiqʼuin ri nunimal, xojbe chic jun bey pa tolan ruvachʼulef, cʼa pa Jerusalem.
7.4: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbe akʼanij chirachoch ri Ismael. Ri Ismael can utz vi xojrucʼul. Cʼariʼ roj xekachʼabalij ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf chire.
7.5: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf xuchʼuchʼujirisaj ri cánima ri Ismael y ri e aj pa rachoch. Roma cʼariʼ tok rijeʼ xquichop binen kiqʼuin pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, cʼa pa ri rumoʼc ri katataʼ.
7.6: Yojtajin cʼa che binen pa tolan ruvachʼulef. Ja cʼariʼ tok ri Laman y ri Lemuel quiqʼuin caʼiʼ chique ri rumiʼal ri Ismael, y caʼiʼ rucʼajol, y conojel ri quichinamit rijeʼ, xquipabaʼ quiʼ chikavech roj. Xquipabaʼ cʼa quiʼ chinuvech yin Nefi, y chuvech ri Sam, chukaʼ ri Ismael ri quitataʼ, riqʼuin ri rixjayil rijaʼ, y ri oxiʼ chic rumiʼal.
7.7: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijeʼ xquipabaʼ quiʼ chikavech roma xquirayij xetzolin ta pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem.
7.8: Vacami cʼa, yin Nefi xibison roma ri rucovil ri cánima. Roma cʼariʼ, xichʼo quiqʼuin ri Laman y ri Lemuel. Quereʼ cʼa xinbij chique: Vaveʼ cʼa rix ix nunimal. ¿Achique roma can cof vi ri ivánima y can moy vi ri inaʼoj? Xa roma cʼariʼ tok cʼo chi yichʼo iviqʼuin y nincʼut utzilej banobel chivech, y yin xa in ichakʼ rix.
7.9: ¿Achique cʼa roma tok rix man iniman ta ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf?
7.10: ¿Achique cʼa roma tok imestan chic chi xitzʼet jun takonaxel richin ri Ajaf?
7.11: ¿Achique cami roma tok e imestan chic ri nimalej tak utzil ri xerubanalaʼ ri Ajaf chike? Rijaʼ xojrucol cʼa el pa rukʼaʼ ri Laban. Chukaʼ xojrutoʼ richin xkachop ri retal banobel.
7.12: ¿Achique cʼa roma tok imestan chi ri Ajaf nitiquir nuben ronojel chique ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ, achiʼel cʼa ri nrajoʼ rijaʼ? Can que vi riʼ nuben quiqʼuin rijeʼ vi niquisamajij cʼa ri quicukubabel cʼuʼx riqʼuin. Romariʼ, tikanimaj cʼa rijaʼ chi utzil.
7.13: Vi nikanimaj rijaʼ chi utzil, roj xtikacʼul cʼa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can. Pa chʼakaʼ chic kʼij apon, rix xtivetamaj chi xtikʼajer ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf chirij ri ruvulatajic ri Jerusalem. Ronojel cʼa ri rubin can ri Ajaf chirij ri vulatajic richin ri Jerusalem, can xtibanatej vi.
7.14: Can kitzij vi chi xa jubaʼ chic apon tok ri Ruxlabal ri Ajaf man xtutij ta chic rukʼij quiqʼuin rijeʼ. Roma can kitzij chi rijeʼ e quixovan chic ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol, y quiyaʼon can ri Jeremías pa cheʼ. Quitijon quikʼij richin niquicamisaj ri nataʼ yin. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, rijeʼ cokotan el rijaʼ pa ri ruvachʼulef riʼ.
7.15: Can kitzij vi ninbij chive chi vi rix yixtzolin chic pa Jerusalem, xquixcom cʼa quiqʼuin rijeʼ. Vacami cʼa vi queriʼ nivajoʼ, quixtzolin cʼa akʼanij pa ri ruvachʼulef riʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, tokaʼ cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx ri chʼabel ri ninbij chive. Vi ta yixbe, xquixcom ta cʼa chukaʼ. Can que vi reʼ yirusiloj ri Ruxlabal ri Ajaf richin ninbij chive.
7.16: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok yin Nefi xinbij re chʼabel reʼ chique ri nunimal, rijeʼ xeʼoyover cʼa viqʼuin. Cʼariʼ xinquiyut riqʼuin ri quikʼaʼ roma cʼa janíla xeʼoyover. Cʼariʼ, xinquixim riqʼuin jun coloʼ y xcajoʼ xinquicamisaj richin xinquiyaʼ can pa tolan ruvachʼulef, richin queriʼ xinquitij ta cʼa ri e aj pa kʼayis chicopiʼ.
7.17: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xichʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf, y quereʼ xinbij chire: O Ajaf, roma ri nucukubabel cʼuʼx aviqʼuin, quinacoloʼ cʼa pa quikʼaʼ ri nunimal. Tayaʼ cʼa vachukʼaʼ richin yitiquir ninrokʼochʼij re coloʼ reʼ achojiqʼuin in ximon vi.
7.18: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa tok xinbij re chʼabel reʼ, xequiritej el ri ximibel pa nukʼaʼ y pa vaken. Cʼariʼ xipaʼeʼ chiquivech ri nunimal y xichʼo chic quiqʼuin rijeʼ.
7.19: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xeʼoyover chic jun bey viqʼuin y xcajoʼ chic xinquichop. Vaveʼ cʼa jun chique ri rumiʼal ri Ismael, riqʼuin ri ruteʼ, y chukaʼ jun chique ri rucʼajol ri Ismael, can xechʼo vi quiqʼuin ri nunimal. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xchʼuchʼujir ri cánima y xqʼuis ri quirayibal richin yinquicamisaj.
7.20: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xebison roma ri itzel ri xquiben y xexuqueʼ chinuvech. Chiriʼ cʼa, rijeʼ can xquicʼutuj vi chuve chi yencuy cʼa roma ri xquiben chuve.
7.21: Cʼa cʼariʼ, can xencuy vi cʼa roma ronojel ri xquiben chuve. Chukaʼ xenpixabaj chi quechʼo cʼa akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf qui Dios richin chi rijaʼ xquerucuy cʼa chukaʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ rijeʼ xquiben queriʼ. Tok e chʼovinek chic akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf, xkachop chic el binen cʼa acuchi cʼo vi ri rumoʼc ri katataʼ.
7.22: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin, quiqʼuin ri nunimal, y conojel ri e aj pa rachoch ri Ismael xojapon ka pa ri rumoʼc ri nataʼ. Ja cʼariʼ tok rijeʼ xquimatioxij chire ri Ajaf qui Dios. Cʼa cʼariʼ xquiben camelabel sujubel y poron sujubel chire.

16.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa tok in chʼovinek chic quiqʼuin ri nunimal, rijeʼ quereʼ xquibij chuve: Rat e akʼalajirisan chikavech cʼayef tak naʼoj. Roj xa man yojtiquir ta yekacochʼ.
16.2: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xinbij cʼa chique chi can kitzij vi ri xintzijoj. Vetaman cʼa chi re tzij reʼ can cʼayef vi chique ri e itzel. Xinbij cʼa chi nuyaʼon quikʼij ri e choj, y nujiquiban chi can xqueyac vi chupan ri ruqʼuisibel kʼij. Cʼariʼ cʼa, ri e cʼo quimac niquinojij chi xa cʼayef ri kitzij, roma cʼa ri kitzij yerusoc rijeʼ, cʼa pa ri quicʼuʼx.
16.3: Vacami cʼa rix nunimal, vi ta ix choj, man ta chic xquixxebeloj chirij ri kitzij. Man ta chic xtiben queriʼ vi ta xtivajoʼ xtinimaj ri kitzij y xquixbiyin ta choj chuvech ri Dios. Vi ta queriʼ xtiben, man ta xtibij cʼa chuve quereʼ: Xa cʼayef ri nabij chike.
16.4: Cʼa cʼariʼ, yin Nefi xenpixabaj ri nunimal chi quequitakej cʼa ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf.
16.5: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xquichʼuchʼujirisaj ri cánima chuvech ri Ajaf. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xiquicot y xinvoyobej pa vánima chi xquebiyin ta chupan ri chojmilej tak bey.
16.6: Ronojel cʼareʼ xebitej y xebanatej tok ri nataʼ cʼo pa jun moʼc pa ri liʼan ruvachʼulef ri xubiniʼaj Lemuel.
16.7: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi xicʼuleʼ riqʼuin jun chique ri rumiʼal ri Ismael. Chukaʼ ri nunimal xecʼuleʼ quiqʼuin ri rumiʼal ri Ismael. Ri Zoram xcʼuleʼ cʼa riqʼuin ri nimalaxel rumiʼal ri Ismael.
16.8: Que cʼariʼ, ri nataʼ xerutakej conojel ri rupixaʼ ri e ruyaʼon can ri Ajaf chire. Ri Ajaf chukaʼ janíla xiruturusaj yin Nefi.
16.9: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf xchʼo riqʼuin ri nataʼ chakʼaʼ. Jariʼ tok xubij chire chi tuchapaʼ binen chic jun bey pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef pa rucaʼn kʼij.
16.10: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri nataʼ xyacatej pa nimakʼaʼ. Xbe pa ruchiʼ ri rumoʼc y xutzʼet pa ri ulef jun sirisic cʼakoʼj chʼichʼ can utz rubaniquil. Chupan ri sirisic chʼichʼ riʼ e cʼo caʼiʼ kʼijubel. Jun chique ri kʼijubel riʼ xucʼut ri bey chikavech acuchi yojbe vi pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
16.11: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xekamol ronojel ri xquekacʼuaj cʼa el pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Xekamol chukaʼ ri chʼakaʼ chic ri e cʼatzinel chike ri ruyaʼon pe ri Ajaf. Chukaʼ xekamol ronojel ruvech ijatz richin chi yekacʼuaj el pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
16.12: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xekacʼuaj el ri kamoʼc y xkacʼovisaj ri raken yaʼ Laman y xojbe pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
16.13: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbiyin cajiʼ kʼij pa ri rajxokon kʼij y ri rajxokon relabal kʼij. Cʼariʼ, xkaben chic ri kamoʼc y xkayaʼ ri rubiʼ ri cʼojlibel riʼ Xazer.
16.14: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xekacʼuaj el ri kachʼab y ri kacʼakbal chʼab. Cʼariʼ, xojbe pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef chiquicamisaxic e aj pa kʼayis chicopiʼ richin queriʼ cʼo tiʼij niquitij ri kachinamit. Tok kilon cʼa chic ri tiʼij quichin ri kachinamit, xojtzolin chic jun bey pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef cʼa pa ri cʼojlibel rubiniʼan Xazer. Cʼa cʼariʼ xkachop chic binen y xkachojmij kabey junan riqʼuin ri kabanon can. Queriʼ cʼa xojbiyin acuchi cʼo vi ri samajibel ulef. Ri ulef ri cʼo chuchiʼ ri cʼulbaʼt chunakaj ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ.
16.15: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbiyin qʼuiy kʼij. Xekacamisaj cʼa chicopiʼ pa bey richin nikatij. Xekacamisaj cʼa quiqʼuin ri kachʼab y ri kabej y ri kiquiekʼ.
16.16: Xkatzekelbej cʼa ri bey ri xucʼut ri sirisic chʼichʼ chikavech. Jariʼ xucʼuan kichin pa ri janíla samajibel ulef chupan ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
16.17: Tok xojbiyin chic qʼuiy kʼij, xkaben cʼa ri kamoʼc richin chi yojuxlan jun caʼiʼ oxiʼ kʼij y nikil tiʼij quichin ri kachinamit.
16.18: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi xibe chucanoxic tiʼij. Jariʼ tok xinkʼej ri nucʼakbal chʼab ri banon riqʼuin utzilej chʼichʼ. Chiriʼ cʼa, ri nunimal xeʼoyover viqʼuin roma xkʼaj ri nucʼakbal chʼab y man xkil ta chic pe tiʼij.
16.19: Ja cʼariʼ tok xojtzolin quiqʼuin ri kachinamit y manek tiʼij kacʼuan. Rijeʼ e cosinek chic roma ri quibinen, y roma cʼariʼ tok janíla xquitij pokon, roma manek chic tiʼij richin niquitij.
16.20: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Laman y ri Lemuel y ri rucʼajol ri Ismael janíla xexebeloj roma xquitij pokon y cʼayeval pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Ri nataʼ chukaʼ xebeloj chirij ri Ajaf ru Dios. Chiriʼ cʼa, conojel janíla xebison y janíla xaxebeloj chirij ri Ajaf.
16.21: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi in chʼolin coma ri nunimal, roma xkʼaj ri nucʼakbal. Ri quicʼakbal chʼab rijeʼ man can ta chic cʼo cuchukʼaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ tok nim ri cʼayeval xkacʼulvachij y man xojtiquir ta chic nikil tiʼij.
16.22: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri nunimal xquicovirisaj chic ri cánima y janíla xexebeloj chic chirij ri Ajaf qui Dios. Roma cʼariʼ, yin Nefi janíla xichʼo quiqʼuin.
16.23: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi xinben jun cʼakbel chʼab riqʼuin cheʼ. Riqʼuin jun chojilej cheʼ xinben chukaʼ jun nuchʼab. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xinchop jun nuchʼab riqʼuin ri rucʼakbal y chukaʼ jun viquiekʼ quiqʼuin tak abej. Ja cʼariʼ tok xincʼutuj quereʼ chire ri nataʼ: ¿Acuchi cʼa xquibe vi richin xtinvil tiʼij?
16.24: Xcʼulvachitej chi rijeʼ xquichʼuchʼujirisaj quicʼuʼx roma ri xinbij chique. Roma cʼa qʼuiy xinbij chique riqʼuin ri ruchukʼaʼ ri vánima. Ja cʼariʼ tok ri nataʼ xucʼutuj chire ri Ajaf acuchi xquibe vi yin.
16.25: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf xpe riqʼuin ri nataʼ. Ri Ajaf can xuchʼolij vi cʼa rijaʼ roma xebeloj chirij ri Ajaf. Roma cʼariʼ, ri nataʼ janíla xbison.
16.26: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf quereʼ xubij chire: Tatzuʼ cʼa ri sirisic chʼichʼ y tatzʼetaʼ cʼa ri tzʼiban can chuvech.
16.27: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri nataʼ xutzʼet achique ri tzʼiban chuvech ri sirisic chʼichʼ, jariʼ tok janíla xuxibij riʼ y xcʼaracʼot. Queriʼ chukaʼ xquiben ri nunimal y ri rucʼajol ri Ismael y ri kixjayilal.
16.28: Cʼa cʼariʼ, yin Nefi xintzʼet chi ri kʼijubel ri e cʼo chupan ri sirisic chʼichʼ xesamej cʼa, achiʼel ri xkacukubaʼ kacʼuʼx chi utzil y xkatakej ri xquicʼut chikavech.
16.29: Chukaʼ cʼo jun cʼacʼaʼ tzʼibanic ri xtzʼibex chuvech y man cʼayef ta ri rutzʼetic. Ri tzʼibanic riʼ xojrutijoj chique ri rubeyal ri Ajaf. Binakel cʼa xjalatej ri tzʼibanic riʼ achiʼel cʼa ri xkacukubaʼ kacʼuʼx chi utzil riqʼuin. Quereʼ cʼa nikatzʼet chi riqʼuin achique xa chʼutiʼn oc, ri Ajaf nitiquir yeruben nimaʼk tak banobel.
16.30: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi xibe akʼanij pa ruviʼ jun juyuʼ, achiʼel cʼa xukʼalajirisaj ri sirisic chʼichʼ,
16.31: Chiriʼ cʼa xencamisaj e aj pa kʼayis chicopiʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xinvil tiʼij quichin ri kachinamit.
16.32: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xitzolin pa kamoʼc. E nucʼuan cʼa ri chicopiʼ ri xencamisaj. Tok xquitzʼet cʼa chi vilon tiʼij, can janíla vi xequicot. Jariʼ tok xquichʼuchʼujirisaj quiʼ chuvech ri Ajaf y xquimatioxij chire.
16.33: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xkachop chic binen. Xkachojmij chic ri kabey junan riqʼuin ri kabanon can pa ri rutiquiribel. Tok xojbiyin chic qʼuiy kʼij, xkaben jun bey chic ri kamoʼc richin oj cʼo can jun caʼiʼ oxiʼ kʼij chiriʼ.
16.34: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ismael xcom y xmukutej pa ri cʼojlibel rubiniʼan Najom.
16.35: Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri rumiʼal ri Ismael janíla xeʼokʼ roma xcom ri quitataʼ. Chukaʼ xeʼokʼ roma ri quicʼayeval pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Xexebeloj cʼa chirij ri nataʼ roma rijaʼ xerelesaj pe chupan ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem, y quereʼ xquibij: Xcom ri katataʼ. Roj janíla chic oj biyajinek cʼa pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Kacʼovisan qʼuiy rucʼayeval y vayijal. Chakirinek kachiʼ y oj cosinek. Riqʼuin cʼa ronojel re pokonal reʼ, xkojcom cʼa pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef roma ri vayijal.
16.36: Can que vi riʼ xexebeloj chirij ri nataʼ y chukaʼ chuvij yin. Rijeʼ xquirayij cʼa yetzolin chic pa Jerusalem.
16.37: Ri Laman quereʼ xubij chire ri Lemuel y chique ri rucʼajol ri Ismael: Tikacamisaj cʼa ri katataʼ y chukaʼ ri kachakʼ Nefi. Rijaʼ rutijon rukʼij richin chi noc katijonel y ri ucʼuey kabey. Xa jacʼa roj ri oj nimalaxelaʼ chuvech rijaʼ.
16.38: Rijaʼ nubij chi ri Ajaf chʼovinek riqʼuin y chukaʼ chi ri takonaxelaʼ quisamajin pe rijaʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, roj ketaman chi xa nutzʼuc tzij chikavech. Nubij chike ronojel reʼ y qʼuiy nuben riqʼuin ri novinek runaʼoj richin yojrukʼol. Nunojij cʼa chi riqʼuin jubaʼ xkojrucʼuaj el pa jun ruvachʼulef man etaman ta. Tok oj rucʼuan chic el chiriʼ, nunojij chi xtunimirisaj riʼ richin queriʼ xtoc ri tataʼal pa kaviʼ y ri ucʼuey kabey. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xtuben ta chike xabachique ri nurayij y ri nikaʼ cʼa chuvech. Ja queriʼ cʼa ri nunimal Laman xubij chique, richin chi xoyover ri cánima.
16.39: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf cʼo kiqʼuin. Kitzij cʼa chi ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf xpe quiqʼuin y qʼuiy xubij chique. Rijaʼ janíla xeruchʼolij. Tok rijeʼ e chʼolin chic roma ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf, man xeʼoyover ta chic. Xtzolin cʼa quicʼuʼx chupan ri quimac. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf xojruturusaj chic richin xkil tiʼij richin queriʼ man xojcom ta.

17.1: Xcʼulvachitej chi xkachop chic binen pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Cʼariʼ cʼa, xojbe jubaʼ pa relebal kʼij. Xojbiyin cʼa y xekacʼovisaj e qʼuiy cʼayeval pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Ri kixjayilal xecalaj alcʼualaʼ pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
17.2: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri Ajaf janíla xojruturusaj. Stapeʼ cʼa xojilix riqʼuin rex tiʼij, ri kixjayilal utz ruyaʼal quitzʼum xquiyaʼ chique ri cal. Ri ixokiʼ xecʼojeʼ cuchukʼaʼ, achiʼel cʼa ri achiʼaʼ. Xquichop cʼa quicochʼic ri binen y man xexebeloj ta.
17.3: Quereʼ cʼa nikatzʼet chi cʼo chi yetakex ri rupixaʼ ri Dios. Vi ri vinakiʼ yequitakej ri rupixaʼ ri Dios, rijaʼ yerilij cʼa y nuyaʼ ri cuchukʼaʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, yetiquir niquiben ri achique rubin can chique. Quereʼ cʼa, rijaʼ xuyaʼ ri cʼatzinel chike roj tok xojbiyin pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
17.4: Xojbiyin pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef vakxakiʼ junaʼ.
17.5: Cʼa cʼariʼ, xojapon pa ri ruvachʼulef achojche xkayaʼ rubiʼ Janíla Nivachin. Quereʼ xkabij chire roma e cʼo qʼuiy jalajoj cheʼ ri yevachin, y chukaʼ aj pa kʼayis cab. Roj xkatzʼet cʼa ri nimalej yaʼ y jareʼ ri rubiʼ xkayaʼ chire Ireantum, ri nel chi tzij, e qʼuiy tak yaʼ.
17.6: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xkaben kamoʼc chuchiʼ ri nimalej yaʼ. Roj can janíla vi xekacʼovisaj can qʼuiy pokonal y cʼayeval, y man yojtiquir ta yekatzʼibaj conojel vaveʼ. Man riqʼuin ta ri cʼayeval riʼ, can janíla vi xojquicot tok xojapon chuchiʼ ri nimalej yaʼ. Xkayaʼ cʼa rubiʼ ri cʼojlibel riʼ Janíla Nivachin, roma cʼa can qʼuiy vi ruvech cheʼ e cʼo chiriʼ.
17.7: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa tok xojcʼojeʼ chic qʼuiy kʼij pa ri ruvachʼulef Janíla Nivachin, ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf xpe viqʼuin y quereʼ xubij chuve: Cayacatej y cabiyin akʼanij pa ri juyuʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xiyacatej y xibe akʼanij pa ri juyuʼ y xichʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf riqʼuin ronojel ri vánima.
17.8: Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf xchʼo viqʼuin y quereʼ xubij chuve: Rat xtaben jun nimalej jucuʼ, achiʼel cʼa ri xtincʼut chavech. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xquencʼuaj el ri avinak pa jucʼan chic ruchiʼ re yaʼ reʼ.
17.9: Cʼariʼ, yin xinbij chire: Ajaf, ¿acuchi xquibe vi richin xtinvil y xtinvelesaj ri chʼichʼ richin xquenben ri samajibel? Riqʼuin ri samajibel riʼ, xtinben ri nimalej jucuʼ, achiʼel cʼa acʼutun chic chinuvech.
17.10: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf xubij chuve acuchi xqueʼnvilaʼ vi ri chʼichʼ achojiqʼuin xquenben vi ri samajibel.
17.11: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi xinben jun xupibel kʼakʼ riqʼuin ri quitzʼumal ri aj pa kʼayis chicopiʼ. Jareʼ cʼa ri nixupun ri kʼakʼ. Tok nubanon chic ri ruxupibel kʼakʼ riʼ, xentochʼlaʼ cʼa caʼiʼ abej richin xinben ri kʼakʼ.
17.12: Rubanon can, tok xojbiyin pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, ri Ajaf man xuyaʼ ta chike richin xkabox qʼuiy kʼakʼ. Rijaʼ xubij cʼa quereʼ: Yin xtinben chi ri tiʼij utz xtinaʼ chire, y man xtisaʼ ta na.
17.13: Chukaʼ yin xquinoc ri isakil pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Xtinchojmirisaj cʼa ri ibey chivech vi yeʼitakej ri nupixaʼ. Riqʼuin cʼareʼ, vi yeʼitakej ri nupixaʼ, xquixincʼuaj cʼa pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can. Cʼariʼ, rix can xtivetamaj vi chi ja yin in ucʼuayon ri ibey.
17.14: Kitzij cʼa chi ri Ajaf xubij chukaʼ quereʼ: Tok ix apovinek chic pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can, xtivetamaj chi yin ri Ajaf, ri in Dios. Chukaʼ xtivetamaj chi xixincol pa ri ivulatajic tok xixinvelesaj pe pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem.
17.15: Roma cʼariʼ, tok yin Nefi xintij nukʼij richin yentakej ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf. Xenpixabaj cʼa ri nunimal chi tiquicukubaʼ cʼa quicʼuʼx y tiquitijaʼ quikʼij chi utzil.
17.16: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xinvelesaj chʼichʼ pa jun abej, y xenben samajibel chire.
17.17: Tok ri nunimal xquitzʼet cʼa chi xinbebanaʼ jun nimalej jucuʼ, xexebeloj cʼa chuvij y quereʼ xquibij: Ri kachakʼ xa chʼuʼj. Nunojij cʼa chi rijaʼ nitiquir nuben jun nimalej jucuʼ. Rijaʼ nunojij chukaʼ chi nitiquir nucʼovisaj re nimalej yaʼreʼ.
17.18: Que cʼareʼ, ri nunimal xexebeloj chuvij. Can man xquirayij ta vi xesamej viqʼuin. Rijeʼ man xquinimaj ta cʼa chi yin yitiquir ninben jun nimalej jucuʼ. Man xquinimaj ta chukaʼ chi ja ri Ajaf ri cʼutuyon rubanic chinuvech.
17.19: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi janíla xibison roma ri rucovil ri cánima rijeʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, tok xquitzʼet chi xibison, rijeʼ yalan xequicot y quereʼ xquibij chuve: Roj ketaman chi rat man xatiquir ta xaben jun nimalej jucuʼ. Ketaman cʼa chi man can ta utz ri anojibal. Roma cʼariʼ tok man yatiquir ta naben jun nimalej samaj quereʼ.
17.20: Rat xa at junan riqʼuin ri katataʼ ri nunimaj ri moxilej runojibal ri ránima. Rijaʼ oj relesan pe pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem y xojbiyin pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef qʼuiy junaʼ. Tok ri kixjayilal xquicʼut chi yebeʼalan, cʼa xesamej na janíla. Chukaʼ xecalaj alcʼualaʼ pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, y xequitij conojel ruvech pokonal. Xaxe ri camic man xquicʼovisaj ta. Janíla ta utz vi ta xecom tok manjani queʼel pe pa Jerusalem y man ta xequicʼovisaj conojel re cʼayeval reʼ.
17.21: Can kitzij vi chi qʼuiy junaʼ katijon pokonal pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Pa re junaʼ reʼxojtiquir ta xojquicot quiqʼuin ri kabeyomal y ri ulef ri xkichinaj. Riqʼuin ta riʼ, janíla ta xojquicot.
17.22: Roj ketaman cʼa chi ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo pa Jerusalem can e choj vi. Rijeʼ yequitakej ri pixabanic, y ri kʼatoj tzij, y conojel ri pixaʼ richin ri Ajaf, achiʼel cʼa nubij ri rupixaʼ ri Moisés. Roma cʼariʼ tok ketaman chi rijeʼ e choj tak vinakiʼ. Ri katataʼ xa xeretzelaj cʼa rijeʼ y oj relesan pe roj roma xekanimaj ri ruchʼabel rijaʼ. Can kitzij vi cʼa chi ri kachakʼ xa junan riqʼuin rijaʼ. Can que vi cʼareʼ ri quichʼabel ri nunimal tok rijeʼ xexebeloj y xetzijon ka chikij.
17.23: Cʼa cʼariʼ, yin Nefi xitzijon quiqʼuin y quereʼ xinbij chique: Ri ojer tak kateʼ katataʼ je rijeʼ ri e ralcʼual ri Israel, y can xeʼelesex vi el pa quikʼaʼ ri e aj Egipto. ¿La ninojij chi xeʼelesex ta el vi man ta xequinimaj ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf?
17.24: ¿La ninojij cami chi xeʼoskʼopix ta el vi ri Ajaf man ta xubij cʼa chire ri Moisés chi xerelesaj el chiriʼ pa ri quipokonal?
17.25: Rix ivetaman cʼa chi ri ralcʼual ri Israel xetzʼapix can. Ivetaman chukaʼ chi rijeʼ xbalix cʼayevilej tak samaj chiquij. Roma cʼariʼ, ivetaman rix chi can utz vi chique tok xeʼelesex el chupan ri quikʼaxomal.
17.26: Ivetaman cʼa chi ri Ajaf xubij chire ri Moisés chi tubanaʼ ri nimalej samaj riʼ. Ivetaman cʼa chukaʼ chi roma ri ruchʼabel rijaʼ, ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ xuchʼer riʼ quereʼ y quelaʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, can cof vi xuben ri bey y ri ralcʼual ri Israel xekʼax apon pa jucʼan chic ruchiʼ yaʼ.
17.27: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri e aj Egipto, ri e royovanelaʼ ri Faraón, can xejikʼ vi can chupan ri Nimalej Quiek Yaʼ.
17.28: Chukaʼ cʼa, ivetaman chi ri ralcʼual ri Israel xeʼilix riqʼuin ri mana pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
17.29: Chukaʼ ivetaman cʼa chi ri Moisés xuchʼey ri abej, riqʼuin ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Dios ri cʼo riqʼuin. Ja cʼariʼ tok xel pe ri yaʼ y ri ralcʼual ri Israel xquikum.
17.30: Rijeʼ xucʼuex cʼa quibey roma ri Ajaf ri qui Dios y ri Lokʼolej Quelesanel. Rijaʼ xnabiyej chiquivech y xeruyukej pa kʼij y xuyaʼ sakil chique chakʼaʼ. Xeruyaʼ cʼa chique rijeʼ ronojel ri cʼatzinel chique ri vinakiʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, rijeʼ xquicovirisaj quicʼuʼx y xmoyir ri quinojibal. Cʼariʼ, xquipabaʼ quiʼ chuvech ri Moisés y chuvech ri kitzij y ri cʼaslic Dios.
17.31: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi riqʼuin ri ruchʼabel, ri Ajaf xeruvulaj. Chukaʼ riqʼuin ri ruchʼabel, rijaʼ xeruyukej. Xa riqʼuin cʼa ri ruchʼabel, ronojel xeruben rijaʼ chique. Man ta ri ruchʼabel rijaʼ, can man ta jun vi xbanatej.
17.32: Tok xquicʼovisaj can ri raken yaʼ rubiniʼan Jordán, rijaʼ xuyaʼ nim cuchukʼaʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, rijeʼ xecokotej el ri e cʼo chupan ri ruvachʼulef riʼ, y xequiquiraj el, xa cʼa tok xevulatej el jumul.
17.33: Ri vinakiʼ riʼ ri e cʼo cʼa chupan ri ruvachʼulef riʼ ri sujun can, xeʼokotex el coma ri ojer tak kateʼ katataʼ. ¿La ninojij cami cʼa rix chi ri vinakiʼ riʼ can e choj vi? Kitzij ninbij chive chi xa man e que ta riʼ.
17.34: ¿La ninojij rix chi vi ta e choj rijeʼ, ri kateʼ katataʼ roj cʼa janíla ta cami xeturusex chiquivech rijeʼ? Yin ninbij chive chi man que ta riʼ.
17.35: Can kitzij vi chi ri Ajaf junan yerutzʼet conojel. Ri Dios nuturusaj cʼa ri vinek ri choj. Vaveʼ cʼa, ri vinakiʼ riʼ xequixovaj conojel ri ruchʼabel ri Dios y e chʼakʼirinek chic pa quetzelal. Romariʼ, chinojel ri royoval ri Dios xkaka pa quiviʼ. Ri Ajaf xretzelaj ri ruvachʼulef chique rijeʼ, y xuturusaj chique ri ojer tak kateʼ katataʼ. Can xretzelaj vi, xa cʼa pa quivulatajic. Y xuturusaj ri ruvachʼulef chique ri kateʼ katataʼ richin xquichinaj.
17.36: Ri Ajaf rubanon ri ruvachʼulef richin e cʼo ri vinakiʼ chuvech. Xeruben cʼa ri ralcʼual rijaʼ richin queriʼ xa je cʼa rijeʼ ri e cʼo chuvech.
17.37: Rijaʼ nuqʼuiytisaj cʼa jun chojmilej tinamit y yeruvulaj ri quitinamit ri man e choj ta.
17.38: Rijaʼ yeruyukej cʼa ri e choj pa jebelilej tak ruvachʼulef. Chukaʼ yeruvulaj ri e itzel y nretzelaj ri ruvachʼulef chiquivech.
17.39: Rijaʼ nikʼaton tzij, cʼanej akʼanij pa ri caj. Ja ri caj ri lokʼolej rutzʼuyulibal y re ruvachʼulef reʼ jariʼ ri ruxlanibel ri raken.
17.40: Rijaʼ yerajoʼ ri niquibij chi ja rijaʼ ri qui Dios. Can kitzij vi, rijaʼ xerajoʼ ri ojer tak kateʼ katataʼ y xucʼul riʼ quitzij quiqʼuin rijeʼ. Jacʼa quiqʼuin ri Abraham, ri Isaac, y ri Jacob. Rijaʼ xunataj cʼa ri cʼulanen tzij ri xuben quiqʼuin rijeʼ. Roma cʼariʼ tok xerelesaj el pa ri ruvachʼulef Egipto.
17.41: Rijaʼ xeruchʼolij riqʼuin ri rucheʼ pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, roma rijeʼ xquicovirisaj ri cánima achiʼel cʼa ri ibanon rix. Ri Ajaf xeruchʼolij cʼa roma ri quetzelal. Rijaʼ xerutek cʼa pe kʼakʼel aj xicʼ tak cumetz quiqʼuin rijeʼ. Tok xequitiʼ, rijaʼ xuchojmirisaj jun rubeyal achojiqʼuin yeʼutzir vi chic. Cʼa cʼariʼ, can xaxe vi nicʼatzin chi niquitzuʼ. Roma jariʼ xa choj y man cʼayef ta, roma riʼ e qʼuiy xecom.
17.42: Binakel cʼa xquicovirisaj ri cánima y xquipabaʼ quiʼ chuvech ri Moisés y chukaʼ chuvech ri Dios. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, rix ivetaman chi xucʼuex quibey roma ri janíla nim ruchukʼaʼ rijaʼ, cʼa pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.
17.43: Vacami cʼa cʼulvachitajinek can ronojel reʼ, y apovinek chic ri kʼij tok rijeʼ niquiben ri itzel. Kitzij cʼa chi rijeʼ e chʼakʼirinek chic pan etzelal. Man vetaman ta cʼa vi chupan re kʼij reʼ rijeʼ xa jubaʼ chic man xquevulatej. Ri kʼij can xtapon vi tok xquevulatej conojel rijeʼ. Xaxe e jubaʼ chique xqueʼucʼuex el pa chapitajic.
17.44: Roma cʼariʼ, tok ri Ajaf xubij chire ri nataʼ chi tibe cʼa pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Ri e aj Judá xcajoʼ ta cʼa xquicamisaj rijaʼ. Rix chukaʼ itijon ikʼij richin nicamisaj rijaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, rix xa ix camisanelaʼ pan ivánima. Ix junan cʼa quiqʼuin ri e aj Judá.
17.45: Can chaʼnin vi niben ri itzel, y janíla ekal nokaʼ cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx ri Ajaf i Dios. Rix itzʼeton chic jun takonaxel y rijaʼ xchʼo iviqʼuin. E cʼo bey tok ivacʼaxan ri ruchʼabel. Rijaʼ chʼovinek iviqʼuin riqʼuin jun ti chʼabel chʼutiʼn y quiʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, rix xa sachinek chic ri inaʼoj y man xixtiquir ta xinaʼ ri ruchʼabel. Roma cʼariʼ, rijaʼ chʼovinek chic iviqʼuin riqʼuin jun chʼabel achiʼel ri cokolajay. Ja chʼabel riʼ ri xusiloj ri ruvachʼulef, achiʼel vi ta can nuchʼer vi ri ruvachʼulef.
17.46: Chukaʼ ivetaman chi rijaʼ nitiquir nuben chi niqʼuis el jumul chijun re ruvachʼulef. Quereʼ nuben riqʼuin ri ruchukʼaʼ ri ruchʼabel ronojel tiquirel. Riqʼuin cʼa ri ruchʼabel, nitiquir nuben chi ri sivan tak cʼojlibel yeʼoc liʼan, y chi ri liʼan tak cʼojlibel yepeqʼuepoxin. ¿Achique cʼa roma tok janíla cof ri ivánima rix?
17.47: Can kitzij vi chi socon ri vánima ivoma rix, y ri nucʼuʼx nikʼaxon. Ninxibij viʼ chi xquixtorix el jurayil. Can in nojinek vi riqʼuin ri Ruxlabal ri Dios, xa cʼa acuchi ri nuchʼacul manek chic ri ruchukʼaʼ.
17.48: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok e nubin can re chʼabel reʼ, rijeʼ xeʼoyover cʼa viqʼuin, y xcajoʼ ta xinquitorij ka cʼanej chupan ri nimalej yaʼ. Cʼariʼ, xejel pe viqʼuin chinuchapic. Chiriʼ cʼa xichʼo quiqʼuin y quereʼ xinbij: Pa rubiʼ ri Dios Ronojel Tiquirel, ninbij cʼa chive chi man quinichop. Yin in nojinek cʼa riqʼuin ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Dios, cʼa acuchi man nucochʼ ta chic ri nuchʼacul. Xabachique cʼa ri xtichapon vichin, xa can xtichaker vi cʼa, achiʼel jun kʼayis tok chakirinek chic. Can manjun vi rukʼij chuvech ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Dios, roma ri Dios xtusoc.
17.49: Cʼa cʼariʼ, yin Nefi xinbij chique chi man quexebeloj chic chirij ri quitataʼ. Chukaʼ xinbij chique chi can rucʼamon vi chi yinquitoʼ, roma cʼa ja ri Dios xubij chuve chi tinbanaʼ cʼa jun nimalej jucuʼ.
17.50: Chukaʼ quereʼ xinbij chique: Vi ta Dios nubij cʼa chuve chi tinbanaʼ ronojel, xa yitiquir ta cʼa ninben. Vi ta yirutek richin ninbij chire re yaʼ reʼ, catoc ulef, can jic vi xtoc ta cʼa ulef. Vi ta queriʼ ninbij, xtibanatej ta cʼa queriʼ.
17.51: Vacami cʼa, ri Ajaf cʼo nimalej ruchukʼaʼ. Rijaʼ e rubanon can e qʼuiy nimalej tak samaj chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ. ¿Achique cami cʼa roma tok man nitiquir ta nucʼut chinuvech yin richin ninben jun nimalej jucuʼ?
17.52: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi qʼuiy xinbij chique ri nunimal. Riqʼuin vi riʼ, xsach cʼa quicʼuʼx y man xetiquir ta chic xetojoj chuvij. Chukaʼ xquixibij quiʼ qʼuiy kʼij, y man xinquichop ta riqʼuin ri quikʼaʼ, y man xinquinek ta riqʼuin ri ruviʼ quikʼaʼ. Xquixibij cʼa quiʼ richin man que ta riʼ xquiben chuve yin, roma xa xechaker ta cʼa chinuvech. Ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Ruxlabal ri Dios can nim vi, y can que vi riʼ xuben quiqʼuin rijeʼ.
17.53: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Ajaf quereʼ xubij chuve: Tayukuʼ cʼa chic ri akʼaʼ chique ri animal. Cʼa cʼariʼ, man xquechaker ta chavech. Xa yin xquentotaj cʼa rijeʼ, xchaʼ ri Ajaf. Quereʼ cʼa xtinben chique richin xtiquetamaj chi ja yin ri Ajaf ri in qui Dios.
17.54: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin xinyuk ri nukʼaʼ chique ri nunimal, y man xechaker ta chinuvech. Xa ri Ajaf xerutotaj cʼa, achiʼel ruchʼabel ri xubij can.
17.55: Vacami cʼa, rijeʼ quereʼ xquibij chuve: Roj can ketaman vi cʼa chi ri Ajaf cʼo aviqʼuin. Ketaman cʼa chi ja ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Ajaf ri xojrutotaj. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xetzak ka chinuvech richin xquiyaʼ nukʼij. Chiriʼ cʼa, yin man xinyaʼ ta kʼij chique richin queriʼ xquiben, y xinbij cʼa chique: Yin xa in ichakʼ rix. Roma cʼariʼ, xa tiyaʼ cʼa rukʼij ri Ajaf i Dios, y tiyalaʼ cʼa quikʼij ri iteʼ itataʼ, richin queriʼ xqueyalojisex ta ri kʼij chive rix chuvech re ruvachʼulef ri xtuyaʼ ri Ajaf i Dios chive.

18.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xquiyaʼ rukʼij ri Ajaf. Cʼariʼ, xepe viqʼuin y xkasamajij cʼa ri cheʼ y can man etaman ta vi ri rutzil xkaben. Cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf binakel xucʼut chinuvech achique ninben chire ri rajajxic ri cheʼ richin ri nimalej jucuʼ.
18.2: Vacami cʼa, yin Nefi man xensamajij ta ri cheʼ achiʼel ri niquiben ri achiʼaʼ. Chukaʼ man xinben ta ri nimalej jucuʼ achiʼel ri rubanic ri quetaman ri achiʼaʼ. Yin xinben cʼa chire achiʼel ri rubanic ri xucʼut ri Ajaf chinuvech. Roma cʼariʼ, xa man junan ta ri xuben riqʼuin ri rubanic ri quetaman ri achiʼaʼ.
18.3: Binakel cʼa, yin Nefi xibe akʼanij pa ri juyuʼ y xichʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf. Ja cʼariʼ tok ri Ajaf xerucʼut chinuvech nimalej tak naʼoj.
18.4: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xinqʼuis rubanic ri nimalej jucuʼ achiʼel cʼa ri xucʼut ri Ajaf chinuvech. Jariʼ tok ri nunimal xquitzʼet chi xa utz, y chi can jebel vi ri rubanic xkaben. Roma cʼariʼ tok rijeʼ xquichʼutinirisaj chic quiʼ chuvech ri Ajaf.
18.5: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf xpe riqʼuin ri nataʼ y xubij chire chi tikanucʼuʼ kiʼ y kojoc cʼa ka chupan ri nimalej jucuʼ.
18.6: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok xsaker rucaʼn kʼij, xkanucʼ cʼa ronojel. E kamolon pe chic pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef e qʼuiy ruvech cheʼ y chukaʼ tiʼij. Chukaʼ xekamol qʼuiy aj pa kʼayis cab y chʼakaʼ chic ri e cʼatzinel chike, achiʼel cʼa ri rubin can ri Ajaf chike. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xojbe ka pa ri nimalej jucuʼ, y e kacʼuan ri kejkaʼn, y ri kijatz, y ronojel ri cʼo kiqʼuin. Chikajujunal cʼa xojoc ka pa ri nimalej jucuʼ, achiʼel cʼa ri kajunaʼ. Que cʼariʼ, xojbe ka pa ri nimalej jucuʼ konojel roj quiqʼuin ri kixjayilal y ri kalcʼual.
18.7: Ri nataʼ xeralcʼualaj cʼa caʼiʼ rucʼajol pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Ri nimalaxel rubiniʼan Jacob y ri chakʼlaxel rubiniʼan José.
18.8: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi roj konojel xojbe cʼa ka pa ri nimalej jucuʼ. Xekacʼuaj cʼa ronojel ri cʼatzinel chike y ronojel ri xubij ri Ajaf chi tikacʼuaj cʼa el kiqʼuin. Ja cʼariʼ tok xkanim el kiʼ pa ruviʼ ri nimalej yaʼ. Jacʼa ri cakʼikʼ ri xnimon el kichin, y xojruchojmij cʼa el pa rubey ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.
18.9: Xojnim cʼa el qʼuiy kʼij roma ri cakʼikʼ. Ja cʼariʼ tok ri nunimal y ri rucʼajol ri Ismael, quiqʼuin ri quixjayilal, xquichop cʼastanen. Riqʼuin cʼa itzel quinojibal, xexajon y xebixan y xetzijon. Queriʼ cʼa, rijeʼ xquimestaj cʼa ri uchukʼaʼ ri xojrucʼuaj el chiriʼ, y xquijech cʼa quiʼ pa jun itzelilej naʼoj.
18.10: Cʼariʼ, yin Nefi janíla xinxibij viʼ. Riqʼuin cʼa jubaʼ ri Ajaf xtoyover ta kiqʼuin y xkojrusoc ta cʼa roma ri ketzelal, y cʼariʼ xtojjikʼ ta ka, cʼanej chuxeʼ ri nimalej yaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, xichʼo choj quiqʼuin ri nunimal. Ja cʼariʼ tok rijeʼ xeʼoyover viqʼuin y quereʼ xquibij chuve: Roj man xtikayaʼ ta kʼij chire ri kachakʼ richin nucʼuaj kabey.
18.11: Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri Laman y ri Lemuel xinquichop y xinquixim riqʼuin coloʼ y janíla xinquipokonirisaj. Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf xuyaʼ kʼij richin xquiben queriʼ chuve, richin chi xtukʼalajirisaj cʼa ri ruchukʼaʼ. Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼa, xtukʼalajirisaj cʼa chiquivech chi xtikʼajer ri ruchʼabel chiquij ri e itzel.
18.12: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xinquixim, xa cʼa acuchi man xitiquir ta chic xisilon. Ja cʼariʼ tok ri cʼutbel bey ri xuben can ri Ajaf chike, man xsamej ta chic.
18.13: Roma cʼariʼ tok man quetaman ta chic acuchi xquiqʼuek vi rubey ri nimalwj jucuʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xpe pa kaviʼ jun nimalej camisanel job y jun nimaley y xicʼanilej cakʼikʼ. Ja cʼariʼ tok oxiʼ kʼij xojrutzolij pe riqʼuin jubaʼ xquijikʼ chupan ri yaʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, man xinquisol ta.
18.14: Chupan cʼa ri rucaj kʼij tok oj rutzolin pe ri cakʼikʼ, jariʼ tok can xicʼo vi chic ruviʼ xuben ri ruchukʼaʼ ri cakʼik.ʼ
18.15: Ja cʼariʼ tok xa jubaʼ chic xkajoʼ richin man xojjikʼ ka chuxeʼ ri yaʼ. Cajiʼ kʼij xojtzolitej cʼa chikij pa ruviʼ ri yaʼ. Ja cʼariʼ tok ri nunimal xquitzʼet chi ri cʼajisabel ri nuben ri Dios can cʼo vi pa quiviʼ rijeʼ, y vi man ta xtitzolin cʼa quicʼuʼx chupan ri itzel quibanobal, xa xquecom ta cʼa. Roma cʼariʼ tok xequisol ri ximibel ri cʼo pa ri rukul nukʼaʼ. Can kitzij vi cʼa chi janíla e sipojinek chic, y ri rukul ri vaken chukaʼ janíla xesipoj, y can janíla vi xekʼaxon.
18.16: Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, xincukubaʼ nucʼuʼx riqʼuin ri nu Dios, y xinyalaʼ cʼa rukʼij chijun kʼij. Man xixebeloj ta cʼa roma ri xintij pokon.
18.17: Ri nataʼ Leʼi qʼuiy cʼa xubij chique ri nunimal, chukaʼ chique ri rucʼajol ri Ismael. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, rijeʼ can xquixibij vi ri xabachique ri xchʼo pa nuviʼuin. Ri nteʼ nataʼ e rijixinek chic y janíla pokon xquitij coma ri calcʼual. Roma cʼariʼ tok xeyavej y cʼo chi e cʼo pa chiʼat.
18.18: Roma cʼa ri quibis y ri rukʼaxon cánima, y roma ri itzel ri quibanalon ri nunimal, rijeʼ jubaʼ man xecom y xebe ta riqʼuin ri qui Dios. Can que vi riʼ, ri saka rusumal quiviʼ rijeʼ jubaʼ chic man xkaka cʼa pa ri pokolaj. Roma cʼariʼ, jubaʼ man xekamuk can chupan ri nimalej yaʼ.
18.19: Chiriʼ cʼa, ri Jacob y ri José cʼa e alcʼualaʼ na, y cʼatzinel cʼa chique chi yeʼilix. Rijeʼ xebison cʼa roma ri pokon xutij ri quiteʼ. Chukaʼ ri vixjayil yin xokʼ, y xuben lokʼolej chʼoven riqʼuin ri Dios, y queriʼ chukaʼ xquiben ri valcʼual. Man riqʼuin vi cʼa ronojel reʼ, man xchʼuchʼujir ta ri cánima ri nunimal richin ta xinquisol.
18.20: Xa can manjun vi chic, xaxe cʼa ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Dios, ri jubaʼ man xeruvulaj rijeʼ, ja cʼariʼ ri xchʼuchʼujirisan ri cánima. Roma cʼariʼ, tok rijeʼ xquitzʼet chi xa jubaʼ man xejikʼ cʼanej chuxeʼ ri yaʼ, jariʼ tok xtzolin pe quicʼuʼx chupan ri achique xquiben chuve. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, rijeʼ xinquisol.
18.21: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok rijeʼ xinquisol, jariʼ tok xinchop ri cʼutbel bey y can xsamey vi achiʼel ri xinvajoʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xichʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf. Tok nubanon cʼa chic ri lokʼolej chʼoven riʼ, xtaneʼ cʼa ri cakʼikʼ, y xtaneʼ chukaʼ ri job, y xcʼojeʼ jun nimalej silan.
18.22: Cʼa cʼariʼ, xinqʼuek rubey ri nimalej jucuʼ, y xkachop chic binen pa ruviʼ ri yaʼ pa ruchojmil ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.
18.23: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbiyin qʼuiy kʼij pa ruviʼ ri yaʼ, xa cʼa tok xojapon pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can. Chiriʼ cʼa, xojkaka el chuvech ri ruvachʼulef, y xkaben ri kamoʼc. Cʼariʼ, xkayaʼ rubiʼ ri ruvachʼulef riʼ y xubinaiʼaj ri ruvachʼulef sujun can.
18.24: Xcʼulvachitéj cʼa chi xkachop rusmajixic ri ulef y xekatic ri kijatz kacʼuan. Xekayaʼ cʼa pan ulef conojel ri kijatz ri xekaqʼuen pe pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem. Cʼa cʼariʼ, janíla xeqʼuiyer vi. Que cʼariʼ, can janíla vi xojturusex.
18.25: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xojbiyaj pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef chupan ri ruvachʼulef sujun can. Chiriʼ cʼa, xkanabej chi e cʼo conojel ruvech chicopiʼ pa ri qʼuechelaj. Xekil ri váquix y ri achij váquix, y ronojel quivech quiej, y ri tzuntzun y ri aj pa kʼayis tzuntzun, y conojel ruvech chicopiʼ ri e cʼo pa kʼayis ri yecʼatzin chire ri achin. Chukaʼ xekil conojel ruvech chʼichʼ, ri kʼana chʼichʼ, y ri saka chʼichʼ, y ri biyul chʼichʼ.

meta.name: Ri Rucaʼn Vuj richin ri Nefi

1.intro: Reʼ nutzijoj ri rucamic ri Leʼi. Ri runimal ri Nefi niquipabaʼ quiʼ chuvech rijaʼ. Ri Ajaf nubij chire ri Nefi chi tibe el pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Reʼ yerutzijoj rubinen pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef.
1.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi yin Nefi xitaneʼ chiquitijoxic ri nunimal. Ri katataʼ Leʼi qʼuiy xutzijoj chique rijeʼ chukaʼ. Xubij chique rijeʼ ri janíla ri xuben ri Ajaf pa quiviʼ tok xerelesaj pe pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem.
1.2: Rijaʼ xtzijon cʼa chirij ri coyoval rijeʼ tok e cʼo pa ruviʼ ri yaʼ. Chukaʼ xutzijoj chi ri Dios xujoyovaj quivech tok xerucol y man xejikʼ ta chupan ri nimalej yaʼ.
1.3: Chukaʼ rijaʼ xtzijon quiqʼuin rijeʼ chirij ri ruvachʼulef sujun can ri quilon cʼa chic. Chukaʼ xubij chi ri Ajaf janíla xujoyovaj kavech tok xubij chike chi kojanimej el pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem.
1.4: Rijaʼ xubij cʼa quereʼ: Can kitzij vi, yin nutzʼeton jun tzʼetonic. Pa ri tzʼetonic riʼxinnabej chi ri Jerusalem xa vulatajinek cʼa chic. Vi ta xojcʼojeʼ can pa Jerusalem, xojcom ta cʼa roj chukaʼ.
1.5: Stapeʼ cʼa roj e kacʼovisan pokon, can xkil vi ri ruvachʼulef sujun can, xchaʼ rijaʼ. Re ruvachʼulef reʼ janíla jebel chiquivech ri chʼakaʼ chic ruvachʼulef. Ri Ajaf rubanon jun cʼulanen tzij viqʼuin yin chi jareʼ jun ruvachʼulef ri xtiquichinaj ri vijaʼtzul. Ri Ajaf rusujun cʼa re ruvachʼulef reʼ chuve yin y chique ri valcʼual benek ruvech. Chukaʼ rusujun chique ri juley chic ri xqueʼelesex pe pa chʼakaʼ chic ruvachʼulef roma ri rukʼaʼ ri Ajaf.
1.6: Roma cʼariʼ, yin Nefi ninyaʼ lokʼolej rutzijol junan riqʼuin ri nubij ri Uxlabel ri cʼo viqʼuin. Ninbij cʼa chi man xtipe ta manjun, vi man ta xticʼamer pe roma ri rukʼaʼ ri Ajaf.
1.7: Roma cʼariʼ, re ruvachʼulef reʼ turusan can chique ri xqueruqʼuen pe ri Ajaf. Vi rijeʼ xtiquisamajij cʼa ri Ajaf, achiʼel cʼa ri pixaʼ ri e ruyaʼon can rijaʼ chique, re ruvachʼulef reʼ xtoc jun ruvachʼulef richin solcolpitajic. Roma cʼariʼ tok manjun bey xqueʼucʼuex ka pa ri tzʼapitajic. Xaxe cʼa vi xtiquiben ri itzel, xqueʼucʼuex cʼa ka pa ri tzʼapitajic. Vi janíla xtiquiben cʼa ri itzel xtetzelex cʼa can re ruvachʼulef chiquivech rijeʼ. Vi rijeʼ e choj, re ruvachʼulef xtiturusex benek ruvech chique.
1.8: Can kitzij vi chi jun utzilej naʼoj banon can, richin chi ri chʼakaʼ chic tinamit man niquinabej ta re ruvachʼulef reʼ vacami. Rijeʼ xa xtiquiquiraj ta quiʼ chuvech re ruvachʼulef, cʼa tok manek chic cʼojlibel richin niquichinaj.
1.9: Que cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf Dios quereʼ rusujun can chuve yin Leʼi: Vi rijeʼ ri yeruqʼuen pe rijaʼ pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem xquequitakej ri rupixaʼ, xqueqʼuiyer cʼa chuvech re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Queriʼ cʼa, rijeʼ xquechajix chiquivech ri chʼakaʼ chic ruvachʼulef richin queriʼ xaxe cʼa quichin rijeʼ re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Vi yequitakej ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf, can xqueturusex vi cʼa chuvech re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Chiriʼ cʼa, manjun xtinakon quichin rijeʼ, ni ta chukaʼ xtimajon el ri ruvachʼulef quichinan. Utz xquecʼojeʼ cʼa can chiriʼ benek ruvech.
1.10: Cʼa cʼariʼ, tok napon cʼa ri kʼij tok nibiyin quiyojic y man niquinimalaʼ ta chic, jariʼ tok xtipe ka pa quiviʼ ri cʼajisabel ri xtuben rijaʼ ri can choj vi. Rijeʼ e quicʼulun chic qʼuiy turusanic pa rukʼaʼ ri Ajaf. Quetaman cʼa chic chirij ri rutzʼuquic re ruvachʼulef y ri quitzʼuquic conojel ri vinakiʼ. Chukaʼ quetaman cʼa chic chirij ri nimalej y meyel rusamaj ri Ajaf pa tok xtzʼucutej pe re ruvachʼulef. Chukaʼ cʼa, yaʼon chic uchukʼaʼ chique rijeʼ richin queriʼ yetiquir niquiben ronojel riqʼuin ri quicukubabel cʼuʼx. Chukaʼ conojel ri rupixaʼ, pa tok rutiquiribel pe, e cʼo quiqʼuin. Roma cʼa ri junelic rutzil ri Ajaf, rijeʼ e cʼamon vi pe pa re jebelilej ruvachʼulef sujun can. Can kitzij vi cʼa ninbij chive chi vi xtapon ri kʼij tok rijeʼ xtiquixovaj ri Lokʼolaxel richin ri Israel, ri kitzij Mesías, ri Lokʼolej Quelesanel, y ri qui Dios, jariʼ tok ri cʼajisabel ri xtuben ri jun ri can choj vi, xtipe ka pa quiviʼ.
1.11: Ja cʼariʼ tok rijaʼ xqueruqʼuen pe quiqʼuin rijeʼ chʼakaʼ chic nimalej tak tinamit. Cʼariʼ rijaʼ xtuyaʼ uchukʼaʼ chique ri e petenek, y xtumej cʼa el chiquivech ri e cʼo vaveʼ ri culef quichin ri quibeyomal. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xtuben chi xquequiratej y xquesocotej.
1.12: Tok xquecʼovisalan cʼa el e qʼuiy junaʼ, xquecʼojeʼ camisanic y nimalej vulatajic chiquicojol rijeʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, nucʼajol, ninvajoʼ chi ronojel reʼ nokaʼ cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx. Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi ninimaj ri nuchʼabel.
1.13: Ja ta cʼa quixcʼastej pa ri jun nimalej varan. Ja varan riʼ richin ri xibalbay. Ja ta cʼa queʼitotaj el ri ximibel achojiqʼuin ix ximon vi. Ja ximibel riʼ ri yequixim ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ, richin chi yeʼucʼuex el e chapon ka pa ri cʼojlibel richin ri junelic kʼaxomal y tʼujtubel cánima.
1.14: Quixcʼastej y quixyacatej pa ri pokolaj y queʼivacʼaxaj ri ruchʼabel ri jun rijilej tataʼaj ri nicʼaracʼot chic. Re tataʼaj reʼ man nej ta chic apon xticotzʼobaʼ pa ri tef y ri silan rumukubal. Chiriʼ cʼa, manjun biyajnel nitzʼolin pe chic. E jubaʼ chic kʼij apon, xtintzekelbej el ri bey quichin conojel ri e aj re ruvachʼulef.
1.15: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri Ajaf can in relesan vi pe pa ri xibalbay. Nutzʼeton cʼa rucʼojlemal rijaʼ. Ri Ajaf yirukʼetej benek ruvech riqʼuin ri rukʼa ri rajovabal.
1.16: Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi yeʼitakej ri pixabanic y ri Kʼatoj tzij richin ri Ajaf. Jareʼ cʼa ri rurayin ri vánima, pa rutiquiribel pe.
1.17: Kʼaxovinek cʼa nucʼuʼx binakel roma ri nubis. Nuxibin viʼ roma ri rucovil ivánima. Riqʼuin cʼa jubaʼ ri Ajaf ri i Dios xtipe chivij riqʼuin chinojel ri royoval rijaʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xquixelesex cʼa el y xquixvulatej cʼa jumul.
1.18: Riqʼuin cʼa jubaʼ jun etzelanic xtipe chivij rix chiquij cʼa ri iyaj mamaj ivijaʼtzul. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xquixsocotej riqʼuin ri tzaqʼuibel y xtipe ivayijal. Xquixetzelex cʼa y xquixcʼuex el, xa achiʼel cʼa ri rurayibal ri itzel vinek y ri ruchapitajic ri nuben rijaʼ.
1.19: Ja ta cʼa, nucʼajol, chi man ta xquepe ronojel reʼ chivij rix, xa ta yixoc na jun vinakul chaʼon y turusan roma ri Ajaf. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, can tiban cʼa ri rurayibal rijaʼ, roma xa choj ri rubeyal benek ruvech.
1.20: Rijaʼ rubin cʼa cʼa can quereʼ: Vi yeʼitakej cʼa ri nupixaʼ, can xquixqʼuiyer vi pa ri ruvachʼulef. Vi xa man yeʼitakej ta cʼa ri nupixaʼ, can xquixelesex vi el viqʼuin yin.
1.21: Quixyacatej cʼa pe, nucʼajol, chupan ri pokolaj y quixoc achiʼaʼ. Titijaʼ cʼa ikʼij riqʼuin jun inojibal y jun ivánima. Titunubaʼ cʼa iviʼ riqʼuin ronojel ri utz, richin chi man yixchap ta ka. Que ta reʼ, ri vánima xtiquicot ta iviqʼuin y xticʼojeʼ ta quicoten pa nucʼuʼx tok xquinel el pa re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Que ta cʼareʼ chukaʼ, man ta xquinucʼuex cʼa ka pa ri mukubel riqʼuin bis y kʼaxomal pa vánima.
1.22: Can tibanaʼ cʼa queriʼ, richin chi man ta xquixetzelex cʼa riqʼuin jun nimalej etzelanic. Quereʼ cʼa chukaʼ, man xtiqʼuen ta ka chive ri royoval ri jun Dios can choj vi, cʼa pa ri ivulatajic. Can ja vi reʼ ri jumul vulatajic quichin ri cʼaslemal y ri chʼaculaj.
1.23: Quixcʼastej cʼa nucʼajol y ticusaj ri toʼbel richin ri chojmilal. Queʼitotaj el ri ximibel achojiqʼuin ix ximon vi. Quixel pe pa ri kʼekuʼm y quixyacatej pe pa ri pokolaj.
1.24: Man tipabaʼ chic iviʼ chuvech ri ichakʼ. Janíla e jebel ri xekʼalajirisex chuvech y rijaʼ can e rutaken vi ri pixaʼ tok xojel pe pa Jerusalem. Rijaʼ oquinek jun samajibel pa ri rukʼaʼ ri Dios richin chi yojruqʼuen pe pa ri ruvachʼulef sujun can. Vi man ta xcʼoje rijaʼ, xojcom ta roma vayijal pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, rix irayin nicamisaj rijaʼ. Rijaʼ yalan xbison cʼa ivoma rix.
1.25: Janíla ninxibij viʼ y yicʼaracʼot, roma riqʼuin cʼa jubaʼ xtutij chic pokon ivoma rix. Rix ikʼaban chirij rijaʼ y ibin chi rijaʼ xucanoj ruchukʼaʼ y ri rukʼatbel tzij pan iviʼ rix. Vaveʼ cʼa, yin vetaman chi rijaʼ man rurayin ta ri uchukʼaʼ y ri kʼatbel tzij pan iviʼ rix. Rijaʼ can xaxe vi rurayin ri rucʼojliemal ri Dios y ris junelic rutzil ivech rix.
1.26: Rix ix xebelovinek chirij rijaʼ, roma can cof vi chʼovinek can iviqʼuin. Nibij chi rijaʼ cof chʼovinek chic iviqʼuin, y chi petenek chic ri royoval chivij. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xa kitzij chi ri rucovil ri rutzij rijaʼ, can ja covil riʼ richin ri ruchukʼaʼ ri ruchʼabel ri Dios ri cʼo riqʼuin. Ri achique rix nibij oyoval chire, xa can ja vi riʼ ri kitzij. Riʼ junan riqʼuin ri kitzij ri cʼo riqʼuin ri Dios. Ri ichakʼ man xtiquir ta xrevej ri kitzij riʼ tok xerukʼalajirisaj ri ivetzelal rix.
1.27: Cʼo cʼa chi ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Dios nicʼ ojeʼ riqʼuin rijaʼ, richin queriʼ yixrupixabaj cʼa chi tinimaj tzij. Vaveʼ cʼa, xa man ja ta rijaʼ ri xbanon cʼa chi xchʼo. Xa can ja vi ri Ruxlabal ri Ajaf ri cʼo riqʼuin, ri xbanon chi cʼo chi xchʼo iviqʼuin y chi man xtiquir ta xukʼil riʼ.
1.28: Vacami cʼa, yichʼo chave rat Laman, nucʼajol, y chukaʼ chive rix Lemuel y Sam y chive rix nucʼajol ri can ix rucʼajol vi ri Ismael. Vacami cʼa, vi rix ninimaj ri nubij ri Nefi, xa man xquixsach ta cʼa. Vi xtinimaj ri nubij rijaʼ, ninyaʼ cʼa can jun nuturusanic pan iviʼ. Ja cʼariʼ ri nabey nuturusanic.
1.29: Vi xa man xtinimaj ta ri nubij rijaʼ, jariʼ tok xtinvelesaj cʼa el iviqʼuin rix ri nabey nuturusanic y xticʼojeʼ cʼa can pa ruviʼ rijaʼ.
1.30: Vacami cʼa, yichʼo aviqʼuin rat, Zoram. Kitzij chi rat ri at rusamajel ri Laban. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, rat xacʼamer pe pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem. Vetaman cʼa chi rat at jun choj rachibil ri nucʼajol Nefi benek ruvech.
1.31: Rat can at choj vi. Roma cʼariʼ, ri avijaʼtzul rat xtiturusex riqʼuin ri rijaʼtzul rijaʼ. Rijeʼ xqueyaloj pa quiqʼuiyirinen chuvech re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Can xaxe vi ri itzel quibanobal xquepaban o xqueyojon richin ri quiqʼuiyirinen junelic chuvech re ruvachʼulef.
1.32: Ri Ajaf ruturusan cʼa can re ruvachʼulef reʼ, richin chi manjun xtinakon quichin ri avijaʼtzul riqʼuin ri rijaʼtzul ri nucʼajol. Roma cʼariʼ, vi yeʼatakej ri rupixaʼ ri Ajaf, can que vi riʼ xtibanatej chave.

2.1: Vacami cʼa, yichʼo aviqʼuin rat, Jacob. Ja rat at nabey valcʼual tok in cʼo chupan ri kʼij richin ri nucʼayeval pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef. Can kitzij vi chi rat acʼovisan pokon y nimalej bis pa ri avalcʼualanen. Ja cʼareʼ cʼulvachitajinek can roma ri quicovirinen ri animal.
2.2: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, Jacob, at nabey valcʼual tok in cʼo pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, rat avetaman ri nimalej rutzil richin ri Dios. Rijaʼ xtuben chi coma ri akʼaxomal, rat xtachojmirisaj aviʼ.
2.3: Roma cʼariʼ, rat xcaturusex y xcacʼojeʼ chi utzil riqʼuin ri animal Nefi. Rat xtasamajij cʼa ri Ajaf chupan ri acʼaslen. Roma cʼariʼ, yin vetaman chi rat at elesan pe pa mac roma ri ruchojmilal ri Lokʼolej Avelesanel. Rat atzʼeton cʼa chi pa ri rutzʼakatajic ri junaʼ, rijaʼ xtipe richin xtuqʼuen pe ri colotajic quichin ri vinakiʼ.
2.4: Rat pa ri avalcʼualanen atzʼeton ri rucʼojlemal rijaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, rat at turusan achiʼel ri xqueruturusaj rijaʼ tok cʼo riqʼuin ri ruchʼacul. Ri Uxlabel xa junan cʼa rubanic ivir, vacami, y benek ruvech. Ri rubeyal can chojmirisan vi pe tok xtzak ri achin, y ri colotajic man tojon ta.
2.5: Ri achiʼaʼ e tijon cʼa chi utzil richin queriʼ quetaman cʼa ruvech ri utz y ri itzel. Ri pixaʼ niyaʼox chique conojel ri vinakiʼ. Manjun vinek niban choj roma ri pixaʼ, o pa jun chic chʼabel, roma ri pixaʼ, ri vinakiʼ yecʼuk el. Kitzij cʼa chi rijeʼ xeʼelesex el roma ri pixaʼ aj ruvachʼulef. Chukaʼ roma cʼa ri pixaʼ aj uxlabel, man niquil ta apon achique ri can utz vi. Cʼa cʼariʼ, can xquebison vi jumul.
2.6: Roma cʼariʼ, ri elesanic pa mac nipe cʼa roma ri nuben ri Lokʼolej Mesías. Rijaʼ nojinek cʼa quiqʼuin utzil y kitzij.
2.7: Can kitzij vi chi rijaʼ nusuj riʼ pa jun camelabel coma ri mac. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ nuben chi nikʼajer ri rurayibal ri pixaʼ pa quiviʼ checonojel ri paxinek ri cánima y chʼuchʼuj ri cuxlabal. Xa manek cʼa chic banel richin nikʼajer ri rurayibal ri pixaʼ pa ruviʼ manjun chic.
2.8: Roma cʼariʼ, can janíla vi cʼatzinel chi yetijox ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo chuvech re ruvachʼulef chire ronojel reʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xtiquetamaj chi manjun vinek nitiquir nicʼoje acuchi cʼo vi ri Dios vi man ta coma ri ruchojmilal, ri rujoyovabal, y ri rutzil ri Lokʼolej Mesías. Rijaʼ nuyaʼ can ri rucʼaslen riqʼuin ri ruchʼacul, y nuqʼuen chic el jun bey riqʼuin ri ruchukʼaʼ ri Uxlabel. Can que vil reʼ, rijaʼ nuben ri cʼastajibel quichin ri caminakiʼ y ja rijaʼ ri nabey niyacatej.
2.9: Queriʼ cʼa, ja rijaʼ ri nabiyajinek akʼanij cʼa chuvech ri Dios, y can xticʼutun vi pa quiqʼuexel ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ. Ri yeniman richin rijaʼ, can xquecolotej vi.
2.10: Xa roma cʼa rijaʼ nicʼutun pa quiqʼuexel conojel ri vinakiʼ, can conojel vi yeʼapon cʼa riqʼuin ri Dios. Roma cʼariʼ, yecʼojeʼ chuvech rijaʼ richin queriʼ nukʼet cʼa tzij pa quiviʼ. Rijaʼ nuben cʼa queriʼ riqʼuin ri kitzij y ri chʼajchʼojil ri cʼo riqʼuin. Roma cʼariʼ, ri rurayibal ri rupixaʼ ri ruyaʼon can ri Lokʼolaxel niquiben chi can nipe vi ri cʼajisabel. Ja cʼajisabel riʼ can jiquiban vi y can chʼaron vi riqʼuin ri quicoten ri jiquiban can. Ri quicoten y ri cʼajisabel niquiben cʼa chi nikʼajer ri rurayibal ri tojbalil mac.
2.11: Ninbij cʼa chave rat ri at nabey valcʼual tok in cʼo pa ri tolan ruvachʼulef, chi nicʼatzin cʼa chi ronojel cʼo ri ruchʼarojriʼil. Vi man ta queriʼ, man ta nitiquir nibanatej cʼa ri ruchojmilal. Man ta yebanatej cʼa chukaʼ ri etzelal o ri chojmilal o ri bis o ri utz o ri itzel. Vi xa ta queriʼ, cʼo cʼa chi conojel xaxe ta jun quibanon. Chiriʼ cʼa, vi ja ta ronojel xe jun, jariʼ nicanej ta can achiʼel jun caminek. Vi ta queriʼ manek ta cʼaslen y manek ta camic. Chukaʼ manek ta tzʼilol o chʼajchʼojil, manek ta quicoten o bis, manek ta utzil o etzelal.
2.12: Que ta cʼariʼ, ronojel tzʼucutajinek ta cʼa y xa manek ta rejkalen. Roma cʼariʼ, xa manek ta roma xtzʼucutej. Vi ta cʼa quereʼ xbanatej can xa nivulatej ta cʼa ri retamabal ri Dios y chukaʼ ri jumul rurayibal. Yevulatej ta chukaʼ ri ruchukʼaʼ y ri rujoyovabal y ri rukʼatoj tzij ri Dios.
2.13: Vi ta nabij cʼa chi manek pixaʼ, nabij ta chukaʼ chi manek ruchojmilal. Cʼa cʼariʼ, vi ta manek ruchojmilal, xa manek ta chukaʼ quicoten. Vi ta manek cʼa ruchojmilal o quicoten, manek ta chukaʼ kʼaxomal o cʼajistabel. Vi ta manek cʼariʼ, xa manek ta cʼa Dios. Vi ta manek Dios, oj manek ta roj y chukaʼ manek ta cʼa re ruvachʼulef. Man ta tiquirel richin xetzʼucutej conojel ri yebanon y conojel ri achojchique niban vi. Roma cʼariʼ, cʼo chi conojel xesachtej ta el.
2.14: Vacami cʼa, nucʼajol, ninbij ronojel reʼchive rix richin chi yixqʼuiyer y nivetamaj. Roma cʼa, can cʼo vi jun Dios y rijaʼ e rutzʼucun ronojel. E rutzʼucun ri caj y ri ruvachʼulef y conojel ri e cʼo chiriʼ. E rutzʼucun cʼa conojel ri yebanon y conojel ri achojchique niban vi.
2.15: Rijaʼ xerutzʼuc cʼa ri nabey kateʼ katataʼ y ri aj pa kʼayis chicopiʼ y ri aj xicʼ chicopiʼ. Can conojel vi xerutzʼuc cʼa rijaʼ. Tok rubanon chic ronojel riʼ, rijaʼ xuben chukaʼ chi ronojel cʼo ri ruchʼarojriʼil. Xuben cʼa queriʼ richin chi nuben chi nikʼajer ri jumul rurayibal chique ri achiʼaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ tok xcʼojeʼ ri ruvech cheʼ chʼaʼoj rij chuvech cʼa ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen. Ri jun qʼuey y ri jun chic quiʼ.
2.16: Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf xuyaʼ kʼij richin chi ja ri vinek nichaʼon achique ri nuben rijaʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri achin man nitiquir ta nuchaʼ ri nuben vi man niyukʼ ta rijaʼ roma ri jun o roma ri jun chic.
