32.32: Roma cʼariʼ, vi jun ijatz niqʼuiyer, can utz vi. Jacʼa vi jun ijatz man niqʼuiyer ta, can kitzij vi chi man utz ta. Roma cʼariʼ, cʼo chi nitorix el.
32.33: Vacami cʼa, can kitzij vi chi itejtoben y iticon ri ijatz. Roma cʼariʼ, vi nisipoj, y nibos, y nuchop qʼuiyirinen, can jic vi ivetaman chi ri ijatz jariʼ utz.
32.34: ¿La tzʼaket cʼa cami ri ivetamabal? Jaʼ, ri ivetamabal chirij riʼ can tzʼaket vi, y ri icukubabel cʼuʼx xa niver, roma can ivetaman vi. Roma rix ivetaman chic chi ri chʼabel xsipoj pan ivánima, y chukaʼ ivetaman chi xbos, y chi nisakirisex ri ivetamanic, y niqʼuiyer ri inojibal.
32.35: Cʼa cʼariʼ, ¿la man kitzij ta reʼ? Ninbij chive chi jaʼ, romareʼ can sakil vi. Y ronojel ruvech sakil can utz vi, roma kʼalaj nitzuʼun. Roma cʼariʼ, cʼo chi ivetaman chi jariʼ utz. Vacami cʼa, can kitzij vi chi inaʼon chic re sakil reʼ. ¿La tzʼaket cʼa cami ri ivetamabal?
32.36: Can kitzij vi ninbij chive chi manjani. Chukaʼ can man rucʼamon ta cʼa chi niyaʼ can ri icukubabel cʼuʼx. Roma rix xaxe icukuban icʼuʼx richin nitic ri ijatz, richin queriʼ xtitejtobelaʼ, y xtinabej vi utz.
32.37: Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ tok ri cheʼ nuchop qʼuiyirinen, xtibij cʼa quereʼ: Tikilij cʼa chi utzil, richin chi nicʼojeʼ utz ruxeʼ. Riqʼuin cʼareʼ, xtiqʼuiy y xtivachin utz chike. Vacami cʼa, vi nivilij chi utzil, can xticʼojeʼ vi utz ruxeʼ, y xtiqʼuiy, y janíla xtivachin.
32.38: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, vi nimalij can ri cheʼ, y man nivilij ta, jariʼ tok man xtuyaʼ ta ruxeʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, tok xtipe ri sakʼij y xtuqʼuet cʼa ka ri cheʼ, can xtichaker vi cʼa, roma manek ri ruxeʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ xticʼuk y xtitorij el.
32.39: Vacami cʼa, jariʼ man roma ta ri ijatz man ta utz, ni ta chukaʼ man roma ta ri ruvech man ta nirayix. Jariʼ xa roma ri ulef man samajin ta, y rix man nivilij ta ri cheʼ. Roma cʼariʼ tok manek banel richin nicʼul ri ruvech ri cheʼ riʼ.
32.40: Quereʼ cʼa chukaʼ, vi man nivilij ta ri chʼabel iviqʼuin, y man nicukubaʼ ta apon ri icʼuʼx chi can nivachin vi, manjun bey xquixtiquir cʼa xtichʼup ri ruvech ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen.
32.41: Xa nicʼatzin chi nivilij ri chʼabel. Jaʼ, tivilij cʼa ri cheʼ tok cʼa nuchop qʼuiyirinen. Tivilij cʼa chi utzil riqʼuin ri icukubabel cʼuʼx, y ri cochʼibel cʼuʼx, y tivoyobej cʼa pan ivánima chi xtibevachin. Vi can niben vi ronojel reʼ, ja cʼariʼ tok utz xticʼojeʼ ri ruxeʼ. Y can kitzij vi chi xtoc jun cheʼ ri niqʼuiy, cʼa pa ri cʼaslen jumul.
32.42: Queriʼ cʼa, rix nitij ikʼij, y nicukubaʼ icʼuʼx, y yixcochʼon richin nivilij ri chʼabel, richin queriʼ utz xtuyaʼ ri ruxeʼ. Roma cʼa ronojel reʼ, kitzij chi xtichʼup ri ruvech riʼ. Ri ruvech ri janíla jebel, y janíla quiʼ chuvech ronojel ri quiʼ, y janíla sek chuvech ronojel ri sek. Chukaʼ cʼa janíla chʼajchʼoj chiquivech conojel ri e chʼajchʼoj. Y xtitij ri ruvech riʼ, cʼa tok yixnoj, y man xquixnum ta chic y man xquixchakachin ta.
32.43: Vachʼalal, can ja vi ri tok xticʼul ri rajel roma xicukubaʼ icʼuʼx, y xitij ikʼij, y xixcochʼon, y man chaʼnin to xixcos, y can xivoyobej vi richin chi ri cheʼ cʼo ri nuvachij chive.

34.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi tok ri Alma xerubij yan re chʼabel reʼ chique rijeʼ, rijaʼ xtzʼuyeʼ pa ri ulef. Jariʼ tok ri Amulek xpaʼeʼ y xuchop quitijoxic y quereʼ xubij:
34.2: Vachʼalal, yin ninnojij chi manek banel chi rix man ivetaman ta achique ri xtzijox can chirij ri rupetebal ri Cristo. Ja rijaʼ ri nikabij roj chi ja ri Rucʼajol ri Dios. Yin vetaman cʼa chi rix janíla xixtijox chique ronojel reʼ tok manjani tichʼer el iviʼ kiqʼuin.
34.3: Rix icʼutun cʼa chire ri vachʼalal ri nucʼuʼxlan chi tukʼalajirisaj cʼa chivech achique rucʼamon chi niben roma ri icʼayeval. Roma cʼariʼ tok rijaʼ chʼovinek jubaʼ iviqʼuin richin nunucʼ apon ri inojibal. Chukaʼ cʼa rijaʼ ix rupixaban richin ticukubaʼ icʼuʼx y xquixcochʼon.
34.4: Xixrupixabaj cʼa chi xa ticukubaʼ cʼa icʼuʼx richin nitic ri chʼabel pan ivánima, richin queriʼ nitejtobej cʼa ri rutzil.
34.5: Roj kanaben cʼa chi janíla yixnojnot cʼa pa ri inojibal chirij ri chʼabel ri cʼo cʼa riqʼuin ri Rucʼajol ri Dios o vi xa man xticʼojeʼ ta jun Cristo.
34.6: Rix xitzʼet cʼa chukaʼ chi ri vachʼalal can xujiquibaʼ vi chivech, quiqʼuin qʼuiy cʼutubel tak tzij, chi ri chʼabel richin ri colotajic can cʼo vi pe riqʼuin ri Cristo.
34.7: Ri vachʼalal e rukʼalajirisan pe ri chʼabel richin ri Zenos, ri niquibij chi ri elesanic pa mac nipe roma ri Rucʼajol ri Dios. Chukaʼ e rukʼalajirisan ri chʼabel richin ri Zenoc. E rutzijon cʼa chukaʼ ri ruchʼabel ri Moisés richin queriʼ nujiquibaʼ chi can kitzij vi ronojel reʼ.
34.8: Vacami cʼa, kitzij chi can yin chukaʼ xtinjiquibaʼ chivech chi can kitzij vi ronojel reʼ. Can kitzij vi ninbij chive chi ri Cristo xtipe chiquicojol ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ. Cʼa cʼariʼ, can xtuqʼuen ka pa ruviʼ rijaʼ ri quikʼajonic pixaʼ ri ruvinak, y xquerutoj ri quimac ri e aj re ruvachʼulef. Can que vi cʼareʼ rubin can ri Ajaf Dios.
34.9: Roma cʼatzinel cʼa chi niban ri rutojbalil mac. Achiʼel cʼa nubij ri nimalej nucʼunic richin ri Jumul Dios, can cʼo vi chi niban jun rutojbalil mac, o conojel ri vinakiʼ cʼo chi yecom jumul. Can conojel vi e covirisan chic, y e tzankinek, y e sachinek, y can cʼo vi chi xquecom jumul vi man ta niban cʼa ri rutojbalil mac ri can cʼatzinel vi.
34.10: Roma cʼatzinel chi nibanatej ri nimalej y ruqʼuisibel camelabel. Man ja ta reʼ jun camelabel. Man ja ta reʼ jun camelabel richin jun achin, o richin jun chicop, o xabachique ruvech aj xicʼ chicop. Roma man ja ta reʼ jun camelabel richin jun vinek. Xa can ja vi reʼ jun junelic y jumul camelabel.
34.11: Can man vi jun achin nitiquir nusuj ri ruquiqʼuel rijaʼ richin yerutoj ri rumac ri jun chic. Vi jun achin nicamisan cʼa, ¿la xtuben ri chojmilej kapixaʼ chi nicamisex ta ri rachʼalal rijaʼ? Ninbij cʼa chive chi mani.
34.12: Xa can nucʼutuj vi cʼa ri pixaʼ chi nicamisex ri camisanel. Roma cʼariʼ tok manjun chic, xaxe ri junelic rutojbalil mac nitiquir yerutoj ri quimac ri e aj re ruvachʼulef.
34.13: Roma cʼariʼ, nicʼatzin chi cʼo jun nimalej y ruqʼuisibel camelabel. Cʼa cʼariʼ tok xtitaneʼ, o pa jun chic chʼabel, nicʼatzin chi xtitaneʼ ri rutixic quiqʼuel ri e banalon pe. Ja cʼariʼ tok xtikʼajer can ri rupixaʼ ri Moisés. Can ronojel xtibanatej vi, ronojel cʼa ti rucʼaj y ti chʼap y manjun xtikʼax ta el chek queriʼ.
34.14: Can kitzij vi cʼa chi jareʼ ri nibecʼulun vi ri pixaʼ. Checonojel ri tak nitzʼ richin ri pixaʼ niquikʼijuj cʼa apon ri nimalej y ruqʼuisibel camelabel. Ri nimalej y ruqʼuisibel camelabel riʼ jariʼ ri Rucʼajol ri Dios, y can junelic vi y jumul.
34.15: Quereʼ cʼa rijaʼ xtuqʼuen pe ri colotajic chique conojel ri yeniman richin ri rubiʼ. Nibanatej cʼa re ruqʼuisibel camelabel reʼ, richin queriʼ nipe cʼa ri samaj richin ri joyovabel. Ri joyovabel cʼo cʼa ruchukʼaʼ pa ruviʼ ri kʼatoj tzij y nuyaʼ jun rubeyal richin queriʼ ri vinakiʼ xtiquicukubaʼ quicʼuʼx y xtizolin pe quicʼuʼx.
34.16: Riqʼuin cʼareʼ, ri joyovabel nitiquir nucukirisaj ri nucʼutuj ri kʼatoj tzij y yeruliʼej ri vinakiʼ riqʼuin rukʼaʼ richin rutzil quivech. Jacʼa ri jun ri man nucukubaʼ ta rucʼuʼx y man nitzolin ta pe rucʼuʼx, can nimalix vi can chupan ronojel ri pixaʼ richin ri nucʼutuj ri kʼatoj tzij. Roma cʼariʼ, ri nimalej y jumal rubeyal richin ri elesanic pa mac xaxe utz chire ri vinek ri nucukubaʼ rucʼuʼx y nitzolin pe rucʼuʼx.
34.17: Roma cʼariʼ, vachʼalal, ri Dios tuyaʼ cʼa kʼij chive rix richin nitiquiribaʼ nicukubaʼ icʼuʼx y nitzolin pe icʼuʼx, richin queriʼ xtichop rucʼutuxic pa ri lokʼolej rubiʼ rijaʼ, richin queriʼ xtujoyovaj cʼa ivech.
34.18: Jaʼ, ticʼutuj cʼa chire chi xtujoyovaj na ivech, roma rijaʼ nitiquir nicolon.
34.19: Jaʼ, tichʼutinirisaj cʼa iviʼ y jutakel tibanaʼ lokʼolej chʼoven riqʼuin.
34.20: Quixchʼo cʼa akʼanij riqʼuin rijaʼ tok ix cʼo pan ijuyuʼ y pa quiviʼ conojel ri ikʼataj.
34.21: Quixchʼo cʼa akʼanij riqʼuin rijaʼ pa tak ivachoch coma ri e aj pan ivachoch pa nimakʼaʼ, y pa kʼij, pa tikakʼij.
34.22: Ticʼutuj cʼa chire chi tukʼilaʼ na cʼa ri cuchukʼaʼ ri yeʼetzelan ivichin.
34.23: Ticʼutuj cʼa chire chi tukʼataʼ na cʼa ri itzel vinek. Jacʼa rijaʼ ri netzelan richin ronojel chojmilal.
34.24: Ticʼutuj cʼa chire rijaʼ pa ruviʼ ri iticoʼn pa juyuʼ richin xqueqʼuiyer.
34.25: Ticʼutuj cʼa chire pa quiviʼ ri imolaj chicopiʼ pa juyuʼ richin chi yeqʼuiytisex.
34.26: Jacʼa man xaxe ta reʼ. Cʼatzinel chi yixchʼo akʼanij riqʼuin rijaʼ riqʼuin ronojel ri ivánima pa ri ivarabal, y ri icʼojlibal e evan can, y chukaʼ pa ri tolan iruvachʼulef.
34.27: Que cʼariʼ, tok man yixchʼo ta akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf, tinoj cʼa ri ivánima riqʼuin jutakel lokʼolej chʼoven roma ri rutzil ivech rix, y chukaʼ roma ri rutzil quivech ri e cʼo chiʼinakaj.
34.28: Vacami vachʼalal, ri ix nucʼuʼxlan, can kitzij vi ninbij chive chi man tinojij chi xaxe reʼ nicʼatzin. Roma vi tok ibanon chic ronojel reʼ, yeʼixilkʼotilaʼ can ri vinakiʼ ri cʼo qʼuiy ri nicʼatzin chique, y chukaʼ ri chʼanayiʼ, y man yeʼikʼejelaʼ ta ri yavaʼiʼ y ri e cʼo ri quicʼayeval, y man niyaʼ ta jubaʼ ri cʼo iviqʼuin chique ri cʼo nicʼatzin chique, ninbij cʼa chive chi vi man niben ta reʼ, can kitzij vi, ri lokʼolej ichʼoven riqʼuin ri Dios manek ricʼaʼtz y manek cʼa rejkalen chive. Cʼa cʼariʼ, rix xa ix achiʼel ri caʼiʼ quipalej ri niquevaj ri kitzij tijonic.
34.29: Roma cʼariʼ, vi man nokaʼ ta cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx chi cʼo chi yixajovan, rix xaxe ix achiʼel ri kʼayis ri niquitorij el ri samajelaʼ, roma manek chic rejkalen, y cʼariʼ nipalibetej roma ri caken ri vinakiʼ.
34.30: Vachʼalal, vacami icʼulun e qʼuiy jiquibanic y itzʼeton chi ri lokʼolej tzʼibanic chukaʼ nujiquibaʼ ronojel reʼ. Roma cʼariʼ tok ninvajoʼ chi yixpe cʼa y nicʼut chi can nitzolin vi pe icʼuʼx.
34.31: Kitzij chi ninvajoʼ chi yixpe y man ta nicovirisaj chic ri ivánima. Roma can kitzij vi chi ri vacami jareʼ ri kʼij richin ri icolotajic. Roma cʼariʼ, vi xtitzolin pe icʼuʼx y man xticovirisaj ta chic ri ivánima, can chaʼnin vi xticʼamer pe chive ri nimalej rubeyal richin ri lokʼolej elesanic pa mac.
34.32: Roma can kitzij vi, re cʼaslen reʼ ja ri kʼij richin chi ri vinakiʼ niquichojmirisaj apon quiʼ richin niquitzʼet ri Dios. Can kitzij vi cʼa, ri kʼij richin re cʼaslen reʼ ja ri kʼij richin chi ri vinakiʼ niquiben ri quisamaj.
34.33: Vacami cʼa, xinbij can chive chi rix icʼulun chic e qʼuiy jiquibanic. Roma cʼariʼ, yixinpixabaj chi man tiyalaʼ can ri itzolibel cʼuʼx cʼa pa ruqʼuisibel. Roma ri kʼij richin re cʼaslen reʼ niyaʼox chike richin nikachojmirisaj apon kiʼ richin ri cʼaslen jumul. Jacʼa kitzij chi vi man nikachojmirisaj ta kiʼ tok oj cʼo chupan re cʼaslen reʼ, jariʼ tok noc pe ri tocokʼaʼ richin kʼekumal acuchi manjun chic samaj xtiban vi.
34.34: Tok xquixapon cʼa chupan ri cʼayevilej kʼij riʼ man xquixtiquir ta chic xtibij quereʼ: Vacami xa xtitzolin pe nucʼuʼx y xquijel apon riqʼuin ri nu Dios. Mani. Can manek vi chic beyal richin chi xtibij queriʼ. Roma ri uxlabel ri cʼo chupan ri ichʼacul tok yixel el chupan re cʼaslen reʼ, can ja vi ri uxlabel riʼ xticʼojeʼ ruchukʼaʼ richin nicʼojeʼ chupan ri ichʼacul chupan ri cʼaslen richin jumul.
34.35: Roma can kitzij vi, vi rix iyalojisan, cʼa pa ri icamic, ri kʼij tok xtivajoʼ xtitzolin pe ri icʼuʼxʼ, jariʼ tok ix jachon chic pa ri uchukʼaʼ richin ri ruxlabal ri itzel vinek, y ja rijaʼ ri nijitzʼon ivichin. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, ri Ruxlabal ri Ajaf ruchʼaron el riʼ iviqʼuin y manek chic ri rucʼojlibal iviqʼuin. Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri itzel vinek nicʼojeʼ ronojel ruchukʼaʼ pan iviʼ y can quereʼ quibanon can jumul ri e itzel.
34.36: Y yin vetaman reʼ, roma ri Ajaf rubin can chi rijaʼ man cʼo ta chupan tzʼilolej tak jay. Xa cʼo rijaʼ pa ri cánima ri e choj. Rijaʼ rubin can chukaʼ chi ri e choj can xquetzʼuyeʼ vi pa ri rajavaren rijaʼ y man xqueʼel ta chic. Y ri quitziak can xquesakirisex vi roma ri ruquiqʼuel ri Carneʼl.
34.37: Vacami cʼa, vachʼalal ri ix nucʼuʼxlan, yin ninvajoʼ chi reʼ nokaʼ chiʼicʼuʼx. Ninvajoʼ cʼa chukaʼ chi nichojmirisaj ri icolotajic riqʼuin xibinriʼil chuvech ri Dios y chi man nibij ta chic chi ri Cristo man xtipe ta.
34.38: Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi man nipabaʼ ta chic iviʼ chuvech ri Uxlabixel, xa ninvajoʼ chi can nicʼul vi rijaʼ, y niqʼuen pe pan iviʼ ri rubiʼ ri Cristo. Ninvajoʼ chukaʼ chi nichʼutinirisaj iviʼ cʼa pa ri pokolaj, y niyaʼ rukʼij ri Dios riqʼuin ri uxlabel y riqʼuin ri kitzij, xabacuchi ix cʼo cʼa vi. Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi nimatioxij chire rijaʼ kʼij kʼij roma ronojel ri joyovabel y turusanic ri yeruyaʼ rijaʼ chive.
34.39: Chukaʼ vachʼalal, yin yixinpixabaj chi tichajij cʼa iviʼ y quixchʼo akʼanij jutakel riqʼuin ri Dios. Riqʼuin cʼareʼ, man xquixucʼuex ta el roma ri tejtobenic richin ti itzel vinek, y man xquixrupalibej ta, y man xquixoc ta ri rusamajelaʼ rijaʼ pa ruqʼuisibel kʼij. Roma rijaʼ xa manjun utz xtuyaʼ chive.
34.40: Vacami cʼa, vachʼalal, ninvajoʼ yixinpixabaj richin ticʼojeʼ cʼa ri icochʼonic, richin queriʼ xqueʼichochʼ cʼa ronojel ruvech cʼayeval. Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi man yeʼiyokʼ ta chic ri yeʼelesan el ivichin xa roma yalan ix mebaʼiʼ. Vi niben cʼa queriʼ, xa xquixoc cʼa aj mac achiʼel rijeʼ.
34.41: Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi ticʼojeʼ cochʼonic y chi yeʼicoch ri cʼayeval riʼ, y nivoyobej pan ivánima chi cʼo jun kʼij apon tok xquixuxlan pe pa conojel ri icʼayeval.

39.intro: Ri rupixabanic ri Alma ri xubij chire ri rucʼajol Corianton
39.1: Vacami, nucʼajol, nicʼo chic ruviʼ ri xtinbij chave rat, chuvech ri xinbij chire ri animal. ¿La man atzʼeton ta cʼa chi ri animal can cof vi, y chukaʼ can choj vi, y yerutakej chi utzil ri rupixaʼ ri Dios? ¿La man rukʼalajirisan ta cami chavech rat utzilej cʼutubel banobel?
39.2: Roma, tok oj cʼo chiquicojol ri Zoramiʼ, rat man can ta xanimaj nutzij, achiʼel ri xuben ri animal. Jareʼ cʼa ri voyoval chavij rat. Rat xabananen roma ri avuchukʼaʼ y ri utzilej anojibal.
39.3: Man xaxe ta reʼ, nucʼajol. Rat xaben achique ri yalan nuyaʼ bis chuve. Roma rat xayaʼ can ri lokʼolej samaj, y xabe chirij ri itzel ixok rubiniʼan Isabel chiriʼ pa ri ruvachʼulef rubiniʼan Siron. Jariʼ cʼo pa ri cʼulbaʼt quiqʼuin ri Lamaniʼ.
39.4: Kitzij chi ri ixok riʼ xeruchʼec ri cánima e qʼuiy. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, rat man yacuyutej ta romariʼ, nucʼajol. Rucʼamon cʼa chi xaben ta ri lokʼolej samaj ri xyaʼox chave.
39.5: ¿La man avetaman ta, nucʼajol, chi ronojel reʼ can itzel vi chuvech ri Dios? Kitzij chi re mac reʼ janíla itzel chiquivech conojel ri chʼakaʼ chic mac. Xaxe cʼa, vi nacamisaj ri man aj mac ta, o vi naxutuj el ri Uxlabixel, xa ja vi riʼ, nim chuvech re mac reʼ.
39.6: Roma can kitzij vi chi vi naxutuj el ri Uxlabixel tok rijaʼ cʼo chic aviqʼuin, y can avetaman vi chi naxutuj el, ja cʼareʼ jun mac ri manjun bey xticuyutej ta. Kitzij cʼa, chi ri nicamisan tok retaman chic ri rusakil y ri retamabal ri Dios, janíla cʼayef richin rijaʼ nicuyutej. Jaʼ, nucʼajol, can cʼayef vi richin chi rijaʼ nicuyutej.
39.7: Vacami cʼa, nucʼajol, ja ta cʼa, man ta xaben jun mac can janíla vi nim. Man ta cʼa ninchʼit ri avánima, vi riʼ xa man ta nicʼatzin chave.
39.8: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ can kitzij chi man yatiquir ta yeʼavevaj ri amac chuvech ri Dios. Vi man nitzolin ta pe acʼuʼx, ri amac can xquejiqueʼ vi chavij pa ri ruqʼuisibel kʼij.
39.9: Vacami, nucʼajol, ninvajoʼ chi nitzolin pe acʼuʼx, y yeʼayaʼ can ri amac. Ninvajoʼ cʼa chi man yabe ta chic chirij ri itzel rayibel richin ri runakʼ avech. Xa nakʼil ta cʼa aviʼ chupan re rayibel reʼ. Roma vi man que ta reʼ naben, can manek vi banel richin xtavichinaj ri rajavaren ri Dios. Tokaʼ cʼa chacʼuʼx, y tacʼamaʼ ka chave, y takʼilaʼ aviʼ chupan ronojel reʼ.
39.10: Ninbij cʼa chave chi tabecʼutuj pixabanic chique ri animal chirij ri nabanalaʼ. Roma can kitzij vi chi cʼa at rat cʼajol na, y nicʼatzin chave chi ri animal yatquipixabaj. Y tanimaj cʼa ri quipixabanic.
39.11: Man tayaʼ cʼa kʼij chi yayukex el roma xabachique ri xa nacanic, o manek ricʼaʼtz. Man tayaʼ chic kʼij chi ri itzel vinek nusiloj ri avánima richin yabe chiquij ri itzel tak ixokiʼ. Can kitzij vi, nucʼajol, chi janíla nim ri etzelal ri xaqʼuen ka chiquij ri Zoramiʼ. Roma tok rijeʼ xquitzʼet ri xabanalaʼ rat, man xcajoʼ ta chic xquinimaj ri nuchʼabel.
39.12: Vacami cʼa, ri Uxlabel richin ri Ajaf quereʼ nubij chuve: Tabij chique ri avalcʼual chi tiquibanaʼ ri utz, richin queriʼ man ta cʼa xtiquiyukej el ri cánima e qʼuiy vinakiʼ, cʼa chupan ri vulatajic. Roma cʼariʼ, nucʼajol, can ninbij vi chave, riqʼuin xibinriʼil chuvech ri Dios, chi takʼilaʼ aviʼ chupan conojel ri itzel abanobal.
39.13: Que cʼari, catzolin cʼa riqʼuin ri Ajaf riqʼuin ronojel ri arayibal, ri anojibal, y ri avuchukʼaʼ. Que cʼa chukaʼ reʼ, man cʼa queʼayukej chʼakaʼ chic vinakiʼ richin niquiben ri itzel. Xa catzolin cʼa chi quiqʼuin, y queʼakʼalajirisaj chiquivech rijeʼ ri man utz ta abanobal, y ri mac ri e abanon.
39.14: Man cʼa queʼacanoj ri beyomel, o achique ri xa aj re ruvachʼulef ri manek ricʼatz. Roma can kitzij vi, chi man xcatiquir ta xqueʼacʼuaj cʼa el aviqʼuin.
39.15: Vacami, nucʼajol, ninvajoʼ ninbij jubaʼ chave chirij ri rupetebal ri Cristo. Can kitzij vi chi ninbij chave chi can ja vi rijaʼ ri xtipe richin yerelesaj el ri quimac ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo chuvachʼulef. Kitzij cʼa, chi xtipe richin yeruyaʼ jebel rutzijol chique ri ruvinakul chirij ri colotajic.
39.16: Vacami, nucʼajol, jareʼ ri lokʼolej samaj achojche xatoyox vi. Jacʼa richin yeʼayaʼ re jebel rutzijol reʼ chique re vinakul reʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, can cʼo vi banel richin niquichojmirisaj ri quinojibal. Pa jun chic chʼabel, cʼo cʼa banel richin nipe ri colotajic chique rijeʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xtquichojmirisaj ri quinojibal ri calcʼual, richin xticacʼaxaj ri ruchʼabel, tok rijaʼ xtokaʼ.
39.17: Vacami cʼa, xtinvuxlanibej jubaʼ ri anojibal chirij re naʼoj reʼ. Can kitij vi chi janíla nachʼob rij achique roma tok etaman ronojel reʼ qʼuiy junaʼ tok manjani tipe rijaʼ. Can kitzij vi, quereʼ nincʼutuj chave: ¿La man junan ta chuvech ri Dios rejkalen jun cʼaslemal ri cʼo vacami, riqʼuin jun cʼaslemal ri cʼo tok xtipe rijaʼ?
39.18: ¿La man ta cʼatzinel chi ri nucʼun banel richin ri lokʼolej elesanic pa mac nikʼalajirisex chiquivech re vinakiʼ reʼ, achiʼel cʼa chukaʼ chiquivech ri calcʼual?
39.19: ¿La man nitiquir ta cami ri Ajaf nutek pe ri takonaxel richin nuyaʼ re jebel rutzijol reʼ chike roj, achiʼel cʼa xtuben quiqʼuin ri kalcʼual, y quiqʼuin ri xquecʼojeʼ cʼa chirij ri rupetebal?

40.1: Vacami, nucʼajol, cʼo jubaʼ chic ri xtinbij chave. Roma cʼa, ninnaʼ chi nimayon ri anojibal chirij ri cʼastajibel quichin ri caminakiʼ.
40.2: Can kitzij vi ninbij chave chi manjun cʼastajibel xtiban, xa cʼa tok xtipe ri Cristo. Pa jun chic chʼabel, ninbij cʼa chave chi re chʼaculaj reʼ ri camel, man xtoc ta man camel ta chic, y re tzʼil reʼ man xtoc ta chʼajchʼoj, xa cʼa tok xtipe rijaʼ.
40.3: Can kitzij vi chi ja rijaʼ ri xtibanon richin ri cʼastajibel quichin ri caminakiʼ. Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, kitzij nucʼajol, chi manjani tipe ri cʼastajibel. Vacami, yin ninsol chavech jun evan etamabel. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, e cʼo janíla evan etamabel ri can e yacon vi can, y manjun vi chic etamayon, xaxe cʼa ri Dios. Ninkʼalajirisaj cʼa chavech rat jun evan etamabel ri nucʼutun can chi utzil chire ri Dios, richin queriʼ ninvetamaj. Jareʼ cʼa, nichʼo chirij ri cʼastajibel.
40.4: Can kitzij vi, cʼo jun kʼij ri can kʼijun vi chique chiquijujunal richin yecʼastej pe pa ri camic. Manjun vinek retaman jampeʼ xtipe ri kʼij riʼ. Jacʼa ri Dios etamayon ri kʼij ri kʼijun can.
40.5: Manek cʼa rubanon vi cʼo jun mul, o caʼiʼ mul, o oxiʼ mul tok ri vinakiʼ yecʼastej pe pa ri camic. Roma ri Dios retaman ronojel reʼ. Xaxe nicʼatzin chuve chi vetaman chi can cʼo vi jun kʼij ri kʼijun can chique chiquijujunal richin yecʼastej pe chupan ri camic.
40.6: Cʼo cʼa chi nicʼojeʼ rucojol ri rukʼij ri camic riqʼuin ri rukʼij ri cʼastajibel.
40.7: Vacami cʼa, quereʼ nincʼutuj: ¿Achique niquiben pe ri quicʼaslemal ri vinakiʼ tok yecom ka rijeʼ, cʼa tok xtokaʼ ri kʼij ri kʼijun can richin yecʼastej pe?
40.8: Manek cʼa rubanon vi e cʼo e qʼuiy jalajoj ruvech kʼij ri e kʼijun chique ri vinakiʼ richin yecʼastej pe. Roma man yecom ta conojel xa pa jun oc kʼij, y jareʼ manek rubanon. Riqʼuin ri Dios, can ronojel vi xaxe achiʼel jun kʼij, y ri tak kʼij vaveʼ, xaxe e etan can coma ri vinakiʼ.
40.9: Roma cʼari, cʼo jun kʼij ri kʼijun can chique ri vinakiʼ richin yecʼastej pe pa ri camic. Can cʼo vi rucojol ri camic riqʼuin ri cʼastajibel. Vacami cʼa, ¿achique cami rubaniquil re rucojol reʼ, y achique cʼa xtiquiben ri quicʼaslemal ri vinakiʼ chiriʼ? Jacʼa reʼ ri nucʼutun chi utzil chire ri Ajaf richin ninvetamaj. Can ja vi cʼareʼ ri vetaman yin.
40.10: Tok nipe cʼa chic ri kʼij tok conojel yecʼastej pe, jariʼ tok rijeʼ xtiquetamaj chi ri Dios retaman conojel ri kʼij ri e kʼijun can chique ri vinakiʼ.
40.11: Vacami, xquichʼo cʼa chirij ri achique xtuben ri cʼaslemal chucojol ri camic y ri cʼastajibel. Can kitzij vi, jun takonaxel in rutijon chire re naʼoj reʼ. Xirutijoj cʼa chi ri uxlabel quichin conojel ri vinakiʼ, tok yeʼel el riqʼuin re chʼaculaj reʼ ri camel, jariʼ tok xqueʼucʼuex cʼa chic riqʼuin ri Dios ri yoyon ri cʼaslen chique. Quereʼ cʼa xtiquiben ri uxlabel quichin conojel vinakiʼ, stapeʼ e utz, o man e utz ta.
40.12: Ja cʼariʼ tok xticʼulvachitej chi ri uxlabel quichin ri e choj yecʼul cʼa pa jun naʼoj richin quicoten rubiniʼan ri lokʼolej cʼojilibel richin quicoten. Jariʼ jun cʼojlibel richin uxlanen y uxlanibel cʼuʼx, acuchi xqueʼuxlan vi pe chupan ri quicʼayeval, y ri quikʼaxomal, y ri cʼo chi niquikukaʼ.
40.13: Cʼa cʼari, xticʼulvachitej chi ri uxlabel quichin ri e itzel xquetorix cʼa el pa jumul kʼekuʼm. Rijeʼ can e itzel vi, roma can kitzij vi chi man jubaʼ chire ri Uxlabel richin ri Ajaf cʼo quiqʼuin. Roma can kitzij vi, rijeʼ quichaʼon ri itzel banobel chuvech ri e utz. Roma cʼariʼ tok ri ruxlabal ri itzel vinek xoc quiqʼuin, y xuchop ri cánima. Rijeʼ xquetorix cʼa el acuchi nicʼojeʼ okʼen, y siqʼuinen, y kachʼachʼen eyaj. Ronojel reʼ, xaxe roma ri itzel quibanobal rijeʼ. Rijeʼ xeʼucʼuex cʼa el, roma e chapon riqʼuin ri rurayibal ri itzel vinek.
40.14: Quereʼ cʼa ri rubanic ri quicʼojlibal ri quicʼaslemal ri e itzel. Xquecʼojeʼ cʼa pa ri kʼekuʼm, acuchi xtiquitij vi pokonal, y xtiquixbij quiʼ. Jariʼ roma xticoyobej chironojel ri royoval ri Dios, ri xtikaʼ pe chiquij. Can que vi reʼ xquecanej can rijeʼ, y ri e choj xquecanej can chupan ri lokʼolej cʼojlibel richin quicoten, xa cʼa tok nipe ri kʼij richin ri quicʼastajibel.
40.15: Cʼo cʼa ri cʼojlibel acuchi niquicot vi ri cʼaslemal, o nibison, cʼa tok manjani ticʼastej pe. Chʼakaʼ chic vinakiʼ quinojin chi jariʼ ri nabey cʼastajibel. Kitzij chi ninbij chi cʼo banel richin nibix cʼastajibel chire. Ja cʼareʼ tok ri uxlabel o ri cʼaslemal niyacatej y niyaʼox chupan ri quicoten o ri kʼaxomal, achiʼel cʼa ri betajinek can.
40.16: Can kitzij vi chi bitajinek can chukaʼ chi nibanatej jun nabey cʼastajibel. Jariʼ, ri cʼastajibel quichin conojel ri xecʼojeʼ pe ojer, y ri yecʼojeʼ vacami, y ri xquecʼojeʼ apon, cʼa tok xticʼastej pe ri Cristo chiquicojol ri caminakiʼ.
40.17: Vacami cʼa, man nikanojij ta chi re nabey cʼastajibel reʼ, achojchij nitzijox vi quereʼ, ja ri cʼastajibel quichin ri uxlabel, tok yeyaʼox pa jun cʼojlibel richin quicoten o kʼaxomal. Man cʼa tanojij chi queriʼ nibecʼulun chike.
40.18: Can kitzij vi chi ninbij chive chi man que ta riʼ. Xa nubij chi xtiquitun quiʼ ri cuxlabal y ri quichʼacul ri e cʼo pe chupan ri kʼij richin ri Adán, cʼa tok nicʼastej pe ri Cristo.
40.19: Vacami cʼa, xtzijox ka chiquij ri cuxlabal y ri quichʼacul ri e itzel y ri e choj. Vaveʼ cʼa, yin man ninbij ta vi rijeʼ xtiquitun chic quiʼ chupan xaxe jun kʼij, o man que ta riʼ. Xaxe nicʼatzin chuve chi ninbij chi can xquecʼastej vi pe. Pa jun chic chʼabel, ri quicʼastajibel rijeʼ xtibanatej nabey chuvech ri quicʼastajibel ri xquecom chirij ri rucʼastajibel ri Cristo.
40.20: Vacami nucʼajol, man ninbij ta chi ri quicʼastajibel rijeʼ xtibanatej tok xticʼastej pe ri Cristo. Xa can kitzij vi chi yin ninnojij chi ri cuxlabal y ri quichʼacul ri e choj xtiquitun chic quiʼ tok xticʼastej ri Cristo y xtijoteʼ chicaj.
40.21: Vi quereʼ xtiban chupan ri kʼij tok xticʼastej pe ri Cristo, o xa cʼa chirij ri rucʼastajibel, jariʼ man ninbij ta yin. Xa can ninbij vi quereʼ: Can cʼo vi rucojol ri camic riqʼuin ri rucʼastajibel ri chʼaculaj. Cʼo pe chukaʼ jun quicoten, o jun nimalej bis, xa cʼa tok napon ri kʼij ri nikʼijux roma ri Dios richin xquecʼastej pe ri caminakiʼ, y niquitun chic quiʼ ri uxlabel y ri chʼaculaj. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xquecʼamer chuvech ri Dios, y xtikʼat tzij pa quiviʼ chiquij ri quisamaj.
40.22: Jaʼ, re cʼulvachitajic reʼ nibanon ri tzolijitajic quichin conojel, achojchiquij quitzijon vi ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
40.23: Ri uxlabel xtitzolix riqʼuin ri chʼaculaj, y ri chʼaculaj, y ri chʼaculaj riqʼuin ri uxlabel. Jaʼ, conojel aken, y kʼabaj, y bakil, xquetzolix chic riqʼuin ri ruchʼacul. Kitzij cʼa, can man vi jun rusumal viʼaj xtisachtej el, xa can conojel vi xquetzolix cʼa chupan ri choj, y tzʼaket quibaniquil.
40.24: Vacami, nucʼajol, jareʼ ri tzolijitajic achojchij e tzijovinek vi conojel ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
40.25: Ja cʼariʼ tok ri e choj xquechʼichʼan apon chupan ri rajaveren ri Dios.
40.26: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, kitzij cʼa chi jun cʼayevilej camic xtipe chiquij ri e itzel. Roma rijeʼ yecom cʼa chuvech ri ruchojmilal. Roma rijeʼ can e tzʼil vi, y manjun ri rajavaren ri Dios. Rijeʼ xa e elesan el, y e yaʼon can richin niquitij ri ruyaʼon pe chique ri quisamaj, o ri quibanobal ri can e itzel vi. Rijeʼ niquikum cʼa ri rutzʼilol jun qʼueyilej kumbel.

41.1: Vacami nucʼajol, cʼa cʼo na ri ninvajoʼ ninbij chave chirij ri tzolijitajic, achojchij xtzijox vi can. Roma can kitzij vi, chʼakaʼ quisukʼun ri lokʼolej tzʼibanic, y e sachon romariʼ. Yin ninnaʼ chi ri anojibal rat chukaʼ ninojnot can romareʼ. Can kitzij vi cʼa chi xtinkʼalajirisaj chavech.
41.2: Yin ninbij chave, nucʼajol, chi can nicʼatzin vi ri nucʼun rubanel ri tzolijitajic chire ri kʼatoj tzij richin ri Dios. Roma can cʼatzinel vi chi conojel yetzolitej pa ri tzʼaket ruchojmilen. Can kitzij vi cʼa, chi cʼatzinel y choj chi ri uxlabel richin jun vinek nitzolix pe riqʼuin ri ruchʼacul, y chi chijun ri ruchʼacul cʼo chi nitzolix pe chic. Que cʼariʼ rubanon roma ri ruchukʼaʼ y ri rucʼastajibel ri Cristo.
41.3: Cʼo cʼa chi nikʼat tzij pa quiviʼ ri vinakiʼ chiquij ri quisamaj, roma queriʼ nrajoʼ ri kʼatoj tzij richin ri Dios. Vi utz ri quisamaj pa re cʼaslen reʼ, y vi utz ri rurayibal ri cánima, cʼo chukaʼ chi rijeʼ xquetzolix chic riqʼuin ri utz chupan ri ruqʼuisibel kʼij.
41.4: Vi e itzel ri quisamaj, cʼo chi xquetzolix chic chiquij rijeʼ pa ri itzel. Roma cʼari, ronojel xtitzolix chic pa ri kitzij ruchojilen y pa ri quibaniquil. Ri camel xtiyacatej riqʼuin ri man camel ta chic, y ri kʼeyitajic riqʼuin ri chʼajchʼoj. Xqueyacatej cʼa chupan jumul quicoten richin niquichinaj ri rajavaren ri Dios, o chupan jumal kʼaxomal richin niquichinaj ri rajavaren ri itzel vinek. Jun nibe riqʼuin ri jun, y jun nibe riqʼuin ri jun chic.
41.5: Ri jun niyacatej chupan ri ruquicoten, junan riqʼuin ri rurayibal chire ri quicoten, o chupan ri utz, junan riqʼuin ri rurayibal chire ri utz. Ri jun chic niyacatej chupan ri itzel, junan riqʼuin ri rurayibal chire ri itzel. Roma rijaʼ xurayij xuben ri itzel chijun kʼij, y roma cʼari, can que vi reʼ xtril cʼa ri itzel rajel ruqʼuexel tok nocokʼaʼ.
41.6: Quereʼ cʼa chukaʼ niban riqʼuin ri jun chic. Vi rijaʼ tzolitajinek pe ri rucʼuʼxʼ chupan ri rumac, y rurayin ri ruchojmilal, cʼa pa ri ruqʼuisibel ri rukʼij, can que vi reʼ, rijaʼ xtril cʼa ri rajel ruqʼuexel ri ruchojmilal.
41.7: Can je vi rijeʼ ri yeʼelesex pe chupan ri quimac roma ri Ajaf. Kitzij chi je rijeʼ ri e elesan pe, y ri e colon pe, chupan ri tocokʼaʼ richin jumul kʼekuʼm. Xa rijeʼ chic cʼa, ri yepaʼeʼ, o ri yetzak. Roma can kitzij vi, je rijeʼ ri yechaʼon, y niquiben ri utz o ri man utz ta.
41.8: Vacami cʼa, ri nubij ri Dios can man nijalatej ta. Roma cʼariʼ, chojmirisan chic ri bey richin chi xabachique ri nirayin cʼo banel richin nibiyin chupan, y nicolotej.
41.9: Vacami cʼa, nucʼajol, man cʼa tanim aviʼ jun bey chic richin nacʼulaʼaj ri a Dios chirij re tijonic reʼ. Ja re tijonic reʼ ri cʼa vacami arayin richin nakʼej.
41.10: Man cʼa tanojij chi xaxe roma xtzijox ka chirij ri tzolijitajic chi rat xcatzolix pe acuchi cʼo vi ri mac, cʼa chupan ri quicoten. Can kitzij vi chi ninbij chave chi ri etzelal manjun bey ja ta riʼ ri quicoten.
41.11: Vacami cʼa, nucʼajol, conojel ri achiʼaʼ ri e cʼo pa ri naʼoj aj re ruvachʼulef, o pa jun chic chʼabel, ri e cʼo pa jun naʼoj aj chʼaculaj, je rijeʼ can e cʼo vi chupan ri ruyaʼal ri qʼueyilel, y ri ximibel richin ri etzelal. E cʼo cʼa chuvech re ruvachʼulef, y ri Dios xa manek quiqʼuin. Rijeʼ e samajinek cʼa chirij ri runaʼoj ri Dios. Roma cʼariʼ, e cʼo pe, e paban chuvech ri naʼoj richin ri quicoten.
41.12: Vacami cʼa, ¿la nibecʼulun ri tzij tzolijitajic, chi jun nelesex el chupan ri kitzij rubaniquil, y niyaʼox cʼa pa jun chic rubaniquil jalatajinek? ¿La nibecʼulun cami cʼa chi niyaʼox acuchi xa chʼaron chic el chuvech ri kitzij rubaniquil rijaʼ?
41.13: Nucʼajol, man que ta riʼ nibecʼulun pe. Ri tzij tzolijitajic xa nibecʼulun chi nitzolix chic ri itzel pa ruqʼuexel ri itzel, y ri aj chʼaculaj pa ruqʼuexel ri aj chʼaculaj, o ri etzelal pa ruqʼuexel ri etzelal. Chukaʼ nibecʼulun chi ri utz nitzolix pa ruqʼuexel ri utz, y ri ruchojmilal pa ruqʼuexel ri nichojmilal, y ri choj pa ruqʼuexel ri choj, y ri joyovabel pa ruqʼuexel ri joyovabel.
41.14: Roma cʼariʼ, nucʼajol, tatijaʼ cʼa akʼij richin najoyovaj quivech ri avachʼalal. Casamej cʼa choj quiqʼuin, y tasamajij ri ruchojmilal, y tabanaʼ cʼa ri utz benek ruvech. Vi naben cʼa ronojel reʼ, can xtacʼul vi ri avajel. Kitzij chi ri joyovabel xtitzolix chic chave, y ri ruchojmilal xtitzolix chic chave. Chukaʼ ri chojmilej kʼatoj tzij xtitzolix chic chave, y ri utz xtitzolix chic chave chukaʼ.
41.15: Roma achique ri xtatek el, can xtitzolin vi pe chic aviqʼuin. Roma cʼariʼ, ri tzij tzolijitajic can tzʼaket vi nretzelaj ri aj mac, y can man nutoʼ ta vi.

42.1: Vacami cʼa nucʼajol, ninnaʼ chi cʼa cʼo na ri janíla nachʼob rij, y xa man nikʼax ta chavech. Jariʼ chirij ri rukʼatoj tzij ri Dios tok rijaʼ nucʼajisaj ruvech ri aj mac. Roma navajoʼ nanojij chi xa man choj ta chi ri aj mac niyaʼox can pa kʼaxomal.
42.2: Vacami nucʼajol, can kitzij vi chi xtinkʼalajirisaj reʼ chavech. Roma can kitzij vi chi ri Ajaf Dios xerutek el ri nabey kateʼ katataʼ chupan ri cotzʼijbel rubiniʼan Edén richin queriʼ, xquisamajij ri ulef achojiqʼuin xebanatej vi. Jariʼ tok rijaʼ xrelesaj el ri achin, y xeruyaʼ lokʼolej tak chajinelaʼ pa ri relebal kʼij richin ri cotzʼijbel rubiniʼan Edén. Xuyaʼ chiriʼ chukaʼ jun kʼakʼilej tzaqʼuibel ri xupiscolilaʼ riʼ xabacuchi, richin queriʼ xquichajij ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen.
42.3: Nikatzʼet cʼa chi ri achin xoc junan jubaʼ riqʼuin ri Dios, roma retaman ruvech ri utz y ri itzel. Ri Ajaf Dios xeruyaʼ can ri lokʼolej tak chajinelaʼ, y ri kʼakʼilej tzaqʼuibel, richin quereʼ ri achin man xutij ta ri ruvech ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen. Jariʼ richin chi rijaʼ man xuyuk ta rukʼaʼ y xuchop ta ruvech ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen, y nutij, y nicʼaseʼ benek ruvech.
42.4: Quereʼ cʼa, nikatzʼet chi xyaʼox chire ri achin jun kʼij richin nitzolin pe rucʼuʼx. Jareʼ cʼa jun kʼij richin nitejtobex, y chukaʼ richin chi nitzolin pe rucʼuʼx, y nusamajij ri Dios.
42.5: Roma can kitzij vi, vi ta ri Adán xuyuk ri rukʼaʼ chaʼnim y xutij ta ri ruvech ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen, cʼariʼ rijaʼ xcʼaseʼ ta benek ruvech, achiʼel xubij can ri Dios, y manek ta kʼij richin nitzolin ta pe rucʼuʼx. Que ta riʼ, ri ruchʼabel ri Dios manek ta ricʼaʼtz, y ri nimalej nucʼun banel richin ri colotajic, xsachtej ta.
42.6: Vaveʼ cʼa, xa kʼijun cʼa chire ri achin richin nicom. Roma cʼariʼ, achiʼel rijeʼ e elesan el chuvech ri cheʼ richin ri cʼaslen, que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, yeʼelesex el jumul chuvachʼulef. Ri achin xoc sachinel jumul. Jaʼ rijeʼ xeʼoc e tzakinek tak vinakiʼ.
42.7: Vacami cʼa, natzʼet chi romariʼ, ri nabey kateʼ katataʼ xeʼelesex el chuvech ri Ajaf riqʼuin ri quichʼacul, y chukaʼ ri cuxlabal. Quereʼ cʼa, nikatzʼet chi xeʼoc vinakiʼ ri niquietzekelbej ri quirayibal rijeʼ.
42.8: Can kitzij vi cʼa, man xajovex ta chi ri achin xchʼojix ta pe richin man ta nukʼaxaj re camic reʼ chuvachʼulef. Jariʼ, xa xuvulaj ta ri nimalej nucʼun banel richin ri quicoten.
42.9: Ri cʼaslemal can man vi jun bey nicom. Ri tzakinen xuqʼuen ka chique conojel ri vinakiʼ ri camic richin ri uxlabel, y chukaʼ ri camic richin ri chʼaculaj. Jareʼ nibecʼulun chi rijeʼ can e elesan vi el chuvech ri Ajaf. Xa roma cʼariʼ tok can cʼatzinel vi chi conojel vinakiʼ yechʼojix pe chuvech re camic reʼ richin ri uxlabel.
42.10: Rijeʼ xeʼoc e aj chʼaculaj, y e aj tiojil, y e aj etzelal, roma cʼa ri quibaniquil. Roma cʼariʼ, re cʼaslen reʼ richin tejtobenic xoc jun cʼalsen richin niquichojmirisaj quiʼ. Xoc cʼa jun cʼaslen richin chojmirisanic.
42.11: Vacami nucʼajol, tokaʼ cʼa chacʼuʼx chi vi ta man cʼo re nucʼun banel richin ri lokʼolej elesanic pa mac (vi ta nikayaʼ cʼa can chek queriʼ), cʼariʼ tok yecom rijeʼ, ri quicʼaslemal cʼo ta chi niquitij kʼaxomal. Jariʼ roma can e elesan vi chic el chuvech ri Ajaf.
42.12: Manek ta chic banel richin yechʼojix pe ri vinakiʼ chupan re tzakinen reʼ ri xuqʼuen ka ri vinek chire can rijaʼ, roma man xunimaj ta tzij.
42.13: Roma cʼariʼ, xa roma ri rusamaj ri kʼatoj tzij, manek chic banel richin nikʼajer ta ri nucʼun banel richin ri lokʼolej elesanic pa mac. Xaxe cʼa riqʼuin ri rubaniquil ri tzolibel cʼuʼx ri niquiben ri vinakiʼ chupan re cʼaslen reʼ richin tejtobenic. Roma vi ta manek ri tzolibel cʼuʼx, ri joyovabel manjun nitiquir ta nuben, xaxe vi nuvulaj ta ri rusamaj ri kʼatoj tzij. Y xa manek banel richin nivulatej ri rusamaj ri kʼatoj tzij. Vi ta cʼa queriʼ, ri Dios xa man ta cʼa Dios chic riʼ.
42.14: Quereʼ cʼa, nikatzʼet chi conojel ri vinakiʼ e tzakinek chic, y e chapon roma ri kʼatoj tzij. Jariʼ ri rukʼatoj tzij ri Dios ri xbanon ta chique chi yeʼelesex ta chic el riqʼuin ri Dios benek ruvech.
42.15: Vacami cʼa, ri nucʼun banel richin ri joyovabel, manek ta banel richin nibanatej, xaxe cʼa vi nibanatej ta jun rutojbalil mac. Roma cʼariʼ, tok can ja vi ri Dios, nitojon quichin ri quimac ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo chuvachʼulef, richin queriʼ nuchojmirisaj cʼa ri nucʼun banel richin ri joyovabel. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xtucukirisaj ri nrajoʼ ri kʼatoj tzij. Riqʼuin cʼareʼ, ri Dios xtoc cʼa jun Dios tzʼaket, y choj, y joyovanel chukaʼ.
42.16: Vacami cʼa, manek banel richin niyaʼox ri tzolibel cʼuʼx chique ri vinakiʼ, xaxe cʼa vi nicʼojeʼ ta jun cʼasjisabel ri can jumul vi, achiʼel cʼa ri rucʼaslen ri cʼaslemal. Ri cʼajisabel riʼ can chʼaron vi riqʼuin ri nucʼun banel richin ri quicoten. Jariʼ can jumul vi chukaʼ achiʼel ri rucʼaslen ri cʼaslemal.
42.17: Vacami cʼa, ¿achique cʼa banel richin chi jun vinek nitzolin pe rucʼuʼx, vi xa man ta xmacun? Y ¿achique cami banel nimacun, vi xa manek ta ri pixaʼ? Y ¿achique cami banel richin nicʼojeʼ jun pixaʼ, vi xa manek ta ri cʼajisabel?
42.18: Vave cʼa can xjiquibex vi jun cʼajisabel, y xyaʼox cʼa jun choj pixaʼ ri xuqʼuen pe bis chique ri vinakiʼ pa ri quinabelbal.
42.19: Vi man ta yaʼon cʼa jun pixaʼ ri nubij chi vi jun achin nicamisan, cʼo cʼa chi rijaʼ nicamisex chukaʼ, ¿la xtuxibij ta cami riʼ richin xticom, vi rijaʼ xticamisan?
42.20: Chukaʼ, vi man ta yaʼon jun pixaʼ chirij ri mac, ri vinakiʼ man ta cʼa cami niquixibij quiʼ richin yemacun.
42.21: Vi manek ta pixaʼ yaʼon can, vi jun achin xmacun ta, ¿achique cami nitiquir ta nuben ri kʼatoj tzij, o chuckaʼ ri joyovabel? Roma ri kʼatoj tzij, y ri joyovabel riʼ, xa manek ta ri cuchukʼaʼ pa ruviʼ.
42.22: Vaveʼ cʼa, can yaʼon vi pe jun pixaʼ, y can kʼijun vi jun cʼajisabel, y yaʼon cʼa chukaʼ ri tzolibel cʼuʼx. Ri tzolibel cʼuʼx riʼ nichʼojix roma ri joyovabel. Vi xa manek tzolibel cʼuʼx rubanon, ri kʼatoj tzij nuchʼojij ri vinek, y nusamajij cʼa ri pixaʼ pa ruviʼ, y ri pixaʼ nuben ri cʼajisabel chique. Vi man que ta reʼ, xa yevulatej ta ri rusamaj ri kʼatoj tzij, y ri Dios xa man ta Dios chic.
42.23: Jacʼa ri Dios can cʼa Dios na, y ri joyovabel nibanatej roma ri rutojbalil mac. Ri jovoyabel yeruchʼojij pe ri vinek ri nitzolin pe quicʼuʼx. Ri rutojbalil mac nuqʼuen pe ri cʼastajibel quichin ri caminakiʼ. Ri cʼastajibel quichin ri caminakiʼ, xqueruqʼuen pe ri vinakiʼ jun bey chic riqʼuin ri Dios. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, rijeʼ yetzolix chic riqʼuin rijaʼ, richin queriʼ nikʼat tzij pa quiviʼ chiquij ri quisamaj, achiʼel cʼa nubij ri pixaʼ y ri kʼatoj tzij.
42.24: Can kitzij vi cʼa, ri kʼatoj tzij yerusamajij conojel ri rurayibal, y chukaʼ ri joyovabel yeruchʼojij conojel ri e richin. Quereʼ cʼa, manjun nitiquir nicolotej, xaxe vi nitzolin pe rucʼuʼx.
42.25: ¿Achique nabij? ¿La nanojij chi ri joyovabel nitiquir nelekʼ el riqʼuin ri kʼatoj tzij? Ninbij chave chi mani, ni ta xa jun ti nitzʼ. Vi ta queriʼ, ri Dios xa man ta Dios chic.
42.26: Quereʼ cʼa, ri Dios yeruben ri nimalej y jumul tak rurayibal ri can e chojmirisan vi pe, cʼa pa tok rutiquiribel pe re ruvachʼulef. Quereʼ cʼa, nicʼachoj ri quicolotajic y ri quelesaxic pa mac ri vinakiʼ, y chukaʼ ri quivulatajic, y ri quikʼaxomal.
42.27: Roma cʼariʼ, nucʼajol, xabachique ri nrajoʼ nijel pe, can niyatej vi kʼij chire richin nuqʼuiyaʼ riqʼuin ri yaʼ richin ri cʼaslen. Y xabachique ri man nrajoʼ ta nipe, man ninim ta richin chi nipe. Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, chupan ri ruqʼuisibel kʼij, can xtitzolix vi chire junan riqʼuin ri rubanon can.
42.28: Vi rijaʼ rurayin nuben ri itzel y man tzolitajinek ta pe rucʼuʼx chupan ri rucʼaslen, can kitzij vi chi ri itzel xtitzolix chic chire, achiʼel cʼa ri tzolijitajic ri nuben ri Dios.
42.29: Vacami nucʼajol, yin ninvajoʼ chi re tijonic reʼ man ta niquinek chic ri anojibal, y chi xaxe ri amac niquinek ta ri anojibal riqʼuin ri nakonbel ri xtuben chi chaʼnin nitzolin pe ri acʼuʼx.
42.30: Yin, nucʼajol, ninvajoʼ chi man taxilkʼotij cʼa chic ri rukʼatoj tzij ri Dios. Man cʼa tatij akʼij richin nacuy aviʼ xa roma nabij chi manek rukʼatoj tzij ri Dios. Xa can tayaʼ vi kʼij richin chi ri rukʼatoj tzij ri Dios, y ri rujoyovabal, y ri rucochʼibel cʼuʼx, can ta xtiquisiloj vi ri avánima. Tayaʼ cʼa kʼij chukaʼ richin yatquichʼutinirisaj, cʼa pa ri pokolaj.
42.31: Vacami cʼa, nucʼajol, rat at oyon richin natzijoj ri chʼabel chire re vinakul reʼ. Cabiyin cʼa nucʼajol, y tatzijoj ri chʼabel riqʼuin ri kitzij y riqʼuin chojilej naʼoj. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xtaben chi e qʼuiy cʼaslemal nitzolin pe quicʼuʼx. Cʼa cʼariʼ, ri nimalej nucʼun banel richin ri joyovabel, xqueruchʼojij cʼa pe rijeʼ. Tuyaʼ cʼa ri Dios chave, achiʼel cʼa ri nubin chave. Amen.

13.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chupan ri junaʼ jumuchʼ vakiʼ, chi ri Nefiʼiʼ cʼa xquibanalaʼ na ri itzel, y can janíla vi nem ri etzelal riʼ. Jacʼa ri Lamaniʼ can xequitakelaʼ vi chi utzil ri rupixaʼ ri Dios, achiʼel cʼa nubij ri rupixaʼ ri Moisés.
13.2: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi chupan ri junaʼ riʼ, ri Samuel, jun aj Lamaniʼ, xpe pa ruvachʼulef Zarajemla, y xuchop lokʼolej tzijonic chique ri vinakiʼ. Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi qʼuiy kʼij rijaʼ xutzijoj ri tzolibel cʼuʼx chique ri vinakiʼ, y rijeʼ can xquelesaj vi el. Ja cariʼ tok xa jubaʼ chic man xtzolin pa ri ruvachʼulef richin rijaʼ.
13.3: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf xpe riqʼuin, y xubij chire chi titzolin cʼa chic, y tuyaʼ lokʼolej rutzijol chique ri vinakiʼ ronojel cʼa ri xtipe pa ránima.
13.4: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijeʼ man xquiyaʼ ta kʼij richin xoc rijaʼ chupan ri tinamit. Roma cʼariʼ, rijaʼ xbe akʼanij y xpaʼeʼ pa ruviʼ ri rutzʼak ri tinamit. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xuyuk el ri rukʼaʼ y can xchoʼ vi riqʼuin cof ruchʼabel, y xuyaʼ lokʼolej rutzijol chique ri vinakiʼ chirij ronojel ri xuyaʼ pe ri Ajaf pa ránima.
13.5: Quereʼ cʼa xubij rijaʼ chique rijeʼ: Vaveʼ cʼa, yin Samuel in jun aj Lamaniʼ. Can yenbij vi ri ruchʼabel ri yeruyaʼ ri Ajaf pa vánima. Can kitzij vi chi rijaʼ rubin cʼa pa vánima chi tinbij cʼa chive chi ri rutzaqʼuibal ri rukʼatoj tzij jequel chic pa quiviʼ re vinakul reʼ. Man xquekʼax ta cʼa el jukʼo junaʼ, xa cʼa nabey ri rutzaqʼuibal rukʼatoj tzij can xtikaka vi ka pa quiviʼ.
13.6: Kitzij chi jun cʼayevilej vululen royoben re vinakiʼ reʼ, y can xtipe vi ka chique re vinakiʼ re. Manjun nitiquir yerucol re vinakiʼ reʼ, can xaxe vi cʼa ri tzolibel cʼuʼx y ri cukubabel cʼuʼx riqʼuin ri Ajaf Jesucristo. Rijaʼ can xtipe vi chuvachʼulef, y xtutij qʼuiy pokonal y xticom cʼa coma ri ruvinak.
13.7: Can kitzij vi cʼa chi jun rutakonaxel ri Ajaf rukʼalajirisan re chʼabel reʼ chinuvech, y xuqʼuen pe jebel tak rutzijol chire ri vánima. Vaveʼ cʼa, xitak pe iviqʼuin richin xinkʼalajirisaj ta chivech rix chukaʼ, richin queriʼ xicʼul ta cʼa ri jebel rutzijol. Jacʼa rix man xinicʼul ta yin.
13.8: Roma cʼariʼ, quereʼ nubij ri Ajaf: Can cof vi ri cánima ri vinakiʼ Nefiʼiʼ. Roma cʼariʼ, vi man nitzolin ta pe quicʼuʼx, yin xtinmej pe ri nuchʼabel quiqʼuin rijeʼ, y xtinvelesaj pe ri Vuxlabal chiquicojol. Man xquencochʼ ta cʼa chic y xquenkʼijuj ka ri cánima ri cachʼalal chiquij rijeʼ.
13.9: Man xquekʼax ta el jukʼo junaʼ tok xtinben chi can xquesocotej vi. Kitzij cʼa, chi xquensoc riqʼuin ri tzaqʼuibel, ri vayijal, y ri cʼayef tak yabil.
13.10: Kitzij cʼa chi xquipe quiqʼuin rijeʼ riqʼuin ri cʼayevilej voyoval. Jujun chique ri ivetzelanelaʼ pa ri rucaj iyaj mamaj ijaʼtzul xtiquitzʼet ri jumul ivulatajic. Can jic vi chi queriʼ xticʼulvachitej vi man nitzolin ta pe icʼuʼx, nichaʼ ri Ajaf. Ri e cʼo cʼa pa ri rucaj iyaj mamaj ijaʼtzul xtiquiben cʼa chive chi xquixvulatej.
13.11: Vi xa xtitzolin cʼa pe icʼuʼx y xquixjel pe chic riqʼuin ri Ajaf i Dios, yin xtinvelesaj el ri voyoval iviqʼuin, nichʼa ri Ajaf. Jaʼ, quereʼ cʼa nubij ri Ajaf: Nim ruva quikʼij ri nitzolin pe quicʼuʼx y yejel pe viqʼuin. Xa joʼcʼa oc ruvech ri man nitzolin ta pe rucʼuʼx.
13.12: Kitzij cʼa, joʼoc ruvech re nimalej tinamit reʼ Zarajemla. Roma can kitzij vi chi xaxe coma ri e choj, cʼa colotajinek na. Joʼoc ruvech re nimalej tinamit reʼ, roma yin ninnaʼ, nichaʼ ri Ajaf, chi e qʼuiy chupan re tinamit reʼ xtiquicovirisaj ri cánima chuvij yin. Jaʼ can e janíla vi chique rijeʼ ri queriʼ xtiquiben, nichaʼ ri Ajaf.
13.13: Jacʼa nim ruva quikʼij ri nitzolin pe quicʼuʼx roma can xquencol vi rijeʼ. Can kitzij vi chi vi ta man coma cʼa ri e choj ri e cʼo chupan re nimalej tinamit reʼ, vaveʼ cʼa, xtinben ta chi jun kʼakʼ xtikaʼ pe chicaj, y xtuporoj.
13.14: Can kitzij vi chi xaxe coma ri e choj tok colotajinek cʼa re tinamit reʼ. Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, petenek ri kʼij tok xqueʼivelesaj el ri e choj iviqʼuin, nichaʼ ri Ajaf. Ja cʼariʼ tok ix chʼakʼirinek chic richin ri vulatajic. Kitzij cʼa chi joʼoc ruvech re nimalej tinamit reʼ coma ri itzel banobel y ri etzelal ri e cʼo chupan.
13.15: Jaʼ, y joʼoc ruvech ri tinamit Gideon coma ri etzelal y ri itzel tak banobel ri e cʼo chupan.
13.16: Jaʼ, y joʼoc quivech conojel ri tinamit ri cʼo chupan re ruvachʼulef reʼ acuchi e cʼo vi ri Nefiʼi coma ri etzelal y ri itzel tak quibanobal ri e cʼo chupan.
13.17: Can kitzij vi chi jun etzelanic xtipe ka chirij re ruvachʼulef reʼ, nichaʼ ri Ajaf quichin ri e Janíla. Jariʼ xa coma cʼa ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo vaveʼ, jaʼ, y roma ri quetzelal y ri itzel tak quibanobal.
13.18: Nubij ri Ajaf quichin ri e Janíla, jaʼ, ri nimalej y kitzij ka Dios, chi xticʼulvachitej cʼa, chi achique xtevan can quichin ri tak rubeyomal chupan ri ulef, man xqueril ta chic. Jariʼ roma ri nimalej etzelanic ri cʼo chuvachʼulef. Xqueril cʼa xaxe cʼa vi rijaʼ jun chojmilej vinek, y xa vi xtrevaj cʼa riqʼuin ri Ajaf.
13.19: Roma yin ninvajoʼ, nichaʼ ri Ajaf, chi rijeʼ yequevaj ta can viqʼuin yin ri quibeyomal. Can xqueʼetzelex vi cʼa ri man xqueʼevan ta ri quibeyomal viqʼuin. Roma can manek vi chʼakaʼ chic ri xtiquevaj ta can ri quibeyomal viqʼuin yin, xaxe cʼa ri e choj. Ri man yerevaj ta cʼa ri rubeyomal viqʼuin yin, can netzelex vi y chukaʼ ri rubeyomal. Y can man vi jun xtril cʼa chic roma ri etzelanic ri cʼo pa ruviʼ re ruvachʼulef reʼ.
13.20: Xtapon cʼa ri kʼij tok xtiquevaj ri quibeyomal, roma quijiquiban ri cánima riqʼuin ri beyomel. Yin xtinvevaj ri quibeyomal tok xqueʼanimej chiquivech ti quetzelanelaʼ, xa roma quijiquiban cʼa chic ri cánima riqʼuin ri quibeyomal. Can xqueʼetzelex vi rijeʼ y chukaʼ ri quibeyomal roma man xtiquevaj ta viqʼuin yin, y chupan ri kʼij riʼ, xquesocotej, nichaʼ ri Ajaf.
13.21: Titzuʼ cʼa pe rix, ri ix ruvinakul re nimalej tinamit reʼ, y queʼivacʼaxaj ri nuchʼabel. Queʼivacʼaxaj cʼa ri chʼabel ri yerubij pe ri Ajaf. Roma can Kitzij vi nubij rijaʼ chi rix ix etzelan roma ri ibeyomal. Chukaʼ nubij chi ri ibeyomal etzelan roma can ijiquiban vi ri ivánima riqʼuin, y man e ivacʼaxan ta ri ruchʼabel ri yoyon richin chive.
13.22: Man nokaʼ ta chiʼicʼuʼx ri Ajaf i Dios, ni ta chukaʼ ronojel ri ruyaʼon chive. Junelic nokaʼ cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx ri ibeyomal, y man nimatioxij ta chire ri Ajaf i Dios roma ri beyomel riʼ. Kitzij cʼa chi ri ivánima man nijel ta riqʼuin ri Ajaf. Xa nisipojirisaj iviʼ riqʼuin nimirinen, y yixbananen, y yixetzelan, y yixokotan, y yixcamisan, y nibanalaʼ conojel ruvech etzelal.
13.23: Roma cʼariʼ, ri Dios rubanon chi xtipe jun nimalej etzelanic pa ruviʼ re ruvachʼulef, y chulkaʼ pa quiviʼ ri ibeyomal. Ronojel reʼ xtipe, xa roma ri itzel ibanalon.
13.24: Jaʼ, joʼoc ruvech re vinakul reʼ. Roma cʼa apovinek chic ri kʼij tok yeʼivelesaj el iviqʼuin ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol, y yeʼitziʼej, yeʼiqʼuek che abej, yeʼicamisaj y nibanalaʼ ronojel ruvech etzelal chique, achiʼel xquibanalaʼ cʼa ri vinakiʼ ojer.
13.25: Vacami tok yixtzijon, xa quereʼ nibij: Vi ta xojcʼaseʼ pa ri kʼij tok xecʼaseʼ ri ojer tak katiʼt kamamaʼ, man ta xekacamisaj cʼa ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol. Chukaʼ man ta xekaqʼuek che abej y man ta xekelesaj el.
13.26: Can kitzij vi chi rix ix itzel chiquivech rijeʼ. Can jic vi qʼues ri Ajaf. Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ can jic vi chi vi jun yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol napon chiʼicojol y nukʼalajirisaj chivech ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf ri yerujiquibaʼ ri imac y ri itzel tak ibanobal, jariʼ tok can yixoyover vi riqʼuin y nicanoj conojel ruvech baniquil richin niyoj rijaʼ. Jaʼ, nibij chi rijaʼ jun yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol man kitzij ta, y chi xa jun aj mac, y can richin vi ri itzel vinek roma rijaʼ nujiquibaʼ chi nibanalaʼ ri itzel.
13.27: Vaveʼcʼa, riqʼuin jubaʼ, jun achin napon chiʼicojol y quereʼ nubij chive: Tibanaʼ reʼ, xa manek ri retzelal. Tibanaʼ laʼ, xa man xtivil ta pokonal. Jaʼ, riqʼuin jubaʼ quereʼ chic xtubij chive: Tibanalaʼ cʼa achiʼel ri nimirisanen richin ri ivánima. Tibanalaʼ achiʼel ri nimirisanen ri nurayij ri runakʼ ivech. Tibanaʼ cʼa xabachique ri nurayij ri ivánima. Vi jun achin xtapon chiʼicojol y quereʼ ta xtubij chive, jariʼ tok can xticʼul vi ta, y xtibij ta chi ja rijaʼ jun yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
13.28: Kitzij cʼa chi xtinimirisaj rijaʼ y xtiyaʼ chire jubaʼ ri cʼo iviqʼuin. Xtiyaʼ chire jubaʼ ri ikʼana puak, y ri isaka puak, y xtivik rijaʼ riqʼuin tziek can jotol vi rajel. Rijaʼ xquerubilaʼ kʼoloj tak tzij chive y nubij chi ronojel xa can utz vi. Ja romariʼ tok rix man xtivil ta manjun ri rumac.
13.29: Rix ix iyaj mamaj ijaʼtzul ix itzel y ix tzʼil. Rix ix covirisan, y can icovirisan vi ri ivánima. ¿Jampeʼ cami chic kʼij ninojij rix chi ri Ajaf cʼa xquixrucochʼ na? ¿Jampeʼ cʼa chic kʼij xtiyaʼ kʼij chi yixyukex coma nacanuc y moy tak yukenelaʼ? Jampeʼ cʼa chic kʼij janíla xtivajoʼ ri kʼekuʼm chuvech ri sakil?
13.30: Can kitzij vi cʼa chi ri royoval ri Ajaf can nicʼat vi chic chivij rix. Vaveʼ cʼa, rijaʼ retzelan chic ri ruvachʼulef roma ri itzel ibanobal.
13.31: Can kitzij vi cʼa chi xtokaʼ ri kʼij tok xqueretzelaj ri ibeyomal, richin xqueʼoc janíla likʼ, richin queriʼ man xquixtiquir ta chic xqueʼichop. Cʼa cʼariʼ, chupan ri kʼij tok ix mebaʼi chic, can man xquixtiquir ta chic xquixcʼojeʼ can quiqʼuin ri ibeyomal.
13.32: Chupan cʼa ri kʼij richin ri imebaʼil, xquixsiqʼuin akʼanij chire ri Ajaf. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xa manek chic xtuben ri siqʼuinic. Roma ix malin can, y ri ivulatajic can jiquiban vi chic chivij. Jariʼ tok xquixokʼ, y xquixvuyin chupan ri kʼij riʼ, nichaʼ ri Ajaf quichin ri e Janíla. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xquixokʼ y quereʼ xtibij:
13.33: Ja ta cʼa xtzolin ta pe nucʼuʼx y man ta xencamisaj ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol, y man ta xenqʼuek che abej, y man ta xenvelesaj el. Jaʼ, chupan ri kʼij riʼ, quereʼ xtibij: Ja ta cʼa xkanataj ta ri Ajaf ka Dios pa ri kʼij tok xeruyaʼ chike ri kabeyomal. Que ta cʼariʼ, man ta xeʼoc likʼ richin man ta xekasech can. Roma can kitzij vi, chi ri kabeyomal manek chic kiqʼuin.
13.34: Can kitzij vi cʼa, chi nikayaʼ can vaveʼ jun samajibel, y pa rucaʼn kʼij man chic nikil ta. Y can kitzij vi chi ri katzaqʼuibal e elesan chic chikavech chupan ri kʼij tok nikajoʼ yekacusaj pa ri camisanel oyoval.
13.35: Kitzij cʼa chi kevan can ri kabeyomal. Ja cʼariʼ xa xeʼanimej chikavech roma ri etzelanic pa ruviʼ re ruvachʼulef.
13.36: Ja ta cʼa xtzolin ta pe kacʼuʼx pa ri kʼij tok xokaʼ pe ri ruchʼabel ri Dios kiqʼuin. Roma can kitzij vi chi re ruvachʼulef can etzelan vi, y ronojel xa likʼ chic quibanon, y man yojtiquir ta chic yekachop.
13.37: Can kitzij vi chi roj oj sutin kij coma aj tzayiʼ. Kitzij cʼa chi sutin kij coma ri takonaxelaʼ richin ri rutijon rukʼij richin ri rutijon rukʼij richin yeruvulaj ri kacʼaslemal. Can kitzij vi chi janíla qʼuiy ri itzel kabanobal. Rat Ajaf, ¿la manek ta cami banel chi natzalabaʼ el ri avoyoval kiqʼuin? Quereʼ cʼa xtibilaʼ rix pa ri tak kʼij riʼ.
13.38: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, kitzij chi ri kʼij richin ri itejtobenic e kʼaxinek chic el. Iyalojirisan ri kʼij richin ri icolotajic, cʼa tok manek chic banel jumul, y ri ivulatajic rix can jiquiban vi. Kitzij cʼa chi conojel ri kʼij richin ri icʼaslen icanon ri man yixtiquir ta nivil. Roma xa icanon cʼa ri quicoten quiqʼuin riʼ itzel ibanobal. Y jariʼ man junan ta riqʼuin ri rubaniquil ri ruchojmilal ri cʼo riqʼuin ri nimalej y Jumal Jolomaj chikavech.
13.39: Janíla ninrayij chi rix, ix ruvinakul re ruvachʼulef reʼ, queʼivacʼaxaj ri nuchʼabel. Nincʼutuj cʼa akʼanij chi ri royoval ri Ajaf titzalabex el iviqʼuin, y chi titzolin pe icʼuʼx y quixcolotej.

14.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Samuel ri jun aj Lamaniʼ xeruyaʼ qʼuiy chic lokʼolej tak rutzijol ri manek banel chi yetzʼibex can.
14.2: Can kitzij vi, rijaʼ quereʼ xubij chique: Vaveʼ cʼa, ninyaʼ chive jun retal. Roma xaxe chic xtikʼax voʼo junaʼ, y jariʼ tok xtipe ri Rucʼajol ri Dios richin yerelesaj pe pa mac conojel ri yeniman richin ri rubiʼ.
14.3: Can kitzij vi cʼa, jareʼ ri retal ri xtinyaʼ chirij ri rupetebal. Roma can kitzij vi, xquecʼojeʼ nimalej tak sakil chicaj. Pa ri akʼaʼ tok cʼa manjani talex rijaʼ, can man xtikʼekumer ta. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, nitzuʼun chiquivech ri vinakiʼ achiʼel vi ta xa pa kʼij.
14.4: Roma cʼariʼ, xtikʼax jun kʼij y jun akʼaʼ y jun chic kʼij, achiʼel vi ta xaxe jun kʼij y manek akʼa, y ja cʼareʼ jun retal chive. Roma rix xtitzʼet chi nel pe ri kʼij y chukaʼ nikaka chic. Roma cʼariʼ tok rix can jic vi xtivetamaj chi yekʼax caʼi kʼij y jun akʼa. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, man xtikʼekumer ta chakʼaʼ. Ja cʼariʼ ri akʼaʼ ri nunabiyej ri kʼij tok xtalex rijaʼ.
14.5: Can kitzij vi cʼa, xtitzuʼun pe jun cʼacʼaʼ chʼumil ri man junan ta riqʼuin xabachique chic chʼumil ri itzʼeton can. Jacʼa chukaʼ reʼ jun chic retal chive.
14.6: Kitij cʼa chi man xaxe ta riʼ. Xa xquebanatej chukaʼ e qʼuiy retal y meyel tak cʼutbel chilaʼ chicaj.
14.7: Xticʼulvachitej cʼa chi rix xtimey ronojel reʼ y xtichʼobolaʼ rij y xquixtzak ka chuvachʼulef.
14.8: Chukaʼ xticʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri xtiniman richin ri rubiʼ ri Rucʼajol ri Dios can ja vi riʼ ri xticʼojeʼ ri rucʼaslen jumul.
14.9: Can kitzij vi, ri Ajaf riqʼuin ri rutakonaxel rubin chuve chi quipe cʼa iviqʼuin y tinbij chive re naʼoj reʼ. Kitzij cʼa chi rijaʼ in rutakon richin ninyaʼ re lokʼolej rutzijol reʼ chive rix, y rijaʼ quereʼ rubin chuve: Tachʼabalij quereʼ chique re vinek reʼ: Titzolin pe icʼuʼx y tichojmirisaj apon ri rubeyal ri Ajaf.
14.10: Vacami cʼa, xa roma yin in jun aj Lamaniʼ y nutzijon chive ri chʼabel ri xubij ri Ajaf chuve, y roma can cʼayef vi re chʼabel reʼ chive rix, cʼariʼ can yixoyover vi viqʼuin, y nitij ikʼij richin yinicamisaj, y xinivokotaj yan el chiʼicojol.
14.11: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xtivacʼaxaj ri nuchʼabel roma xaxe romariʼ tok in jotol pe vaveʼ pa ruviʼ ri rutzʼak ri tinamit richin queriʼ cʼo banel richin xtivacʼaxaj cʼa y xtivetamaj ri cʼajisabel richin ri Dios ri ix royoben can roma ri itzel ibanobal. Y chukaʼ richin xtivetamaj ri rubaniquil ri tzolibel cʼuʼx.
14.12: Y chukaʼ richin xtivetamaj cʼa chirij ri rupetebal ri Jesucristo, ri Rucʼajol ri Dios, ri Tataʼixel richin ri caj y ri ruvachʼulef, ri Tzʼucunel richin ronojel cʼa pa tok rutiquiribel pe. Y chukaʼ richin xtivetamaj chirij ri retal ri rupetebal rijaʼ richin queriʼ xtinimaj cʼa rubiʼ.
14.13: Vi ninimaj cʼa ri rubiʼ, xtitzolin pe icʼuʼx chupan ronojel ri imac richin queriʼ xquetojtej cʼa roma ri rutzil rijaʼ.
14.14: Vaveʼ cʼa chukaʼ ninyaʼ jun chic retal chive. Jareʼ ri retal richin ri rucamic.
14.15: Can kitzij vi chi cʼo chi xticom rijaʼ richin queriʼ, nibanatej ri colotajic. Rucʼamon y nicʼatzin chi rijaʼ nicom richin nibanatej ri cʼastajibel quichin ri caminakiʼ, richin queriʼ ri vinakiʼ xqueʼucʼuex chic riqʼuin ri Ajaf.
14.16: Jaʼ can kitzij vi, ri rucamic rijaʼ xtujek can ri cʼastajibel, y xquerusolocopij conojel ri vinakiʼ chupan ri nabey camic. Jariʼ ri camic richin ri uxlabel. Roma conojel ri vinakiʼ, xa roma ri rutzakinen ri Adán, can e elesan vi chic el riqʼuin ri Ajaf, y jariʼ xa achiʼel e caminek quichin ri chʼaculaj y chukaʼ quichin ri uxlabel.
14.17: Can kitzij vi, ri rucamic ri Cristo yerusolcopij pe ri vinakiʼ, jaʼ, conjel ri vinakiʼ, y yerucʼuaj chic jun bey riqʼuin ri Ajaf.
14.18: Chukaʼ nuqʼuen pe ri rubaniquil ri tzolibel cʼuʼx. Riqʼuin cʼareʼ, ri nitzolin pe rucʼuʼx man nicʼuk ta el y man nitorix ta ka pa kʼakʼ. Jacʼa ri man nitzolin ta rucʼuʼx can nicʼuk vi el y nitorix ka pa kʼakʼ. Chique cʼa rijeʼ nipe chic jun bey camic, jaʼ, ri camic richin ri uxlabel, y jariʼ jun rucaʼn camic. Roma rijeʼ yeʼelesex chic el jun bey riqʼuin ronojel ri chojmilal.
14.19: Roma cʼariʼ, titzolin pe icʼuʼx, titzolin pe icʼuʼx, roma vi ivetaman ronojel reʼ y man nitakej ta, jariʼ tok niben chi nipe ka ri cʼajisabel chivij y xquixkʼirirex ka pa re rucaʼn camic reʼ.
14.20: Vacami cʼa, can kitzij vi xinbij chive chirij ri jun chic retal, jariʼ ri retal ri rucamic. Can kitzij vi cʼa chi chupan ri kʼij tok xticom rijaʼ, xtikʼelkumer ruvech ri kʼij y man chic xtuyaʼ ta pe ri rusakil chive. Quereʼ cʼa chukaʼ xtiquiben ri icʼ y ri tak chʼumilaʼ. Y can oxiʼ kʼij man xticʼojeʼ ta manjun sakil chuvech re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Nitiquir ka pa ri kʼij tok nicom rijaʼ, cʼa pa ri kʼij tok nicʼastej pe chiquicojol ri caminakiʼ.
14.21: Chupan cʼa ri kʼij riʼ tok rijaʼ nicom, xquexibin cʼa ri cokolajay y ri coyopaʼ y can janíla xqueyaloj. Chukaʼ ri ruvachʼulef xtisolon y xtibaybot. Ri abej ri e cʼo chuvech re ruvachʼulef can xquepaxlan vi ka. Ja abej riʼ ri e cʼo ka chuxeʼ re ruvachʼulef y chukaʼ pa ruviʼ. Rix ivetaman chi vacami ri abej riʼ janíla e cof y chi qʼuiy chique e cof y janíla e nim.
14.22: Xquepaxlan cʼa pa tak nicʼaj y can benek vi ruvech xqueʼilitej e vopol chic, e paxinek, y e rucʼaj chic chuvech chijun re ruvachʼulef reʼ, pa ruviʼ y chukaʼ chuxeʼ.
14.23: Can kitzij vi chi xquebanatej xicʼanel tak cakʼikʼ y qʼuiy ri tzuputzuc tak juyuʼ xquekasex, xqueʼoc liʼan tak ulef, y e qʼuiy cʼojlibel ri quibiniʼan vacami liʼan tak ulef can xqueʼoc vi tzuputzuc tak juyuʼ ri can nej vi akʼanij xquejoteʼ vi.
14.24: E qʼuiy nimaʼk tak bey xquepaxitej can, y e qʼuiy tinamit xquemalix can.
14.25: E qʼuiy tak mukubel xquejakatej y xquequiyec pe qʼuiy chique ri quicaminakiʼ. Y e qʼuiy chojlaxelaʼ xtiquicʼut quiʼ chiquivech qʼuiy vinakiʼ.
14.26: Can kitzij vi cʼa, quereʼ rubin chuve ri takonaxel. Roma rijaʼ xubij chuve chi xquebanatej can cokolajay y coyopaʼ, y janíla xqueyaloj.
14.27: Rijaʼ xubij cʼa chuve chi tok xquebanatej ri cokolajay y ri coyopaʼ y ri nimalej cakʼikʼ, jariʼ tok xquecʼulvachitej cʼa can ronojel reʼ. Y xubij chi ri kʼekuʼm xtucuch cʼa chijun re ruvachʼulef reʼ oxiʼ kʼij.
14.28: Chukaʼ ri takonaxel xubij chuve chi qʼuiy vinek xquequitzʼetelaʼ chʼakaʼ chic cʼulvachitajic janíla e nimaʼk chiquivech re reʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xtiquinimaj cʼa chi re retal reʼ y re meyel cʼutbel reʼ can xquecʼulvachitej vi chuvech chijun re ruvachʼulef reʼ. Que cʼariʼ, manek ta cʼa chic roma richin man ta niquinimaj ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ.
14.29: Xtibanatej cʼa ronojel reʼ richin queriʼ ri vinek ri xtiniman, xticolotej cʼa, y richin queriʼ jun chojmilej kʼatonic tzij xtipe ka pa quiviʼ ri man xqueniman ta. Que cʼa chukaʼ reʼ, vi xquecʼajisex rijeʼ, xa can je vi rijeʼ ri e cʼamayon ka chiquij ri quicʼajisabal.
14.30: Vacami cʼa vachʼalal, tokaʼ cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx, tokaʼ cʼa chiʼicʼuʼx chi ri xtisachtej can, xa nusech cʼa riʼ, y ri nibanon ri itzel, xa nuben ka chire rijaʼ. Roma can kitzij vi chi rix ix solcopin can. Niyaʼox cʼa kʼij chive richin niben ri nivajoʼ rix. Roma can kitzij vi, ri Dios ruyaʼon chive jun etamabel y ix rusolcopin can.
14.31: Rijaʼ ruyaʼon kʼij chive richin xtivetamaj cʼa ruvech ri utz y ri itzel. Chukaʼ ruyaʼon kʼij chive richin nichaʼ ri cʼaslen o ri camic. Cʼo cʼa banel richin chi vi niben ri utz, xquixtzolitej chic riqʼuin ri utz, o xtiban chi ri utz xtitzolix pe iviqʼuin. Cʼo cʼa chukaʼ banel richin chi vi niben ri itzel, que cʼariʼ xtiban chi ri itzel xtitzolix chic chive.

15.1: Vacami cʼa, vachʼalal ri ix nucʼuʼxlan, ninkʼalajirisaj chivech chi vi man xtitzolin ta pe icʼuʼx, ri ivachoch can xquemalix vi can chivech.
15.2: Kitzij cʼa chi vi man nitzolin ta pe icʼuʼx, ri ivixjayilal cʼo na cʼa chi janíla xqueʼokʼ tok xqueʼalan. Roma rix xtivajoʼ xquixanimej. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, man xtivil ta cʼa acuchi xtivevaj vi iviʼ. Kitzij cʼa, joʼoc quivech ri xa jubaʼ chic man yeʼalan, roma janíla ri calal, y romariʼ tok man xquetiquir ta chic xqueʼanimej. Roma cʼariʼ, rijeʼ xquepalibex can y xquemalix can richin xquecom.
15.3: Kitzij cʼa chi joʼoc quivech re vinakul reʼ ri xquibiniʼaj ri ruvinakul ri Nefi, vi man xtitzolin ta pe quicʼuʼx tok xqeuquitzʼet re retal y re meyel tak cʼutbel reʼ ri xquekʼalajirisex chiquivech. Roma can kitzij vi chi rijaʼ e jun vinakul can e chaʼon vi roma ri Ajaf. Kitzij cʼa chi rijaʼ janíla e rajovan pe ri ruvinakul ri Nefi, y chukaʼ e ruchʼolin chupan ri kʼij tok itzel xquibanalaʼ. Y rijaʼ yeruchʼolij roma can yerajoʼ vi.
15.4: Jacʼa kitzij vachʼalal chi rijaʼ e retzelan ri Lamaniʼ roma can jutakel vi quibanalon ri itzel. Quereʼ quibanalon roma ri itzel tak banobel e quinakʼisan ri catiʼt quimamaʼ ojer. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri colotajic apovinek chic quiqʼuin rijeʼ roma ja ri Nefiʼiʼ xechʼabalin chique. Roma cʼariʼ, ri Ajaf ruyalojisan ri quikʼij.
15.5: Yin ninvajoʼ cʼa chi rix nitzʼet chi janíla chique rijeʼ quitzekelben cʼa ri bey richin ri lokʼolej quisamaj, y can choj vi yecʼaseʼ chuvech ri Dios, y niquitij quikʼij richin yequitakej ri rupixaʼ, y ri rupixabanic, y ri rukʼatoj tzij achiʼel cʼa nrajoʼ ri rupixaʼ ri Moisés.
15.6: Kitzij cʼa ninbij chive chi can janíla vi qʼuiy chique rijeʼ niquiben quereʼ vacami, y man yetaneʼ ta richin niquitij quikʼij chi utzil richin yequitijoj ri chʼakaʼ chic cachʼalal chire ri etamabel richin ri kitzij. Roma cʼariʼ tok e cʼo e qʼuiy vinek ri yeʼoc pe quiqʼuin kʼij kʼij.
15.7: Can kitzij vi, rix ivetaman chukaʼ, roma can itzʼeton vi, chi e janíla chique rijeʼ e tijon chic chire ri kitzij, y quetaman chic chiquij ri itzelilej y tzʼilolej nakʼisan tak banobel quichin ri catiʼt quimamaʼ. Rijeʼ e tijon richin chi niquinimaj ri lokʼelej tzʼibanic y ri lokʼolej rutzijol quichin ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol ri e tzʼibatel can. Jariʼ yequitijoj rijeʼ chire ri cukubabel cʼuʼx riqʼuin ri Ajaf, y chukaʼ chire ri tzolibel cʼuʼx. Ri cukubabel cʼuʼx riʼ y ri tzolibel cʼuʼx riʼ, jariʼ yebanon richin nijalatej ri cánima.
15.8: Roma cʼariʼ, rix ivetaman chi e jampeʼ na chique rijeʼ ri quereʼ quibanon can, xa can e cof vi e cʼo, y e chʼiquiban chic riqʼuin ri kitzij tijonic, y riqʼuin achique ri solcopiyon pe quichin.
15.9: Chukaʼ ivetaman chi rijeʼ e quimukun chic can ri quitoʼbal richin camisanel oyoval, y niquixibij quiʼ richin yequichop chi el. Roma riqʼuin jubaʼ xquemacun vi queriʼ niquiben. Kitzij cʼa chi nitzʼet chi rijeʼ niquixibij chic quiʼ richin yemacun. Can kitzij vi, rijeʼ xtiquiyaʼ cʼa kʼij richin xquepalibex y xquecamisex coma ri quetzelanelaʼ, y man xquequiyec ta chic ri quitzaqʼuibal chiquij rijeʼ. Ronojel reʼ niquiben roma cʼo quicukubabel cʼuʼx riqʼuin ri Cristo.
15.10: Vacami cʼa, can kitzij vi, ri Ajaf xqueruturusaj cʼa y xqueruyalojirisaj ri quikʼij, stapeʼ cʼa quibanolon can ri itzel. Jariʼ, roma chʼiquiban ri quinojibal rijeʼ tok niquinimaj achique ri niquinimaj, y roma ri cuchukʼaʼ chupan ri quinimanic tok e sakirisan chic.
15.11: Kitzij chi stapeʼ cʼa vi xquetzak can roma manjun chic niquinimalaʼ, ri Ajaf can cʼa xqueruyalojirisaj na ri quikʼij rijeʼ, cʼa tok xtapon na ri kʼij achojchij xechʼo vi ri e katataʼ, y chukaʼ ri yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol Zenos y qʼuiy chʼakaʼ chic e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol. Rijeʼ xechʼo chirij ri kʼij tok ri kachʼalal Lamaniʼ xquetzolin pe chic chupan ri etamabel richin ri kitzij.
15.12: Kitzij nibij chive chi chupan ri ruqʼuisibel tak kʼij, ri rusujunic ri Ajaf can e yaʼon vi pe chique ri kachʼalal Lamaniʼ. Stapeʼ cʼa xtiquitij qʼuiy pokonal, y xqueʼokotex quereʼ y quelaʼ chuvech re ruvachʼulef, y quelaʼ chuvech re ruvachʼulef y xquecanolox, y xquesocotej, y xquequiratej, y manek acuchi xtiquevaj vi quiʼ, ri Ajaf can cʼa xtujoyovaj na quivech.
15.13: Jariʼ, xa achiʼel cʼa nukʼalajirisaj ri lokʼolej rutzijol ri nubij chi rijeʼ can xquetijox vi cʼa chire ri kitzij etamabel. Jariʼ cʼa ri etamabel chirij ri Lokʼolej Quelesanel pa mac, y ri nimalej y kitzij quiyukʼunel. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xqueʼajilex can quiqʼuin ri rucarneʼl rijaʼ.
15.14: Roma cʼariʼ, ninbij chive chi janíla utzil xtibanatej chique rijeʼ chuvech ri xtibanatej chive rix, vi man nitzolin ta pe icʼuʼx.
15.15: Rijeʼ xetzak can roma manjun chic niquinimalaʼ, coma cʼa ri nakʼisan tak banobel quichin can ri catiʼt quimamaʼ. Can kitzij vi, ri nimalej tak samaj ri e kʼalajirisatajinek can chivech rix, vi ta xekʼalajirisex chiquivech rijeʼ, ja rix can nitzʼet vi chi manjun chic niquinimalaʼ.
15.16: Roma cʼariʼ, quereʼ xubij ri Ajaf: Man xquenvulaj ta rijeʼ jumul. Xa pa ri kʼij ri ninvajoʼ yin, can xtinben vi chi xquetzolin pe chic viqʼuin, nichaʼ ri Ajaf.
15.17: Vacami cʼa, quereʼ nubij ri Ajaf chiquij ri vinakul Nefiʼiʼ: Vi rijeʼ man nitzolin ta pe quicʼuʼx, y man niquitij ta quikʼij richin niquiben ri nurayibal yin, cʼariʼ xquenvulaj can jumul, nichaʼ ri Ajaf. Roma rijeʼ man niquinimaj ta stapeʼ cʼa e nubanon e qʼuiy nimalej tak samaj chiquicojol. Can jic vi chi qʼues ri Ajaf, y quereʼ chukaʼ can jic vi xquebanatej ronojel reʼ, nicha ri Ajaf.

16.1: Vacami cʼa, xcʼulvachitej chi e cʼo e qʼuiy ri xecacʼaxaj ri ruchʼabel ri Samuel, ri aj Lamaniʼ ri xerutzijoj rijaʼ pa ruviʼ ri rutzʼak ri tinamit. E jampeʼ cʼa ri xequinimaj ri ruchʼabel rijaʼ xebe cʼa y xquicanoj ri Nefi. Tok rijeʼ xeʼapon y xquil rijaʼ, xequikʼalajirisaj ri quimac chuvech y man xequevaj ta, roma can xquirayij vi chi xekasex chuxeʼ yaʼ pa rubiʼ ri Ajaf.
16.2: Jacʼa e jampeʼ na ri man xequinimaj ta ri ruchʼabel ri Samuel, can xeʼoyover vi riqʼuin. Tok rijaʼ cʼa paʼel na pa ruviʼ ri tzʼak, rijeʼ xquicʼakalaʼ che abej y che chʼab. Jacʼa ri Uxlabel richin ri Ajaf can cʼo vi riqʼuin, y man xetiquir ta xquisoc quiqʼuin ri cabej ni ta chukaʼ quiqʼuin ri quichʼab.
16.3: Vacami cʼa, tok rijeʼ xquitzʼet chi man xetiquir ta xquisoc, e qʼuiy chic xequinimaj ri ruchʼabel. Roma cʼariʼ, xebe cʼa riqʼuin ri Nefi richin chi xekasex chuxeʼ yaʼ.
16.4: Roma can kitzij vi chi ri Nefi xubanalaʼ ri kasnic chuxeʼ yaʼ, y xuyalaʼ lokʼolej rutzijol, y xchʼabalin, y xubilaʼ chique ri vinakiʼ chi titzolin pe quicʼuʼx, y xerucʼutulaʼ retal y meyel tak cʼutbel chiquivech, y xerubanalaʼ meyel tak samaj chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ, richin chi xtiquetamaj cʼa chi xa jubaʼ chic man nipe ri Cristo.
16.5: Xubilaʼ cʼa chique rijeʼ achique ri xticʼulvachitej jubaʼ chic apon. Riqʼuin cʼari, tok xquecʼulvachitej ronojel riʼ, can xtiquetamaj vi y xtokaka cʼa chiquicʼuʼx chi can xekʼalajirisex vi chiquivech tok cʼa manjani quecʼulvachitej. Queriʼ cʼa xtibanatej richin queriʼ xtiquinimaj na cʼa. Roma cʼariʼ tok conojel ri xquinimaj ri ruchʼabel ri Samuel xebe cʼa riqʼuin ri Nefi richin chi xekasex chuxeʼ yaʼ. Xeʼapon cʼa riqʼuin rijaʼ tok xtzolin pe quicʼuʼx y xequikʼalajirisaj ri quimac chuvech.
16.6: Jacʼa can e janíla vi chique rijeʼ man xquinimaj ta ri ruchʼabel ri Samuel. Roma cʼariʼ tok rijeʼ xquitzʼet chi man xetiquir ta xquisoc quiqʼuin ri cabej y ri quichʼab, xecoyoj cʼa ri quiyukenelaʼ, quereʼ cʼa xquibij chique: Tichapaʼ re achin reʼ y tiximaʼ, roma can kitzij vi rijaʼ cʼo jun aj tzay riqʼuin. Y roma ri ruchukʼaʼ ri aj tzay ri cʼo riqʼuin, man yojtiquir ta nikasoc quiqʼuin ri kabej y ri kachʼab. Roma cʼariʼ, tichapaʼ cʼa, y tiximaʼ, y tiqʼuisaʼ.
16.7: Tok rijeʼ xebe chuchapic, jari tok xropin el pa ruviʼ ri tzʼak, y xanimej el pa ri quiruvachʼulef. Jaʼ, xbe pa ri ruvachʼulef rijaʼ y xuchop ruchʼabalixic y ri ruyaʼic lokʼolej rutzijol chire ri ruvinak rijaʼ.
16.8: Can kitzij vi, manjun chic xetamex chirij rijaʼ chiquicojol ri Nefiʼiʼ. Can que vi cʼariʼ ri xquibanalaʼ ri vinakiʼ riʼ.
16.9: Quereʼ cʼa xqʼuis ri rujumuchʼ vakiʼ junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xquibanalaʼ ri kʼatoy tzij pa quiviʼ ri ruvinakul ri Nefi.
16.10: Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, xqʼuis ri rujumuchʼ vukuʼ junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xquibanalaʼ ri kʼatoy tzij. Janíla e qʼuiy chique ri vinakiʼ e cʼo can pa ri quinimirinen y ri quetzelal, y xa e jubaʼ oc chique xebiyin choj chuvech ri Dios.
16.11: Que cʼa chukaʼ riʼ, quibanon can pa ri rujumuchʼ vakxakiʼ junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xquibanalaʼ ri kʼatoy tzij.
16.12: Y chupan ri rujumuchʼ belejeʼ junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xquibanalaʼ ri kʼatoy tzij, xa e jubaʼ oc xjalatej chire ri yecʼulvachitej chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, ri vinakiʼ xquicovirisaj chic quiʼ pa ri quetzelal y jutakel xquibanalaʼ chʼakaʼ chic ri man e rucʼamon ta chuvech ri rupixaʼ ri Dios.
16.13: Cʼariʼ xcʼulvachitej chi chupan ri jumuchʼ lajuj junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xquibanalaʼ ri kʼatoy tzij, can xekʼalajirisex vi nimalej tak retal y meyel tak cʼutbel chiquivech ri vinakiʼ, y ri quichʼabel quiyaʼon can ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol xquichop xekʼajer.
16.14: E cʼo takonaxelaʼ ri xquicʼut quiʼ chiquivech ri achiʼaʼ ri etamanelaʼ, y xequikʼalajirisaj chiquivech rijeʼ jebel tak rutzijol richin nimalej quicoten. Quereʼ cʼa chupan ri junaʼ riʼ, ri lokʼolej tzʼibanic xquichop yekʼajer.
16.15: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, conojel ri vinakiʼ xquicovirisaj chic ri cánima. Xaxe ri janíla xquinimaj chiquicojol ri Nefiʼiʼ y chukaʼ chiquicojol ri Lamaniʼ man que ta riʼ xquiben. Y ri vinakiʼ ri xquinojij chi xaxe oc nicʼatzin ri cuchukʼaʼ rijeʼ y ri utzilej quinojibal, quereʼ xquibij:
16.16: Riqʼuin jubaʼ, rijaʼ xquil jubaʼ chirij ronojel ri cʼulvachitajic ri tzijon can. Man riqʼuin vi ri, roj ketaman chi checonojel re nimalej y re meyel tak samaj reʼ ri e tzijon can, xa man xquecʼulvachitej ta.
16.17: Rijeʼ xquinojilaʼ y xquicʼaxilaʼ quiʼ chiquicojol. Quereʼ cʼa xquibilaʼ:
16.18: Man rucʼamon ta cʼa chi xtipe jun Cristo. Vi nipe cʼa, y vi ja rijaʼ ri Rucʼajol ri Dios, ri Tataʼixel richin ri caj y ri ruvachʼulef, achiʼel bitajinek can, ¿achique cʼa roma tok man xtucʼut ta riʼ chikavech roj, achiʼel cʼa xtuben quiqʼuin ri e cʼo pa Jerusalem?
16.19: ¿Achique cami roma tok man xtucʼut ta riʼ chupan re ruvachʼulef reʼ achiʼel cʼa xtuben pa ri ruvachʼulef Jerusalem?
16.20: Jacʼa kitzij chi roj ketaman chi jareʼ xa jun itzel nimanic yatajinek pe chike coma ri katiʼt kamamaʼ richin chi niban chi roj nikanimaj chi jun nimalej y meyel samaj cʼo chi xticʼulvachitej. Y xa man xticʼulvachitej ta chikacojol roj, xa cʼa pa jun chic ruvachʼulef cʼanej kiqʼuin, y ja ri ruvachʼulef riʼ roj man ketaman ta ruvech. Roma cʼariʼ, rijaʼ yetiquir yojquiyaʼ can pa ri moyirinen, roma manek banel xtikatzʼet quiqʼuin ri runakʼ kavech roj vi ronojel reʼ can kitzij vi.
16.21: Xa quiqʼuin ri novinek y evan tak samaj richin ri itzel vinek, rijeʼ xtiquiben jun nimalej evan samaj ri man xtikʼax ta chikavech. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xkojquiyukʼ ka richin chi roj yojoc samajelaʼ quichin ri quichʼabel y chukaʼ quichin rijeʼ. Roma vi queriʼ, roj cʼo chi yekacanoj richin chi yojquitijoj chire ri chʼabel. Quereʼ cʼa xkojquiyaʼ can pa ri moyirinen chijun ri kacʼaslen vi nikakasaj kiʼ chiquivech rijeʼ.
16.22: Janíla chʼakaʼ chic tzij xequitzʼuculaʼ pa cánima ri can e nacanuc vi y manek quicʼaʼtz. Yalan e nakon cʼa rijeʼ, roma ri itzel vinek xeruyukʼ jutakel richin chi niquibanalaʼ ri itzel. Kitzij cʼa chi rijaʼ xbe chiquicojol y xeruquiraj qʼuiy tzʼucuj tzij y cʼaxinic chuvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef, richin queriʼ xquerucovirisaj cʼa ri cánima ri vinakiʼ chirij ri utz, y chirij ri xticʼulvachirej apon.
16.23: Jacʼa can xebanatej vi chiquicojol ri ruvinak ri Ajaf nimaʼk tak etal, y meyel tak cʼutbel, y chukaʼ xequiben qʼuiy meyel tak samaj. Man riqʼuin vi ronojel riʼ, ri Santanás can xeruchop vi ri cánima ri vinakiʼ chuvachʼulef.
16.24: Quereʼ cʼa xqʼuis ri rujumuchʼ lajuj junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xquibanalaʼ ri kʼatoy tzij pa quiviʼ ri ruvinakul ri Nefi.
16.25: Vaveʼ xqʼuis vi ri ruvuj ri Elaman, achiʼel cʼa ri nubij ri retal banobel cʼo can quichin ri Elaman y ri rucʼajol.

1.intro: Ri Elaman rucʼajol ri Elaman. Rijaʼ rucʼajol ri Alma. Ri Alma riʼ rucʼajol ri Alma ri elenek pe pa ri rijaʼtzul ri Nefi. Ri Nefi riʼ, ja ri rucʼajol ri Leʼi ri xel pe pa Jerusalem chupan ri nabey junaʼ richin ri kʼatbel tzij ri xubanalaʼ ri Sedecías, ri rutataʼal ri tinamit Judá.
1.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi kʼaxinek chic el ri junaʼ jumuchʼ julajuj y ja cʼareʼ chukaʼ tok jukʼo lajujcʼal junaʼ e kʼaxinek chic el tok tel pe ri Leʼi pa Jerusalem. Chupan cʼa re junaʼ reʼ, Laconeo ja rijaʼ ri nimalej kʼatoy tzij y ri ucʼuey bey richin ri ruvachʼulef riʼ.
1.2: Ri Nefi, ri rucʼajol ri Elaman, elenek chic el chupan ri ruvachʼulef Zarajemla. Rijaʼ xerujech can chire ri nabey rucʼajol rubiniʼan Nefi chukaʼ ri xaxilej tak cʼakoʼj chiʼichʼ, y conojel ri retal banobel ri e tzʼiban can, y conojel ri achique can lokʼolej vi ri e quichajin pe pa tok ri Leʼi xel pe pa Jerusalem.
1.3: Ja cʼariʼ tok ri Nefi tataʼaj xel el chupan ri ruvachʼulef y manjun achin xetaman acuchi xbe vi. Ri Nefi alcʼualaxel xerutzekelbej cʼa can ri retal banobel pa ruqʼuexel rijaʼ. Ja cʼariʼ ri retal banobel quichin re vinek reʼ.
1.4: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi pa ri rutiquiribel ri junaʼ jumuchʼ cablajuj, can kitzij vi chi ri lokʼolej rutzijol quichen ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol xekʼajer pe jubaʼ chic. Roma can xchap vi quicʼulvachitajic nimalej tak etal y nimalej tak banobel chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ.
1.5: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, xecʼojeʼ chʼakaʼ ri xquibilaʼ chi xa kʼaxinek chic ri kʼij ri cʼutun can richin yekʼajer ri chʼabel ri xubij can ri Samuel, ri aj Lamaniʼ.
1.6: Xquichop cʼa tziʼen chiquij ri cachʼalal y quereʼ xquibij: Can kitzij vi chi xa kʼaxinek chic ri kʼij, y ri ruchʼabel ri Samuel man xekʼajer ta. Roma cʼariʼ, ri iquicoten y ri icukubabel cʼuʼx riqʼuin reʼ xa manek rejkalen chive.
1.7: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijeʼ xquiben jun nimalej chʼujirinen chuvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef riʼ. Y ri yeniman, janíla xebison roma xa riqʼuin jubaʼ xa man xquebecʼulvachitej ta achique ri e bitajinek can.
1.8: Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, can kitzij chi rijeʼ xcoyobej tok ri jun kʼij y ri jun akʼaʼ y ri jun chic kʼij xtiquiben xaxe achiʼel jun kʼij, y man xtikʼekumer ta ka ri akʼa, richin queri xtiquetamaj chi can cʼo vi rejkalen ri niquinimaj.
1.9: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi xkʼijux can jun kʼij coma ri man yeniman ta, chi checonojel ri yeniman quichin ri nimanic riʼ can xquecamisex vi. Jariʼ xtibanatej vi man xticʼulvachitej ta ri retal ri xyaʼox can roma ri Samuel, ri yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
1.10: Vacami cʼa, xcʼulvachitej chi tok ri Nefi, ri rucʼajol ri Nefi, xutzʼet re etzelal reʼ ri niquiben ri ruvinakul, janíla xbison ri ránima.
1.11: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijaʼ xbe y xuqueʼ pa ri ulef, y janíla xchʼo akʼanij riqʼuin ri ru Dios pa quiviʼ ri ruvinakul ri xa jubaʼ chic man yevulatej roma xquicukubaʼ quicʼuʼx quiqʼuin ri quinimanic ri catiʼt quimamaʼ.
1.12: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi rijaʼ, riqʼuin ri ruchukʼaʼ, can xchʼo vi akʼanij riqʼuin ri Ajaf chijun kʼij. Y can kitzij vi, ri ruchʼabel ri Ajaf xpe riqʼuin y quereʼ xubij chire:
1.13: Tayacaʼ ajolon y caquicot, roma can kitzij vi chi ri kʼij can ninakajub vi pe. Y pa re tocokʼaʼ reʼ xtiyaʼox ri retal, y chuvaʼk xquipe chuvech ri ruvachʼulef, richin nincʼut chiquivech ri e aj re ruvachʼulef chi yin can xtintzʼakatisaj vi ronojel ri xinbij chi tiquitzijoj chʼajchʼojilej tak nuyaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
1.14: Can kitzij vi chi yipe quiqʼuin ri nuvinak yin richin chi ninitzʼakatisaj ronojel ri nukʼalajirisan pe chiquivech ri calcʼual ri achiʼaʼ, pa tok rutiquiribel pe, y richin chi ninben ri rayibel richin ri Tataʼixel y chuckaʼ ri Cʼajolaxel. Richin ri Tataʼixel xa voma yin, y richin ri Cʼajolaxel roma cʼa ri nuchʼacul. Y can kitzij vi chi ri kʼij ninakajub pe, y chupan re jun akʼaʼ reʼ can xtiyaʼox vi ri retal.
1.15: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri chʼabel ri xracʼaxaj ri Nefi can xekʼajer vi achiʼel xbitej can chire. Roma can kitzij vi chi tok xkaka ri kʼij, can man xkʼekumer ta. Y ri vinakiʼ janíla xquimey roma man xkʼekumer ta ka tok xocokʼaʼ.
1.16: E cʼo cʼa e qʼuiy ri man e quiniman ta ri quichʼabel ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol ri xetzak pan ulef, y xquiben achiʼel vi e caminek chic. Queriʼ xquiben roma rijeʼ xquetamaj chi xvulatej ri xquikʼijuj xquiben richin yequivulaj ri e nimayon quichin ri quichʼabel ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol. Roma cʼa can xkʼajer vi ri retal tzijon can.
1.17: Y rijeʼ xkʼax chiquivech chi ri Rucʼajol ri Dios xa juba chic man nipe. Kitzij cʼa chi can que vi reʼ, conojel ri vinakiʼ ri e cʼo chuvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef pa ri rukajibel kʼij, cʼa pa ri relebal kʼij, y chuka pa ri ruvachʼulef pa ri rajquikʼaʼ kʼijʼ, cʼa pa ri rajxocon kʼij, can janíla vi xemeyon y xetzak pa ri ulef.
1.18: Roma rijeʼ quetaman chi qʼuiy junaʼ ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijoj quijiquiban chirij ronojel reʼ. Chukaʼ quetaman chi can xbanatej vi ri retal tzijon can. Rijeʼ xquixibij cʼa quiʼ roma can xquibanalaʼ vi ri itzel, y man xeniman ta.
1.19: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi manek kʼekuʼm chijun ri tocokʼaʼ riʼ, xa can sek vi achiʼel pa nicʼaj kʼij. Cʼariʼ, xcʼulvachitej chi pa nimakʼaʼ xel pe chic ri kʼij, achiʼel cʼa nuben jantapeʼ. Roma cʼa ri retal yaʼon can, rijeʼ xquetamaj chi jariʼ ri kʼij tok ri Ajaf xtalex pe.
1.20: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa checonojel reʼ achiʼel ri xquibij can ri e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
1.21: Xcʼulvachitej chukaʼ chi jun cʼacʼaʼ chʼumil xtzuʼun pe achiʼel cʼa ri bitajinek can.
1.22: Y xcʼulvachitej pe chupan ri kʼij ri, chi ri itzel vinek xerutek tzʼucuj tzij chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ, richin chi niquicovirisaj ri cánima, richin queriʼ man xtiquinimaj ta cʼa ri retal y ri meyel tak cʼutbel ri xequitzʼet can. Man riqʼuin cʼa ronojel re tzʼucuj tzij reʼ y re kʼoloj reʼ, can janíla vi qʼuiy chique ri vinakiʼ xquinimaj y xepachkʼomix cʼa riqʼuin ri Ajaf.
1.23: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri Nefi quiqʼuin chʼakaʼ chic achiʼaʼ xebe chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ, y xquiben ri kasanic chuxeʼ yaʼ chique rijeʼ roma ri xtzolin pe quicʼuʼx. Chiriʼ cʼa xbanatej jun nimalej cuyubel mac. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xcʼojeʼ chic jun bey ri uxlanibel cʼuʼx chiquicojol ri vinek chupan ri ruvachʼulef riʼ.
1.24: Cʼariʼ, man xecʼaxin ta chic. Xaxe e jujun chique rijeʼ xquichop chʼabalixic roma xquirayij xquijiquibaʼ, riqʼuin ri lokʼolej tzʼibanic, chi manek chic nicʼatzin chi niquitakej ri rupixaʼ ri Moisés. Jacʼa riqʼuin re naʼoj reʼ, xa xesachilan can roma man xkʼax ta chiquivech ri lokʼolej tzʼibanic.
1.25: Cʼa cʼariʼ, xcʼulvachitej chi chaʼnin xepachkʼomix y xquinabej chi man utz ta ri xquinojilaʼ can. Roma cʼa xkʼalajirisex chiquivech chi ri pixaʼ manjani tikʼajer, y cʼo chi nikʼajer chironojel. Kitzij cʼa chi xbix chique chi cʼo chi nikʼajer. Kitzij cʼa chi manjun ri rucʼaj ni manjun ti chʼap xtikʼax ta el tok cʼa manjani tikʼajer chironojel ri pixaʼ. Roma cʼariʼ tok can chupan vi ri junaʼ riʼ, xkʼalajirisex chiquivech chi xa e sachinek, y rijeʼ xequikʼalajirisalaʼ ri quimac.
1.26: Que cʼariʼ, xkʼax can ri junaʼ jumuchʼ cablajuj. Y xecʼamatej pe chique ri vinakiʼ utzilej tak rutzijol, coma ri retal ri xekʼalajirisex pe, achiʼel cʼa ri quichʼabel ri lokʼolej rutzijol quichin conojel ri chʼajchʼojilej e yaʼol lokʼolej rutzijol.
1.27: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi ri junaʼ jumuchʼ oxlajuj xkʼax can riqʼuin uxlanibel cʼuʼxʼ. Man riqʼuin vi cʼariʼ, cʼa e cʼo na ri elekʼomaʼ richin ri Gadiaton ri xecʼaseʼ pa ri loman tak juyuʼ, y cʼa xquinakalaʼ na ri ruvachʼulef. Ri quijul y ri quicʼojlibal acuchi niquevaj vi quiʼ, can janíla vi ri cuchukʼaʼ. Xa romariʼ tok ri vinakiʼ man xetiquir ta xequichʼec. Roma cʼariʼ, rijeʼ xequicamisaj e qʼuiy, y janíla camisanic xquibanalaʼ chiquicojol ri vinakiʼ.
1.28: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi pa ri junaʼ jumuchʼ cajlajujʼ ri elekʼomaʼ riʼ janíla xeqʼuiyer. Jariʼ roma e qʼuiy vinek xquichʼer el quiʼ quiqʼuin ri Nefiʼiʼ y xebe quiqʼuin ri elekʼoma. Ja cʼareʼ xbanon chi janíla xebison ri Nefiʼiʼ ri xecanej can chupan ri ruvachʼulef.
1.29: Chukaʼ cʼa ri Lamaniʼ janíla xebison. Kitzij cʼa chi e qʼuiy chique ri calcʼual xenimer. Y tok cʼo chic qʼuiy quijunaʼ richin chi niquiben ri nicajoʼ rijeʼ, jariʼ tok xeyukʼ el coma ri tzʼucuj tak tzij y ri jebelilej tak tzijonic quichin e jujun chique ri e Zoramiʼ. Riqʼuin cʼariʼ, xquitun quiʼ quiqʼuin ri elekʼomaʼ riʼ richin ri Gadianton.
1.30: Quereʼ cʼa, ri Lamaniʼ chukaʼ xquitij pokonal, y ri quicukubabel cʼuʼx y ri quichojmilal jutakel xqʼuis ka roma ri quetzelal ri ijaʼtzul petenek.

8.1: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi kechin roj can kitzij vi. Jariʼ xa roma can kitzij chi choj ri achin ri xtzʼiban ri retal banobel. Roma cʼa rijaʼ xeruben e qʼuiy nimalej tak samaj pa ri rubiʼ ri Jesús. Y manjun achin xtiquir ta xuben jun nimalej samaj pa ri rubiʼ ri Jesús, xaxe vi rijaʼ chʼajchʼojirisan chic el jumul chupan ri rumac.
8.2: Vacami cʼa, vi manjun sachitajic xuben ri achin riʼ tok xrajilaj can ri junaʼ, xa kʼaxinek chic el ri junaʼ juvinek oxlajuj. Queriʼ cʼa nubij ri retal kabanobal.
8.3: Y ri vinakiʼ xquichop chic royobexic chi utzil ri retal yaʼon can roma ri Samuel, ri aj Lamaniʼ. Kitzij cʼa chi xcoyobej ri kʼij tok xtikʼekumer pa ronojel ri ruvachʼulef oxiʼ kʼij.
8.4: Ri vinakiʼ cʼa xquibanalaʼ caʼiʼ quicʼuʼx, y cʼa xetojojen na, stapeʼ cʼa e qʼuiy ri retal e banon can chiquivech.
8.5: Xcʼulvachitej cʼa chi chupan ri junaʼ juvinek cajlajuj, pa ri nabey icʼ y ri rucaj kʼij, xuben jun nimalej job ri can man junan ta vi riqʼuin xabachique chic ri cʼulvachitajinek can chuvech ri ruvachʼulef riʼ.
8.6: Chukaʼ xuben jun nimalej y xibinel cakʼikʼ, y xuben chukaʼ xibinel cokolajay. Jariʼ xusiloj ri ruvachʼulef, achiʼel vi ta xa jubaʼ man xchʼaratej pa nicʼaj.
8.7: Chukaʼ xuben cʼa janíla chʼichʼanilej coyopaʼ, man junan ta riqʼuin xabachique chic ri xbanatej can chuvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef riʼ.
8.9: Y ri tinamit Moroni xmukutej ka nej chupan ri nimalej yaʼ, y ri e cʼo chiriʼ xejikʼ.
8.10: Y xmukutej ri tinamit Moronija riqʼuin ulef y pa ruviʼ ri tinamit riʼ xcʼojeʼ can jun nimalej tzʼurutzʼic juyuʼ.
8.11: Xbanatej cʼa chukaʼ jun nimalej vulatajic chupan ri ruvachʼulef ri cʼo pa rajxocon ri kʼij.
8.12: Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, kitzij chi can janíla vi nim y cʼayef ri vulatajic xcʼulvachitej chupan ri ruvachʼulef ri cʼo pa rajquikʼaʼ ri kʼij. Roma can kitzij vi chi xjalatej ruvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef coma ri nimalej tak cakʼikʼ, y ri nimalej tak silonel ri xquibanalaʼ chuvech chijun ri ruvachʼulef riʼ.
8.13: Chukaʼ cʼa, ri nimaʼk tak bey xejakajoxin, y ri liʼan tak bey xepeqʼuepoxin, y xban chi e qʼuiy tak liʼan cʼojlibel xejoteʼ xexuleʼ.
8.14: E qʼuiy nimaʼk y cʼatzinel tak tinamit xejikʼ. E qʼuiy xecʼat, y e qʼuiy xesilotej. Cʼa cʼariʼ, xetzak ri nimalej tak jay ri e cʼo chiquipan, y ri vinakiʼ xecom, y ri tak cʼojlibel xetoleʼ can.
8.15: Chʼakaʼ chi tinamit cʼa xecʼojeʼ na can. Man riqʼuin vi riʼ, can nim vi ri vulatajic xbanatej chique, y can e qʼuiy vi xecom.
